		<script id="fx-list-top" type="text/x-dot-template">
			<div class="aui-content-padded">
				<h2>{{= it.title }}</h2>
				{{? it.uid && it.userUsername && it.userImg}}
				<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list">
					<li class="aui-list-item">
						<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-media" style="width: 2.6rem;">
								<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.userImg}}" src="../image/touxiang.png" class="aui-img-round aui-list-img-sm" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{=it.uid}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
								<div class="aui-list-item-text">
									<div class="aui-list-item-title aui-font-size-14" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{=it.uid}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
										{{=it.userUsername}}
									</div>
								</div>
								<div class="date aui-list-item-text">
									{{=it.update_time}}
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
						{{? it.userGuanzhu}}
						<div  class="aui-btn aui-btn-info guanzhu guanzhuhovew" tapmode  onclick="guanzhu(this,{{=it.uid}})" data-id='2'>
							已关注
						</div>
						{{??}}
						<div class="aui-btn aui-btn-info guanzhu" tapmode  onclick="guanzhu(this,{{=it.uid}})" data-id='1'>
							关注
						</div>
						{{?}}
					</li>
				</ul>
				{{?}}
				<div class="fx-view-body">
					{{= it.content }}
					{{? it.writer && it.source}}
					<div id="weichu">
						<span>作者：{{= it.writer }}</span>
						<span>来源：{{= it.source }}</span>
					</div>
					{{?}}
				</div>
				<div class="fx-view-tags">{{= it.tags }}</div>
				<div class="fx-view-aniu">
					{{? _user}}
					<span class="aui-pull-left fx-view-anniu2"> <span class="aui-btn {{? it.userZan}} fx-view-zan{{?}}" {{? it.userZan}}data-id="1"{{?}} Tapmode onclick="zan(this,1,{{=it.zan}})" id="zan"> <img src="../image/zan{{? it.userZan}}s{{?}}.png" /> <em>{{=it.zan}}</em> </span> </span>
					<span class="aui-pull-right fx-view-anniu2"> <span class="aui-btn {{? it.userCai}} fx-view-zan{{?}}" {{? it.userCai}}data-id="2"{{?}} Tapmode onclick="zan(this,2,{{=it.cai}})" id="cai"> <img style="margin-top: 0.4rem;" src="../image/cai{{? it.userCai}}s{{?}}.png" /> <em>{{=it.cai}}</em> </span> </span>
					{{??}}
					<span class="aui-pull-left fx-view-anniu2"> <span class="aui-btn"  Tapmode onclick="zan(this,1,{{=it.zan}})" id="zan"> <img src="../image/zan.png" /> <em>{{=it.zan}}</em> </span> </span>
					<span class="aui-pull-right fx-view-anniu2"> <span class="aui-btn"  Tapmode onclick="zan(this,2,{{=it.cai}})" id="cai"> <img style="margin-top: 0.4rem;" src="../image/cai.png" /> <em>{{=it.cai}}</em> </span> </span>
					{{?}}
				</div>
				{{? it.ad}}
				{{? it.ad.url}}
				<div class="fx-ad2 aui-border aui-margin-t-15" tapmode onclick="_url({url:'{{= it.ad.url}}',title:'{{= it.ad.source}}'},'curl')">
				{{??}}
				<div class="fx-ad2 aui-border aui-margin-t-15">
				{{?}}
		        	{{? it.ad.image }}
					<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{= it.ad.image }}" src="../image/loadingImage.png">
					{{?}}
		        	<em>{{= it.ad.ad}}</em>
		        	<div>{{= it.ad.title }}</div>
		        </div>
		        {{?}}
				<div class="xiangguan"><ul></ul></div>
			</div>
		</script>
		<section class="aui-content fx-view-content" id="fx-view-top">
			<div id="jiazai" style="margin-top: 30%">
					<img src="../image/loading.gif" style="width: 50% !important;height: 50% !important" />
			</div>
		</section>
		<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list fx-article-list fx-weitoutiao-list" style="border-top: 0px"></ul>
		<div class="pingList" id="here">
			<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}
				<li class="aui-list-item aui-padded-b-10">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media">
							<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.data[i].img}}" src="../image/touxiang.png" Tapmode onclick="_url({uid:{{= it.data[i].uid}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');" />
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title" Tapmode onclick="_url({uid:{{= it.data[i].uid}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
									{{= it.data[i].username}}
								</div>
								<div class="aui-list-item-right {{? it.data[i].zanUser}} pingZanColor{{?}}" {{? it.data[i].zanUser}} data-id='1'{{?}} Tapmode onclick="pingZan(this,{{= it.data[i].id}} ,{{= it.data[i].zan}})">
									<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>{{= it.data[i].zan}}
								</div>
							</div>

								{{= it.data[i].content}}
							</div>
							<div class="aui-info aui-font-size-12 aui-padded-t-5 aui-padded-b-5">
								<div class="aui-info-item">
									{{= it.data[i].time}}
									{{? it.data[i].huifu}}
									<div class="aui-info-item fx-view-huifu" Tapmode onclick="_url({pingId:{{= it.data[i].id}},aid:{{= it.data[i].aid}}},'view_ping_win')">
										{{= it.data[i].huifu}}回复
									</div>
									{{??}}
									<span Tapmode onclick="pingAdd('{{= it.data[i].username}}',{{= it.data[i].id}})" style="padding-left: 2px;"> · 回复</span>
									{{?}}
								</div>
								<div class="aui-info-item" Tapmode onclick="pingAdd('{{= it.data[i].username}}',{{= it.data[i].id}})">
									<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-comment"  style="color:#4c5276"></i>
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="fx-huifuList" id="fx-huifuList{{= it.data[i].id}}" {{? !it.data[i].huifu}}style="display: none"{{?}}>
								<ul id="fx-huifuLists{{= it.data[i].id}}" Tapmode onclick="_url({aid:{{= it.data[i].aid}},pingId:{{= it.data[i].id}}},'view_ping_win')">
									{{? it.data[i].pingDataList}}
									{{= it.data[i].pingDataList}}
									{{?}}
								</ul>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
				{{ } }}
			</script>
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list aui-content-padded" id="fx-view"></ul>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var id,inputField,images,fx_data,pingNum,UILoading,playModule,article,jindu_scrollTop = 0;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			$(window).scroll(function(){
				jindu_scrollTop = 1;
	        })
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){
			   _user=_getPrefs('user')
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			id = api.pageParam['id'];
			view();
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				view();
			},1)
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/pingList', pagenum,'',{aid:id});
				}
			});
			inputField = api.require('inputField');
			inputField.setInputFieldListener(function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.eventType == 'move') {
						if (ret.chatViewH == 0 || ret.chatViewH == -1) {
							inputField.hide(function(ret, err) {
								if (ret) {
								} else {
								}
							});
							inputField.resignFirstResponder();
						}
					}
				} else {
					_msgz(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			});
		}
		function loadingNU(){
			if(api.pageParam['videoUrl']){
				return;
			}
			var loading=new Array;
			for(var i=0;i<39;i++){
			 	loading[i]={frame: 'widget:
			}
			UILoading = api.require('UILoading');
			UILoading.keyFrame({
			    rect: {
			        w: api.winWidth,
			        h: api.winHeight
			    },
			    styles: {
			        bg: '#fff',
			        corner: 0,
			        interval:39,
			        frame: {
			            w: 247,
			            h: 271
			        }
			    },
			    content:loading,
			    mask:'#fff'
			}, function(ret) {
			});
		}
		function UILoadingClose(){
			if(api.pageParam['videoUrl']){
				return;
			}
			UILoading.closeKeyFrame();
		}
		var playModulebianliang=1;	
		function view(){
			_ajax("api/article/view/id/"+id,function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.video){
					}
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list-top')));
					$api.html($api.byId('fx-view-top'), evalData(ret));
					article=ret
					api.execScript({
						script : 'title("'+ret.userUsername+'",'+ret.uid+')'
					});
					fx_data={title:ret.title,description:ret.description,url:fx_url+"m/a/"+ret.id+'.html',img:ret.image}
					if(!fx_data.title){
						fx_data.title=fx_data.description
						if(!fx_data.title){
							fx_data.title=fx_data.url
						}
					}
					if(ret.video){
						fx_data.img=ret.video+'?vframe/jpg/offset/2/w/100/h/100';
					}else{
						fx_data.img=fx_data.img+"?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100"
					}
					if(!fx_data.description){
						fx_data.description=func(ret.content);
					}
					api.imageCache({
						url : fx_data.img,
						thumbnail:false,
					}, function(ret, err) {
						if (ret) {
							if (ret.status) {
								fx_data.img=ret.url
							}
						}
					});
					var _views = '_views('+ret.shoucang+","+ret.pingNum+');';
					pingNum=ret.pingNum;
					api.execScript({
						script : _views
					});
					if(ret.images_list){
						images=ret.images_list;
					}
					if(ret.pingNum){
						_lists('api/article/pingList', 1, 1,{aid:id});
					}else{
						api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
						_imageCache();
						$('.qiangshafa').remove();
						$('#here').prepend('<div class="qiangshafa" Tapmode onclick="pingAdd()">暂无评论，点击抢沙发</div>');
						api.parseTapmode();
					}
					jindu();
					xiangguan()
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			})
		}
		var pingAddPen = 1,pingIds=0;
		function pingAdd(username,pingId) {
			if(!pingId){pingId=0}
			pingIds=pingId;
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if(username){
				username='回复   '+username+'：'
			}else{
				username='优质评论将会被优先展示';
			}
			if (pingAddPen == 1) {
				pingAddPen = 2;
				inputField.open({
					bgColor : '#fff',
					lineColor : '#D8D8D8',
					fileBgColor : '#f5f5f5',
					borderColor : '#F4F5F6',
					autoFocus : true,
					placeholder : username,
					placeholderStyles : {
						color : '#bbb', 
						size : 14, 
						marginL : 5 
					},
					maxLines : 3,
					sendBtn : {
						bg : '#03a9f4', 
						bgHighlight : '#0287BF', 
						title : '发送', 
						titleSize : '14', 
						titleColor : '#fff', 
						corner : 5 
					},
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret) {
						if (ret.msg == '') {
							_msg('请输入评价');
						} else {
							pingAddTent(ret.msg);
							inputField.hide(function(ret, err) {
								if (ret) {
								} else {
								}
							});
							inputField.resignFirstResponder();
						}
					} else {
					}
				});
			} else {
				inputField.setPlaceholder({
				    placeholder: username
				});
				inputField.becomeFirstResponder(function(ret, err) {
					if (ret.status) {
						setTimeout(function() {
							inputField.show();
						}, 500)
					} else {
					}
				});
			}
		}
		function pingAddTent(text) {
			if(text){
				var html=''
				if(pingIds){
				    html += '<li class="aui-ellipsis-2">';
				    html += '<a>'+_user.username+' ：</a>'+text+'</li>';
				    $('#fx-huifuList'+pingIds).show();
				    $('#fx-huifuLists'+pingIds).prepend(html);
				}else{
				    html += '<li class="aui-list-item aui-padded-b-10">';
				    html += '<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">';
				    html += '<div class="aui-list-item-media">';
				    html += '<img src="'+_user.img+'" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:'+_user.id+',qian:0,fan:1},\'u_win\');" />';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '<div class="aui-list-item-inner">';
				    html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text">';
				    html += '<div class="aui-list-item-title">';
				    html += _user.username;
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '<div class="aui-list-item-right">';
				    html += '<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>0'
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text" style="color:#333;">';
				    html += text;
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '<div class="aui-info aui-font-size-12 aui-padded-t-0 aui-padded-b-0">';
				    html += '<div class="aui-info-item">';
				    html += '几秒前';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '<div class="aui-info-item">';
				    html += '<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-comment"  style="color:#4c5276"></i>';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '</div>';
				    html += '</li>';
				    $('.pingList #fx-view').prepend(html);
				   	document.getElementById('here').scrollIntoView()
				}
				$('.qiangshafa').remove();
				api.execScript({
				    script : 'pingNum()'
				});
				_ajax('api/member/ping',function(ret,err){
				},{aid:id,content:text,pingId:pingIds})
			}
		}
		function gundong() {
			_url({aid:id,pingNum:pingNum,qian:1,fan:1},'view_ping_win')
			return;
			$("html,body").stop(true);
			var scrollTop=0
			var shifkeshi = document.getElementById("here").offsetTop;
			if (shifkeshi >= $(window).scrollTop() && shifkeshi < ($(window).scrollTop()+$(window).height())) {
			}else{
				scrollTop=$("#here").offset().top
			}
			$("html,body").animate({scrollTop: scrollTop}, 300);
		}
		function zan(obj, type, num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if($('#zan').data('id')==1){
				_msg('您已经赞过啦！')
				return;
			}else if($('#cai').data('id')==2){
				_msg('您已经踩过啦！')
				return;
			}
			if (type == 1) {
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$('#zan img').attr('src', '../image/zans.png')
				$('#zan em').text(num + 1);
			} else if(type==2){
				$(obj).data('id', '2');
				$('#cai img').attr('src', '../image/cais.png')
				$('#cai em').text(num + 1);
			}
			$(obj).addClass('fx-view-zan')
			_ajax('api/member/zancai/',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.err){
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}
			},{aid:id,type:type})
		}
		function pingZan(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/pingZan/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			var row=2;
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'},{icon: _image+'share/105.png',title: '举报'}];
			if(_getPrefs('user') && article.uid){
				if(_getPrefs('user').id == article.uid){
					row=3;
					items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'},{icon: _image+'share/105.png',title: '举报'},{icon: _image+'share/del.png',title: '删除'}];
				}
			}
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: row,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        },
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else if(index==10){
						api.actionSheet({
						    cancelTitle: '取消',
						    destructiveTitle: '确认要删除吗？',
						}, function(ret, err) {
						    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
						 	if(index==1){
						 		_loading('正在删除')
						 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										_loadingCloes()
										if(ret.ret){
											var view = 'view();';
											api.execScript({
											    name: 'weitoutiao_win',
								    			frameName: 'weitoutiao',
											    script: view
											});
											_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
												_close(1)
											})
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}
								},{aid:article.id})
						 	}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type,data) {
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type,data){
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _weibo(data) {
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if(uid==_user.id){
				_msg('不可以关注自己')
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('guanzhuhovew')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('guanzhuhovew');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			}
		}
		function img(index){
			api.openWin({
			    name: 'view_photo',
			    url: html_win+'view_photo.html',
			    slidBackEnabled:false,
			    pageParam: {
			        images:images,
			        index:index
			    },
			    animation:{
			    	type:"fade",                
				    subType:"from_right",       
				    duration:300
			    }
			});
		}
		function html(s){
			var dd=s.replace(/<\/?.+?>/g,"");
			var dds=dd.replace(/ /g,"");
			return dds;
		}
		function func(s, n) {
			s=html(s)
			n=100;
	　　　	return s.slice(0, n).replace(/([^x00-xff])/g, "$1a").slice(0, n).replace(/([^x00-xff])a/g, "$1");
	　　	}
		function xiangguan(){
			 _ajax('api/article/xiangguan/aid/'+id,function(ret,err){
			 	if(ret){
			 		var html='';
			 		if(article.mychannel == '3'){
			 			for(var i=0; i< ret.length;i++){
			 				html += '<li class="aui-list-item" tapmode onclick="_url({id:'+ret[i].id+',videoUrl:\''+ret[i].video+'\',title:\''+ret[i].title+'\',qian:0,fan:0},\'videoView_win\')">';
			 				html += '<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner"><div class="aui-list-item-inner">';
			 				html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text">';
			 				html += '<div class="aui-list-item-title aui-ellipsis-2 fx-title">'+ret[i].title+'</div>';
			 				html += '</div><div class="aui-info aui-padded-t-5 aui-padded-b-0" style="padding-top: 5px">';
			 				html += '<div class="aui-info-item aui-font-size-12 fx-index-infp-span">';
			 				html += '<span class="">'+ret[i].source+'</span><span class="aui-margin-l-10">'+ret[i].click+'次播放</span>';
			 				html += '</div></div></div><div class="aui-list-item-media">';
			 				html += '<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="'+ret[i].image+'" src="'+_image+'load-video.png">';
			 				html += '<i class="fx-video-bofang"></i></div></div></li>';
			 			}
			 			var _this = $('.fx-weitoutiao-list')
			 		}else{
			 			for(var i=0; i< ret.length;i++){
			 				if(ret[i].title){
			 					html += '<li class="aui-list-item" tapmode onclick="_url({id:'+ret[i].id+',qian:1,fan:0},\'view_win\')">'+ret[i].title+'</li>';
			 				}
			 			}
			 			var _this = $('.xiangguan ul')
			 		}
					_this.html(html);
					api.parseTapmode();
					_imageCache();
			 	}
			 })
		}
		function jindu(h){
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				return;
			}
			if(!h){
				api.execScript({
					script : 'dibugaodu();'
				});
				return;
			}
			var wh = 105;
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'jindu',
				url : html_win + 'jindu.html',
				bounces : true,
				reload:true,
				rect : {
					x : api.winWidth - wh,
					y : api.winHeight - wh - h,
					w : wh,
					h : wh
				},
				bounces:false,
				bgColor:'rgba(0,0,0,0)'
			})
		}
		function dibugaodu(h){
			return jindu(h);
		}
 		var jindu_time = 0
 		function jindu_time_fun(){
 			if(jindu_scrollTop == 1){
 				jindu_time = 0;
 				jindu_scrollTop = 0
 			}
 			setTimeout(function(){
 				jindu_time++;
 				console.log(jindu_time)
 				jindu_time_fun();
 			},1000)
 		}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var uid, fx_data,rong
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			_config = _getPrefs('config');
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				$('#renwuxitong').text('每日签到');
			}
			view()
			var header = $api.dom('.sx-u-1');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			api.parseTapmode();
			rong = api.require('rongCloud2');
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(_getPrefs('user')){
					viewAjax();
					getUnreadCountByConversationTypes();
				}else{
					view()
				}
				_daily({
					name : 'money_login'
				});
			});
			getUnreadCountByConversationTypes();
		}
		function view(){
			_user=_getPrefs('user')
			if(!_user || _user=='undefined'){
				_uot()
				_user='';
			}
			if(_user){
				$('.sx-u-1-1').hide();
				$('.sx-u-1-2').show();
				$('#guanzhu').text(_user.dongtai)
				$('#fensi').text(_user.fensi)
				$('#fangke').text(_user.fangke);
				$('#huozan').text(_user.huozan);
				$('#username').text(_user.username);
				uid=_user.id;
				$('#userImg').attr('src',_user.img+'?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100/format/jpg');
				if(!_user.yaoqing.s1){
					$('#zailingmoney').text('再领取'+_config.yaoqing.money_yaoqing+'元红包')
					$('.yaoqingma').show();
				}else{
					$('.yaoqingma').hide()
				}
				var l=$('.sx-wode .aui-col-xs-4');
				l.eq(0).children('.aui-grid-label').text(_user.yaoqing.jinbi+'个');
				l.eq(1).children('.aui-grid-label').text('￥'+(_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
				l.eq(2).children('.aui-grid-label').text(_user.yaoqing.tudi_num+'人');
				fx_data={
					title:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_title,
					description:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_content,
					img:_image+'logo.png',
					url:fx_url+'m/yaoqing/uid/'+_getPrefs('user').id
				}
				if(_user.sfz == 1){
					$('#renzheng').hide();
				}
			}else{
				$('.sx-u-1-1').show();
				$('.sx-u-1-2').hide();
			}
			var yaoqing=$(".fx-member-yaoqing .aui-list-item-title p");
			yaoqing.eq(0).text(_config.yaoqing.title);
			yaoqing.eq(1).text(_config.yaoqing.msg);
			if(!_getPrefs('app')){
			$('#renwu').text(_config.yaoqing.renwu);
			}
			$('#duihuan').text(_config.yaoqing.duihuan);
			_imageCache();
		}
		function viewAjax(){
			_user=_getPrefs('user')
			if(!_user){
				api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
				view()
				return;
			}
			_ajax('api/member/info', function(ret, err) {
				api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret));
				if (ret) {
					_setPrefs('user', ret.ret);
					_user=ret.ret
					view()
					api.parseTapmode();
					_imageCache();
				} else {
					_uot()
					_alert('请重新登录',function(ret,err){
						_login();
					})
				}
			})
		}
		function _u(){
			_url({uid:uid},'u_win')
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var row=2;
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制链接'}];
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: row,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        },
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title+fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content+fx_data.url,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else if(index==10){
						api.actionSheet({
						    cancelTitle: '取消',
						    destructiveTitle: '确认要删除吗？',
						}, function(ret, err) {
						    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
						 	if(index==1){
						 		_loading('正在删除')
						 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										_loadingCloes()
										if(ret.ret){
											var view = 'view();';
											api.execScript({
											    name: 'weitoutiao_win',
								    			frameName: 'weitoutiao',
											    script: view
											});
											_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
												_close(1)
											})
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}
								},{aid:article.id})
						 	}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type) {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var wx = api.require('wx');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var obj = api.require('qq');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _weibo() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var weibo = api.require('weibo');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _fenxiangimg(){
			api.imageCache({
				url : sx_gurl+sx.image,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret.status){
					fenxiangimg=ret.url;
				}
			});
		}
		function huozan(){
			var b = parseInt($('#huozan').text());
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'huozan',
				url : html_win + 'huozan.html',
				bounces : false,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto',
				},
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				pageParam:{
					b:b
				},
				animation:{
					type:"fade",                
				    subType:"from_bottom",       
				    duration:100
				},
			})
		}
		function getUnreadCountByConversationTypes(){
			rong.getUnreadCountByConversationTypes({
			    conversationTypes: ['PRIVATE']
			}, function(ret, err) {
 				if(ret.result){
					$('#sixin_num .aui-badge').text(ret.result);
					$('#sixin_num').show();
				}else{
					$('#sixin_num').hide();
				}
			})
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var aid=0;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			aid=api.pageParam['aid'];
			if(aid){
				$('textarea').attr('placeholder','请输入举报内容（250字以内）')
			}else{
				$('textarea').attr('placeholder','请描述意见反馈内容（250字以内）')
			}
			setTimeout(function(){
				$('textarea').focus()
			},500)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function fabu() {
			var content = $('textarea').val();
			if (!content) {
				_msg('请输入举报内容（250字以内）');
				return;
			}
			if (content.length >= 250) {
				_msg('举报内容不超过250字以内');
				return;
			}
			if (!_user) {
				_alert('请先登录', function(ret, err) {
					_login();
				})
				return;
			}
			$("textarea").blur();
			_ajax('api/member/jubao', function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.ret) {
						_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
							_close()
						})
					} else {
						_alert(ret.err,function(ret,err){
							_close()
						})
					}
				} else {
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			}, {
				content : content,
				aid : aid
			})
		}
	</script>

				<li class="aui-list-item aui-list-item-middle">

						</div>

							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title aui-font-size-14" Tapmode onclick="_url({uid:{{= it.data[i].id}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
									{{= it.data[i].username}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class=" aui-ellipsis-2" style="font-size: 0.6rem;color:#999999" Tapmode onclick="_url({uid:{{= it.data[i].id}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
								{{= it.data[i].time}}
							</div>
						</div>
						{{? it.data[i].guanzhu}}
						<em class="aui-btn aui-btn-info guanzhu yiguanzhu" data-id="2" Tapmode onclick="guanzhu(this,{{= it.data[i].id}});">已关注</em>
						{{??}}
						<em class="aui-btn aui-btn-info guanzhu" data-id="1" Tapmode onclick="guanzhu(this,{{= it.data[i].id}});">关注</em>
						{{?}}
					</div>

				{{ } }}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/member/fangke', 1, 1);
			})
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/member/fangke', pagenum);
				}
			});
		}
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('yiguanzhu')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('yiguanzhu');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} 
		}
	</script>

		<div class="aui-content">
			<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}
				<li class="aui-list-item aui-list-item-middle" Tapmode onclick="_url({uid:{{= it.data[i].id}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media" style="width: 3rem;">
							<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.data[i].img}}" src="../../image/touxiang.png" class="aui-img-round aui-list-img-sm">
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner aui-list-item-arrow">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title aui-font-size-14">
									{{= it.data[i].username}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class=" aui-ellipsis-2" style="font-size: 0.6rem;color:#999999">
								{{= it.data[i].qianming}}
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
				{{ } }}
			</script>
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list" id="fx-view">
			</ul>
		</div>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/member/guanzhuList/', 1, 1);
			})
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/member/guanzhuList', pagenum);
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/xxtzPing.css" />
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="aui-content pingList">
			<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}
				<li class="aui-list-item ">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media">
							<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.data[i].img}}" src="../../image/touxiang.png" class="aui-img-round aui-list-img-sm" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{= it.data[i].uid}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{= it.data[i].uid}},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win');">
									{{= it.data[i].username}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-text fx-contentuser" style="color:#333;" Tapmode onclick="_url({aid:{{= it.data[i].aid}},pingId:{{= it.data[i].ping_id}},qian:1,fan:1},'view_ping_win')">
								{{= it.data[i].content}}
							</div>
							<div class="aui-info aui-font-size-12 aui-padded-t-5 aui-padded-b-5">
								<div class="aui-info-item">
									{{= it.data[i].time}}
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
						<div class="fx-ping-content aui-ellipsis-2" Tapmode onclick="_url({aid:{{= it.data[i].aid}},pingId:{{= it.data[i].ping_id}},qian:1,fan:1},'view_ping_win')">
							{{= it.data[i].contentPing}}
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
				{{ } }}
			</script>
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list" id="fx-view"></ul>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/member/pingList', 1, 1);
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/member/pingList', pagenum);
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>首页</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<style>
			body {
				background: #F4F5F6 !important;
			}
			.aui-content-padded {
				margin: 0px;
				padding: 0.75 rem;
			}
			.aui-list, .aui-list-item, .aui-list .aui-list-item {
				background: none;
				border: 0px;
			}
			.aui-content-padded textarea{
				height: 3.8rem;
				line-height: 1rem;
				font-size: 0.75rem;
				padding: 0.75rem;
			}
			.aui-content-padded input{
				font-size: 0.75rem;
				padding: 0.75rem;
			}
			.video{
			}
			.aui-list li.aui-list-item:active {
				background: none
			}
			.aui-list li.aui-list-item .aui-col-xs-3:active {
				background: #ddd
			}
			.aui-list, .aui-content-padded {
				background: #fff;
			}

				padding-right: 0.6rem;
			}
			.aui-radio:checked, .aui-radio.aui-checked, .aui-checkbox:checked, .aui-checkbox.aui-checked{
				background-color:#F85959;
				border:solid 1px #F85959
			}
			.aui-list .aui-list-item-label{
				width: 20%;
			}
			.aui-list label{
				padding-right: 1rem;
			}
		</style>
	</head>
	<body>
		<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
		{{? api.pageParam['type']=="video"}}
		<div class="aui-content-padded video">
			<input type="text" id="title" placeholder="请输入标题（30字以内）"  />
		</div>
		{{??}}
		<div class="aui-content-padded">
			<textarea placeholder="分享微头条"></textarea>
		</div>
		{{?}}
		<!--<div class="aui-list aui-media-list ">
			<ul class="">
				<li class="aui-list-item">
					<div class="aui-list-item-inner">

							<div id="images"></div>
							<div class="aui-col-xs-3" tapmode onclick="addalert()">

		<section class="aui-grid aui-margin-b-15">
			<div class="aui-row">
				<div id="images">
				</div>
				<div class="aui-col-xs-3" tapmode onclick="img()">
					<img src="../../image/weitoutiaoAdd.png" />
				</div>
			</div>
		</section>
		</script>
		<div id="fx-view"></div>
<style>
	#shengma{
		line-height: 22px;
		overflow: hidden;
		margin: 15px;
	}
	#shengma h2{
		text-align: center;
		padding-bottom: 10px;
	}
</style>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var videoPlayer,vodeOnbo=0,UIMediaScanner,playModule;
		apiready = function() {
			UIMediaScanner = api.require('UIMediaScanner');
			oxPlayer = api.require('oxPlayer');
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData());
			if(api.pageParam['type']=='video'){
				addalert()
			}else if(api.pageParam['type']=='image'){
				img()
			}
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function addalert() {
			if(api.pageParam['type']!='video'){
				$("textarea").blur();
				if($('#images .aui-col-xs-3').length>9){
					_msg('你最多只能选择9张图')
					return;
				}
			}
			var buttons;
			if(api.pageParam['type']=='video'){
				buttons=['录视频','选择视频','打开视频库'];
			}else{
				buttons=['拍照', '选择相册', '打开图片库'];
			}
			api.actionSheet({
				cancelTitle : '取消',
				buttons : buttons
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.buttonIndex;
				var img = {
					1 : 'camera',
					2 : 'album',
					3 : 'library'
				}
				if (index != 4) {
					addImg(img[index])
				}
			});
		}
		var imagesI=0;
		function addImg(sourceType) {
			var mediaValue;
			if(api.pageParam['type']=='video'){
				mediaValue='video';
			}else{
				mediaValue='pic';
			}
			api.getPicture({
				sourceType : sourceType,
				mediaValue : mediaValue,
				destinationType : 'url',
				encodingType:'jpg',
				quality : 40,
				targetWidth: 800,
				targetHeight: 800,
				videoQuality:'medium',
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if(api.pageParam['type']=='video'){
						video(ret.data)
					}else{
						$('#images').prepend('<div class="aui-col-xs-3" id="iMg'+imagesI+'"><img src="'+ret.data+'" /></div>')
						imgAjax(ret.data)
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function imgAjax(image){
			if(!image){
				_msg('图片地址出错')
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			api.ajax({
			    url: fx_url+'api/member/imagesUpload',
			    method: 'post',
			    data: {
			    	values:{
			    		token:_getPrefs('token'),
			    	},
			        files: {
			            image: image
			        }
			    },
			}, function(ret, err) {
				_loadingCloes();
			    if (ret) {
			        if(ret.ret){
			        	$('#iMg'+imagesI).data("img",ret.ret)
			        }else{
			        	$('#iMg'+imagesI).remove()
			        	alert("上传失败"+ret.err)
			        }
			    } else {
			        api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
			    }
			});
		}
		var videoUrl;
		function video(video){
			videoUrl=video
			oxPlayer.fixdPlay({
					rect: {
							x: 0,
							y : 250,
							w : api.winWidth,
							h : 300
					},
					fixedOn: api.frameName,
					fixed: false,
					showBack: false, 
					showSelect: false, 
					showSpeed: false, 
					showDlna: {
						small: false,
						full: false
					}, 
					showShot: {
						small: false,
						full: false
					}, 
					showBottomProcess: true,
					autoPlay: true, 
					openCache: true, 
					styles: [],
					index: 0,
					hideControl:false,
					showMore:{small:false,full:false},
					showDlna:{small:false,full:false},
		      showDunmaku:{small:false,full:false},
					showShot:false,
					loop:true,
					data: [{
							url: video
					}]
			}, function(ret) {
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
					if (ret.code == 0) {
							console.log(ret.msg); 
					}
			});
			if(vodeOnbo==0){
				return;
				moviePlayer.open({
					rect : {
						x : 0,
						y : 250,
						w : api.winWidth,
						h : 300
					},
					showBack:false,
					autorotation:false,
	 			 	videoDirection:'landscape',
	 			 	seekBarDragable:false,
	 			 	isShowStatusBar:false,
	 			 	isShowControlView:false,
					path : video,
					autoPlay : true,
					scalingMode:'aspectFill',
					useGestureControl:false,
				}, function(ret, err) {
				});
			}else{
				moviePlayer.replay({
					path : video
				});
			}
			videoUrl=video
		}
		function videoAjax(){
			if(!videoUrl){
				_msg('请上传视频')
				return;
			}
			title=$('.video input').val();
			if(!title){
				_msg('请输入标题（30字以内）');
				return;
			}
			if(title.length >= 30){
				_msg('标题不超过30字以内');
				return;
			}
			_loading('视频上传中...')
			$("input").blur();
			api.ajax({
			    url: fx_url+'api/member/videoUpload',
			    method: 'post',
			    timeout:6000000000,
			    data: {
			    	values:{
			    		token:_getPrefs('token'),
			    	},
			        files: {
			            video: videoUrl
			        }
			    },
			}, function(ret, err) {
				console.log('视频：'+JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
			    if (ret) {
 					if(ret.err){
 						_loadingCloes();
 						_msg(ret.err)
 					}else{
 						var videojson=ret.ret.persistentId;
 						var videourl=ret.ret.key;
						_ajax('api/member/articleAdd',function(ret,err){
							_loadingCloes();
							if(ret){
								if(ret.ret){
									$("textarea").blur();
									var view = 'view();';
									api.execScript({
									    name: 'weitoutiao_win',
						    			frameName: 'weitoutiao',
									    script: view
									});
									_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
										_close(1)
									})
								}else{
									_alert(ret.err)
								}
							}else{
								alert(JSON.stringify(err));
							}
						},{title:title,mychannel:3,video:videojson,videourl:videourl})
 					}
			    } else {
			    	_loadingCloes();
			        api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
			    }
			});
		}
		var videoUrl='';
		function fabu(){
			var weitoutiao = $("input[name='weitoutiao']:checked").val();
			var title='',content='',images='',mychannel=0;
			if(api.pageParam['type']=='video'){
				title=$('.video input').val();
				if(!title){
					_msg('请输入标题（30字以内）');
					return;
				}
				if(title.length >= 30){
					_msg('标题不超过30字以内');
					return;
				}
				if(!videoUrl){
					_msg('请上传视频')
					return;
				}
				videoAjax();
				return;
			}else{
				var dataImg=$('div img[data-img]');
			 	if(dataImg.length){
			 		$('#images').find('div img[data-img]').each(function(){
						var img=$(this).data('img');
						var id=$(this).data('id');
						if(api.systemType == 'ios'){
							UIMediaScanner.transPath({
							    path: img
							}, function(ret, err) {
							    if (ret.status) {
							     	imgAjax(ret.path,id)
							    }
							});
						}else{
							imgAjax(img,id)
						}
					})
					return
				}
				content=$('textarea').val();
				mychannel=1
				if(!content){
					_msg('请填写微头条');
					return;
				}
			}
			ajaxadd({content:content,mychannel:mychannel})
		}
		function ajaxadd(data){
			if(!data.images){
				_loading()
			}
			$("textarea").blur();
			_ajax('api/member/articleAdd',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes();
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						var view = 'view();';
						api.execScript({
						    name: 'weitoutiao_win',
			    			frameName: 'weitoutiao',
						    script: view
						});
						_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
							_close()
						})
					}else{
						_alert(ret.err)
					}
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			},{description:data.content,images:data.images,mychannel:data.mychannel})
		}
		function img() {
			if(api.pageParam['type']=='video'){
				addalert()
				return;
			}
			UIMediaScanner.open({
				type : 'picture',
				max : 9,
				sort : {
					key : 'time',
					order : 'desc'
				},
				texts : {
					stateText : '已选择*项',
					cancelText : '取消',
					finishText : '完成'
				},
				styles : {
					bg : '#fff',
					mark : {
						icon : '',
						position : 'bottom_left',
						size : 20
					},
					nav : {
						bg : '#eee',
						stateColor : '#000',
						stateSize : 18,
						cancelBg : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
						cancelColor : '#000',
						cancelSize : 18,
						finishBg : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
						finishColor : '#000',
						finishSize : 18
					}
				},
				exchange : true,
				rotation : true
			}, function(ret) {
				if (ret.eventType=='confirm') {
					var html ='';
					for(var i=0;i<ret.list.length;i++){
						var suijis=suiji();
						html += '<div class="aui-col-xs-3 shaidanImg" id="id'+suijis+'">';
						html += '	<img data-id="'+suijis+'" data-img="'+ret.list[i].path+'" src="'+ret.list[i].thumbPath+'" />';
						html +=	'	<em data-id="'+suijis+'">删除</em>';
						html +=	'</div>';
					}
					$('#images').prepend(html);
					$('.aui-col-xs-3 em').click(function(){
						var id=$(this).data('id')
						$('#id'+id).remove()
					})
				}
				_loadingCloes()
			});
		}
		function suiji(){
			return Math.random().toString(36).substr(2)
		}
		function imag(){
			var content = $api.val($api.dom('#content'));
			if (!content) {
				_msg('请输入晒单内容');
				return;
			}
			var shaidanImg=$('.shaidanImg')
			if(!shaidanImg.length){
				_msg('至少上传一张晒单图片')
				console.log('a:'+shaidanImg.length)
				return;
			}
		 	var dataImg=$('div img[data-img]');
		 	if(dataImg.length){
				$('#images').find('div img[data-img]').each(function(){
					var img=$(this).data('img');
					var id=$(this).data('id');
					if(api.systemType == 'ios'){
						UIMediaScanner.transPath({
						    path: img
						}, function(ret, err) {
						    if (ret.status) {
						     	imgAjax(ret.path,id)
						    }
						});
					}else{
						imgAjax(img,id)
					}
				})
			}else{
				_loading()
				add()
			}
		}
		function imgAjax(image,id){
			if(!image){
				_msg('图片地址出错')
				return;
			}
			console.log('正在上传：'+image)
			_loading('正在上传图片...')
			api.ajax({
			    url: fx_url+'api/member/imagesUpload',
			    method: 'post',
			    data: {
			    	values:{
			    		token:_getPrefs('token'),
			    	},
			        files: {
			            image: image
			        }
			    },
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if (ret) {
			        if(ret.ret){
			        	$('#id'+id).data('url',ret.ret)
			        	$('#id'+id+' [data-img]').removeAttr('data-img');
			        }else{
			        	alert("上传失败"+ret.err)
			        }
			    } else {
			        api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
			    }
				loadingNo()
			});
		}
		function loadingNo(){
			var url=$('[data-url]')
			var imgList=$('.shaidanImg')
			if(imgList.length == url.length){
				var images = [];
				$('[data-url]').map(function() {
					var adsasd = $(this).data('url');
					if (adsasd) {
						images.push(adsasd)
						console.log('成功：'+adsasd);
					}
				})
				if (JSON.stringify(images) != '[]') {
					images = JSON.stringify(images);
				}
				ajaxadd({images:images,mychannel:2,content:$('textarea').val()})
			}
		}
	</script>
</html>
<!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>首页</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<style>
			.aui-list {
				border: 0px;
				background: none;
			}
			.aui-list .aui-list-item {
				margin-left: 0.7rem;
				padding: 0.3rem 0px;
			}
			.aui-list-item-inner.aui-list-item-arrow {
				font-size: 0.75rem;
			}
		</style>
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="aui-content">
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list">

			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_heibai(1)
			api.addEventListener({

				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/member/zanList', 1, 1);
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/member/zanList', pagenum);
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/sixin.css" />
		<style>
		body{
	background: #EBEBEB;
}
#sx-view{
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	overflow: hidden;
	margin-bottom: 5rem;
}
.voice{             
        position: relative;
        background-image: url(../image/2019/rong/stop.png);
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: 0 -0.1rem;
        background-size: 1.4rem auto;
        padding-left: 1.4rem;
        padding-right: 1.4rem;
        color: #424242;
}
.voice_s{
	background-image: url(../image/2019/rong/playing.gif);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: 0 -0.1rem;
    background-size: 1.4rem auto;
}
.aui-chat .aui-chat-header {
				margin-bottom: 0px;
			}
			.aui-chat .aui-chat-content {
				color: #212121;
				font-size: 0.75rem;
				border-radius: 0.2rem;
				position: relative;
				padding: 0.3rem;
				word-break: break-all;
				word-wrap: break-word;
			}
			.aui-chat .aui-chat-content img {
				max-width: 100%;
				display: inline;
				border-radius: 0.2rem;
				vertical-align:middle
			}
			.aui-chat .aui-chat-left .aui-chat-content{
				float: left;
				left: 0.5rem;
			}
			.aui-chat .aui-chat-right .aui-chat-content{
				right: 0.5rem;
				float: right;
			}
		</style>
	</head>
	<body>
		<section class="aui-chat" id="sx-view"></section>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var rong, id = 0, roots = 1, photoBrowser,UIChatBox
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			id = "" + api.pageParam['id'];
			rong = api.require('rongCloud2');
			UIChatBox = api.require('UIChatBox');
			photoBrowser = api.require('photoBrowser');
			init();
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'resume'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
			UIChatBox.addEventListener({
				target : 'recordBtn',
				name : 'press'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					sj1 = new Date().getTime();
					if (ret) {
						var savePath = 'fs:
						api.startRecord({
							path : savePath
						});
					}
				} else {
					console.log("语音开始err：" + JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			});
			UIChatBox.addEventListener({
				target : 'recordBtn',
				name : 'press_cancel'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					var sj2 = new Date().getTime() - sj1;
					if (sj2 <= 2000) {
						stopRecord();
						_msg('语音时间较短，请重新录音')
					} else if (sj2 > 2000) {
						api.stopRecord(function(ret, err) {
							if (ret.duration > 0) {
								sendVoiceMessage(ret.path, ret.duration);
							}
						});
					}
				} else {
					console.log("我松开了err：" + JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			});
			var winHeight = api.winHeight;
			UIChatBox.addEventListener({
				target : 'inputBar',
				name : 'move'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (api.systemType == 'ios') {
						$api.css($api.dom('#sx-view'), 'padding-bottom:' + ret.panelHeight + 'px');
					}
					_gun();
				}
			});
			rong.setOnReceiveMessageListener(function(ret, err) {
				if(ret.result.message){
					_html(ret.result.message);
					clearMessagesUnreadStatus();
				}
			})
		}
		function init(){
			i();
			_getLatestMessages();
			clearMessagesUnreadStatus();
		}
		function _html(ret) {
				if (!ret.content.extra) {
					ret.content.extra = "{uid:" + _user.id + ",img:'" + _user.img + "',nickname:'" + _user.username + "'}";
				} else {
				}
				var extra = eval('(' + ret.content.extra.replace(/}{/, ',') + ')');
				var text = ret.content.text;
				var idclass = ret.senderUserId != _user.id ? 'left' : 'right';
				var html = '<div class="aui-chat-item aui-chat-' + idclass + '">';
				html += '<div class="aui-chat-media">';
				html += '<img src="' + (ret.senderUserId == _user.id ? _user.img+'?imageView2/1/w/50/h/50/format/jpg' : extra.img+'?imageView2/1/w/50/h/50/format/jpg') + '"  />';
				html += '</div>';
				html += '<div class="aui-chat-inner">';
				html += '<div class="aui-chat-name">';
				html += (ret.senderUserId == _user.id ? _user.nickname : extra.nickname);
				html += '</div>';
				html += '<div class="aui-chat-content">';
				html += '<div class="aui-chat-arrow"></div>';
				if (ret.objectName == 'RC:TxtMsg') {
					html += _text(ret.content.text);
				} else if (ret.objectName == 'RC:ImgMsg') {
					html += '<img src="' + ret.content.thumbPath + '" tapmode onclick="img(\'' + ret.content.imageUrl + '\')" />';
				} else if (ret.objectName == 'RC:VcMsg') {
					html += '<div class="voice" tapmode onclick="play(this,\'' + ret.content.voicePath + '\')">' + ret.content.duration + '</div>';
				} else {
					html += JSON.stringify(ret);
				}
				html += '</div></div></div>';
				$api.append($api.dom('#sx-view'), html);
				api.parseTapmode();
				_gun();
				return;
				if (roots == 1) {
					var scrollHeight = $(document).height();
					window.scrollTo(0, scrollHeight);
				} else {
					_gun();
				}
		}
		function _getLatestMessages() {
			rong.getLatestMessages({
				conversationType : 'PRIVATE',
				targetId : id,
				count : 20
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.status == 'success') {
						var i_s = ret.result.length - 1;
						for (var i = 0; i < ret.result.length; i++) {
							_html(ret.result[i_s]);
							i_s--
						}
					}
				}
			})
		}
		function stopRecord() {
			api.stopRecord(function(ret, err) {
			});
		}
		function play(_this, path) {
			_this = $(_this);
			_this.addClass('voice_s');
			api.startPlay({
				path : path
			}, function() {
				_this.removeClass('voice_s')
			});
		}
		function img(images) {
			photoBrowser.open({
				images : [images],
				bgColor : '#000',
				mode : 2
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.eventType == 'click') {
					photoBrowser.close();
				}
			});
		}
		function i() {
			UIChatBox.open({
				placeholder : '',
				maxRows : 4,
				emotionPath : _image + '2019/rong/emotion',
				texts : {
					recordBtn : {
						normalTitle : '按住说话',
						activeTitle : '松开结束'
					},
					sendBtn : {
						title : '发送'
					}
				},
				styles : {
					topDivider : {
						width : 0, 
						color : '#000' 
					},
					inputBar : {
						borderColor : '##F9F9F8',
						bgColor : '#F9F9F8'
					},
					inputBox : {
						borderColor : '#e8e8e8', 
						bgColor : '#ffffff', 
						boardBgColor : '#fff', 
						topMargin : 10,          
					},
					emotionBtn : {
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/face1.png'
					},
					extrasBtn : {
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/add1.png'
					},
					keyboardBtn : {
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/key1.png'
					},
					recordBtn : {
						normalBg : '#e8e8e8',
						activeBg : '#c4c4c4',
						color : '#000',
						size : 14
					},
					recordPanelBtn : {
						normalImg : '', 
						activeImg : '', 
						width : 100, 
						height : 100 
					},
					indicator : {
						target : 'both',
						color : '#c4c4c4',
						activeColor : '#9e9e9e'
					},
					sendBtn : {
						titleColor : '#fff',
						bg : '#419fd9',
						activeBg : '#247DB3',
						titleSize : 15
					}
				},
				extras : {
					titleSize : 10,
					titleColor : '#a3a3a3',
					btns : [{
						title : '相册图片',
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/img1.png',
						activeImg : _image + '2019/rong/img2.png'
					}, {
						title : '相机拍照',
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/cam1.png',
						activeImg : _image + '2019/rong/cam2.png'
					}]
				},
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.eventType == 'send') {
						sendTextMessage(ret.msg);
					}
					if (ret.eventType == 'clickExtras') {
						_images(ret.index)
					}
				} else {
				}
			});
		}
		function sendTextMessage(text) {
			rong.sendTextMessage({
				conversationType : 'PRIVATE',
				targetId : id,
				text : text,
				extra : "{uid:'" + _user.id + "',img:'" + _user.img + "',nickname:'" + _user.username + "'}"
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					 console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
					if (ret.status == 'success' || ret.status == 'prepare') {
						_html(ret.result.message);
						gengxin();
					}
				} else {
					sendTextMessage_err(err.code)
				}
			});
		}
		function sendImageMessage(img) {
			rong.sendImageMessage({
				conversationType : 'PRIVATE',
				targetId : id,
				imagePath : img,
				extra : "{uid:'" + _user.id + "',img:'" + _user.img + "',nickname:'" + _user.username + "'}"
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.status == 'prepare') {
						_html(ret.result.message);
						gengxin();
					}
				} else {
					sendTextMessage_err(err.code)
				}
			});
		}
		function sendVoiceMessage(voicePath, duration) {
			rong.sendVoiceMessage({
				conversationType : 'PRIVATE',
				targetId : id,
				voicePath : voicePath,
				duration : duration,
				extra : "{uid:'" + _user.id + "',img:'" + _user.img + "',nickname:'" + _user.username + "'}"
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.status == 'prepare') {
						_html(ret.result.message);
						gengxin();
					}
				} else {
					sendTextMessage_err(err.code)
				}
			});
		}
		function _images(index) {
			var sourceType = 'library'
			if (index == 1) {
				sourceType = 'camera';
			}
			api.getPicture({
				sourceType : sourceType,
				encodingType : 'png',
				mediaValue : 'pic',
				destinationType : 'url',
				quality : 100,
				saveToPhotoAlbum : false
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					sendImageMessage(ret.data)
				} else {
				}
			});
		}
		function send_err(msg) {
			switch(msg) {
				case '30014':
					_alert('发送处理失败，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '30003':
					_alert('服务器超时，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '31009':
					_alert('用户被屏蔽，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '-10000':
					_alert('未调用 init 方法进行初始化，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '-10001':
					_alert('未调用 connect 方法进行连接，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '-10002':
					_alert('输入参数错误，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				default:
					_alert('用户在黑名单中，错误码：' + msg);
			}
		}
		function _text(text) {
			_image = '../../../html/image/'
			var reg = /\[.+?\]/g;
			var face = {
				'[微笑]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_1.png"  width="28"/></span>',
				'[撇嘴]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_2.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[色]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_3.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[发呆]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_4.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[得意]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_5.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[流泪]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_6.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[害羞]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_7.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[闭嘴]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_8.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[睡]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_9.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[大哭]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_10.png"  width="28"/></span>',
				'[尴尬]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_11.png"  width="28"/></span>',
				'[发怒]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_12.png"  width="28"/></span>',
				'[调皮]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_13.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[呲牙]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_14.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[惊讶]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_15.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[难过]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_16.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[酷]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_17.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[冷汗]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_18.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[抓狂]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_19.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[吐]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_20.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[偷笑]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_21.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[愉快]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_22.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[白眼]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_23.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[傲慢]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_24.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[饥饿]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_25.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[困]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_26.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[恐惧]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_27.png"  width="28" /></span>',
				'[流汗]' : '<span><img src="'+_image + '2019/rong/emotion/Expression_28.png"  width="28" /></span>',

			};
			text = text.replace(reg, function(a, b) {
				return face[a] ? face[a] : a;
			});
			return text;
		}
		function _gun(type) {
			var time = 300
			setTimeout(function() {
				api.pageDown({
					bottom : true,
					animate : true
				}, function(ret) {
				});
			}, time || 0)
		}
		function clearMessagesUnreadStatus(){
			rong.clearMessagesUnreadStatus({
			    conversationType: 'PRIVATE',
			    targetId: id
			}, function(ret, err) {
			     gengxin();
			})
		}
		function gengxin(){
			api.sendEvent({
			    name: 'rong_gengxin',
			    extra: {
			        gengxin: '1',
			    }
			});
		}
	</script>

<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">

		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>认证</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<style>
			.aui-list-item-label-icon{
				font-size: 0.75rem;
				color: #000;
				min-width: 4rem !important;
			}
			.img{
				border-top:0.75rem solid #F4F6F7;
				padding: 0.75rem;
			}
			.img div.aui-card-list-footer div{
				width:48%;
				height: 10rem;
				background: #F4F6F7 url('../../image/2019/sfz_jia.png') no-repeat center center;
				background-size: 3rem;
				position: relative
			}
			.img p{
				position: absolute;
				bottom: 0.5rem;
				text-align: center;
				left: 0;
				width: 100%;
				font-size: 0.65rem;
			}

				width: 100%;

	<body>
		<div class="aui-content aui-margin-b-15 fx-reg">
			<ul class="aui-list aui-form-list">
				<li class="aui-list-item">
					<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-label-icon">
							真实姓名
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-input">
							<input type="text" id="xingming" value="" placeholder="请输入真实姓名" Tapmode>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
				<li class="aui-list-item">
					<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-label-icon">
							身份证号
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-input">
							<input type="text" id="sfz" value="" placeholder="请输入真实身份证号码" Tapmode>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
			</ul>
			<div class="img">
				<h3>上传身份证明</h3>
				<div class="aui-card-list-footer">
					<div id="img_shou" data-img='' tapmode onclick="img(1)">
						<p>
							手持身份证照片
						</p>
					</div>
					<div id="img_zheng" data-img='' tapmode onclick="img(2)">
						<p>
							身份证正面照片
						</p>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="aui-btn-blocks aui-margin-15">
				<div class="aui-btn aui-btn-block aui-btn-danger " Tapmode onclick="add()">
					提交认证
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var tijiao = 1,msg='无法操作';
		apiready = function() {
			_userInfo();
			api.parseTapmode();
			info_sfz();
		}
		function add(){
			if(!tijiao){
				return _msg(msg);
			}
			var xingming = $('#xingming').val();
			if(!xingming){
			   return _msg('请输入真实姓名');
			}
			var sfz = $('#sfz').val();
			if(!sfz){
			   return _msg('请输入真实身份证号码');
			}
			var sfz_shou = $('#img_shou').data('img');
			if(!sfz_shou){
			   return _msg('请上传手持身份证照片');
			}
			var img_zheng = $('#img_zheng').data('img');
			if(!img_zheng){
			   return _msg('请上传身份证正面照片');
			}
			_loading();
			_ajax('api/member/sfz',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes();
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						_userInfo();
						_alert(ret.ret,function(ret){
							_close();
						})
					}else{
						_alert(ret.err)
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},{xingming:xingming,sfz:sfz,sfz_shou:sfz_shou,img_zheng:img_zheng})
		}
		function img(type) {
			api.getPicture({
						sourceType : 'camera',
						mediaValue : 'pic',
						destinationType : 'url',
						allowEdit : false,
						quality : 50,
					}, function(ret, err) {
						if (ret) {
							if (ret.data) {
								imgAjax(ret.data,type)
							}
						}
					});
			return;
			var name = '手持身份证照片';
			if (type == 2) {
				name = "身份证正面照片";
			}
			api.actionSheet({
				title : name,
				cancelTitle : '取消',
				buttons : ['拍照']
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.buttonIndex;
				if (index != 3) {
					var sourceType = 'album'
					if (index == 1) {
						sourceType = 'camera'
					}
					api.getPicture({
						sourceType : sourceType,
						encodingType : 'jpg',
						mediaValue : 'pic',
						destinationType : 'url',
						allowEdit : false,
						quality : 50,
						targetWidth : 800,
						targetHeight : 800,
					}, function(ret, err) {
						if (ret) {
							if (ret.data) {
								imgAjax(ret.data,type)
							}
						}
					});
				}
			});
		}
		function imgAjax(image,type) {
			if (!image) {
				_msg('图片地址出错')
				return;
			}
			console.log(image)
			api.ajax({
				url : fx_url + 'api/member/imagesUpload',
				method : 'post',
				data : {
					values : {
						token : _getPrefs('token'),
					},
					files : {
						image : image
					}
				},
			}, function(ret, err) {
				 console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err));
				_loadingCloes();
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.ret) {
						console.log(JSON.stringify(ret));
						if(type == 2){
							var _this = $('#img_zheng');
						}else{
							var _this = $('#img_shou');
						}
						_this.data('img',ret.ret);
						_this.html('<img src="'+image+'" />');
						_this.css('height','auto');
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				} else {
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			});
		}
		function info_sfz(){
			_loading();
			_ajax('api/member/info_sfz',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes();
				if(ret){
					if(ret.hide == 1){
						tijiao = 0;
						msg = '实名已通过';
						$('.aui-btn-danger').text(msg);
						$('.aui-btn-danger').removeClass('aui-btn-danger');
					}else if(ret.hide == 2){
						tijiao = 0;
						msg = '正在审核，无法操作';
						$('.aui-btn-danger').text(msg);
						$('.aui-btn-danger').removeClass('aui-btn-danger');
					}
					$('#xingming').val(ret.xingming);
					$('#sfz').val(ret.sfz);
					var _this = $('#img_shou');
					_this.data('img',ret.sfz_shou);
					_this.html('<img src="'+fx_cdn+ret.sfz_shou+'" />');
					_this.css('height','auto');
					_this = $('#img_zheng')
					_this.data('img',ret.sfz_zheng);
					_this.html('<img src="'+fx_cdn+ret.sfz_zheng+'" />');
					_this.css('height','auto');
				}
			})
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<body>
		<div class="aui-content sx-s-1">
			<script id="sx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.length; i < len; i++) { }}
				<li class="aui-list-item aui-list-item-middle" tapmode onclick="_url({title:'用户id:'+{{= it[i].targetId}},id:{{= it[i].targetId}},url:'member/sixin_view'})">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media">
							{{? it[i].unreadMessageCount}}
							<div class="weidu">
								<div class="aui-badge" style="position:relative;top:0; left:0">{{= it[i].unreadMessageCount}}</div>
							</div>
							{{?}} 
							<img src="{{= eval('(' + it[i].latestMessage.extra.replace(/}{/, ',') + ')').img}}" class="aui-img-round aui-list-img-sm">
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner ">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text sx-s-1-username">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title ">
									{{= it[i].latestMessage.extra.nickname ? it[i].latestMessage.extra.nickname : '用户'}}
								</div>
								<div class="aui-list-item-right">
									{{= dateStr(it[i].sentTime/1000)}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-text sx-s-1-text">
								{{= it[i].latestMessage.text ? it[i].latestMessage.text : ''}}
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
				{{ } }}
			</script>
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list" id="sx-view">
				<!--<li class="aui-list-item aui-list-item-middle">

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var rong,xiaoxi=1
		apiready = function() {
			rong = api.require('rongCloud2');
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) { 
			});
			rongyun_init();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'rong_gengxin'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if(ret.value.gengxin){
			    	rongyun_init();
			    } 
			});
		}
		function rongyun_init() {
			rong.getConversationList(function(ret, err) {
				var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret.result))
			 	if(ret.result.length){
			 		$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'), evalData(ret.result));
					api.parseTapmode();
			 	}else{
			 		xiaoxi = 0;
			 		$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'),'<div id="jiazai" style="padding-top: 50%;"><img style="width: 5rem !important; height:  auto !important;" src="../../image/2019/wu.png" /><p>暂无消息</p></div>');
			 	}
			})
		}
		function dateStr(date){
		    var time=new Date().getTime();
		    time=parseInt((time-date*1000)/1000);
		    var s;
		    if(time<60*10){
		        return '刚刚';
		    }else if((time<60*60)&&(time>=60*10)){
		        s = Math.floor(time/60);
		        return  s+"分钟前";
		    }else if((time<60*60*24)&&(time>=60*60)){ 
		        s = Math.floor(time/60/60);
		        return  s+"小时前";
		    }else if((time<60*60*24*3)&&(time>=60*60*24)){ 
		        s = Math.floor(time/60/60/24);
		        return s+"天前";
		    }else{ 
		        var date= new Date(parseInt(date) * 1000);
		        return date.getFullYear()+"/"+(date.getMonth()+1)+"/"+date.getDate();
		    }
		}
		function _extra(a){
			a =  eval('(' + a + ')');
			a.img = a.img ? a.img+'?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100/format/jpg' : '../../image/touxiang.png';
			return a;
		}
		function clearConversations(){
			rong.clearConversations({
			    conversationTypes: ['PRIVATE']
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(xiaoxi){
			 		$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'),'<div id="jiazai" style="padding-top: 50%;"><img style="width: 5rem !important; height:  auto !important;" src="../../image/2019/wu.png" /><p>暂无消息</p></div>');
					_msg('清空成功')
				}else{
					_msg('无消息')
				}
			})
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var indexs
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_heibai(1)
			var len=$api.domAll($api.dom('.fx-tab'), 'div.aui-tab-item');
			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < len.length; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = 'ScLs_' + i;
				frame.url = html_win + 'member/ScLs.html';
				frame.pageParam = {
					id : i,
				};
				frames.push(frame);
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'ScLs',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				bounces : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h,
					w : 'auto',
					h : api.winHeight - headerPos.h,
				},
				index : api.pageParam['index'],
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				indexs = ret.index;
				active(indexs)
			});
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index) {
			active(index)
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'ScLs',
				index : index,
				scroll : true, 
			});
		}
		function active(index) {
			$api.removeCls($api.dom(".fx-tab .aui-active"), 'aui-active');
			$api.addCls($api.byId('tab' + index), 'aui-active');
		}
		function add(){
			api.execScript({
				frameName: 'ScLs_'+indexs,
			    script: '_add()'
			});
		}
	</script>

		<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/fastclick.js"></script>
