		<script type="text/javascript">
			apiready = function() {
				console.log(JSON.stringify(api.pageParam))
				api.addEventListener({
				    name: 'yejian'
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if(ret){
						_yejians();
					}
				});
				FastClick.attach(document.body)
				$('#tijiao').click(function() {
					var username = $('#username').val();
					var code = $('#code').val();
					if (!username) {
						_msg('手机号码不能空')
						return;
					}
					if (!_isMobile(username)) {
						_msg('请输入正确手机号码')
						return;
					}
					if (!code) {
						_msg('手机验证码不能为空');
						return
					}
					var ret = api.pageParam;
					var data = {
							username : username,
							code:code, 
							img:ret.img,
							openid:ret.openid,
							nickname:ret.nickname,
							type:ret.type,
							info:ret
						}
					console.log(JSON.stringify(data));
					_loading();
					_ajax('api/user/oauth', function(ret, err) {
						console.log(JSON.stringify(ret));
						console.log(JSON.stringify(err));
							 _loadingCloes();
							if (ret.ret) {
								userinfo(ret.ret)
							} else {
								_msg(ret.err)
							}
						},data)
				})
			}
			function userinfo(token){
				_ajax('api/member/info', function(ret, err) {
					_loadingCloes()
						if (ret.ret) {
							_setPrefs('token', token);
							_setPrefs('user', ret.ret);
					    	api.sendEvent({
							    name: 'ext',
							    extra: {
							        key1: 'value1',
							    }
							});
							_alert('绑定成功',function(ret,err){
								_hone();
							})
						} else {
							_alert(ret.err)
						}
					}, {
						token : token
					})
			}
			var smsVerify
			function getVerify() {
				var mobileVal = $('#username').val();
				if (!mobileVal) {
					_msg('请输入手机号码')
					return false;
				}
				if (!_isMobile(mobileVal)) {
					_msg('请输入正确手机号码')
					return;
				}
				var status = $('#sendVerify').attr('status');
				if (status != 1) {
					return;
				}
				_loading();
				_ajax('api/index/code', function(ret, err) {
					_loadingCloes()
					if (ret) {
						if (ret.ret) {
							$("#sendVerify").html('<span id="GetVerify">120</span>S');
							times = 119;
							isinerval = setInterval("CountDown()", 1000);
							setTimeout(function() {
								_msg(ret.ret)
								$('#sendVerify').attr('status', '0');
							}, 500)
						} else {
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					} else {
						_msg(ret)
					}
				}, {
					username : mobileVal,
					text : '绑定'
				})
			}
			function CountDown() {
				if (times < 1) {
					var sendVerify = $('#sendVerify');
					$(sendVerify).attr('onclick', 'getVerify()');
					$(sendVerify).attr('status', '1');
					$(sendVerify).html('重新获取');
					clearInterval(isinerval);
					return;
				}
				var getVerify = $('#GetVerify');
				$(getVerify).html('' + times + '');
				times--;
			}
			function _isMobile(mobile) {
				if (mobile == "") {
					return false;
				} else {
					if (! /^0{0,1}(13[0-9]|15[0-9]|17[0-9]|18[0-9]|14[0-9])[0-9]{8}$/.test(mobile)) {
						return false;
					}
					return true;
				}
			}
		</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var app='';
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			app = _getPrefs('app');
			 view();
			api.getCacheSize(function(ret) {
				var clearCache = ret.size / 1024 / 1024;
				$api.html($api.dom('.clearCache'), clearCache.toFixed(2) + "MB")
			});
			_imageCache();
			api.parseTapmode();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function view(){
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData());
		}
		function touxiang() {
			api.actionSheet({
				title:'修改头像',
				cancelTitle : '取消',
				buttons : ['拍照','相册']
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.buttonIndex;
				if(index!=3){
					var sourceType='album'
					if(index==1){
						sourceType='camera'
					}
					api.getPicture({
					    sourceType: sourceType,
					    encodingType: 'jpg',
					    mediaValue: 'pic',
					    destinationType: 'url',
					    allowEdit: true,
					    quality: 50,
					    targetWidth: 800,
					    targetHeight: 800,
					}, function(ret, err) {
					    if (ret) {
					        if(ret.data){
					        	imgAjax(ret.data)
					        }
					    }
					});
				}
			});
		}
		function imgAjax(image){
			if(!image){
				_msg('图片地址出错')
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			api.ajax({
			    url: fx_url+'api/member/touxiang',
			    method: 'post',
			    data: {
			    	values:{
			    		token:_token,
			    	},
			        files: {
			            image: image
			        }
			    },
			}, function(ret, err) {
				_loadingCloes();
			    if (ret) {
			        if(ret.ret){
			        	$api.attr($api.dom('#fx-img img'), 'src', image);
			        	_userInfo();
			        	_msg('头像修改成功');
			        }
			    } else {
			        api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
			    }
			});
		}
		function nick() {
			api.prompt({
				title : '修改昵称',
				buttons : ['确定', '取消']
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.buttonIndex;
				var text = ret.text;
				if (text && index==1) {
					_ajax('api/member/nickname',function(ret,err){
						if(ret){
							if(ret.ret){
								_userInfo()
								$('#nickname').text(text)
								_msg(ret.ret)
							}else{
								_msg(ret.err)
							}
						}else{
							api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
						}
					},{nickname:text})
				}
			});
		}
		function qianming() {
			api.prompt({
				title : '修改个人签名',
				buttons : ['确定', '取消']
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.buttonIndex;
				var text = ret.text;
				if (text && index==1) {
					_ajax('api/member/qianming',function(ret,err){
						if(ret){
							if(ret.ret){
								_userInfo()
								$('#qianming').text(text)
								_msg(ret.ret)
							}else{
								_msg(ret.err)
							}
						}else{
							api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
						}
					},{text:text})
				}
			});
		}
		function clearCache() {
			_loading()
			api.clearCache(function() {
				_loadingCloes()
				$api.html($api.dom('.clearCache'), "0MB")
				_msg('清除完成')
			});
		}
		function banben() {
			_loading();
			_ajax('api/index/banben',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes();
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						api.confirm({
						    title: ret.ret,
						    msg: '是否跳转下载升级？',
						    buttons: ['升级', '不升级']
						}, function(rets, errs) {
						    var index = rets.buttonIndex;
						    if(index==1){
						    	_url({url:ret.url},'curl')
						    }
						});
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}
			},{banben:'0.0.1'})
		}
		function out(){
			api.confirm({
			    title: '退出确认',
			    msg: '退出当前账户，将不能同步收藏，发布评论和分享',
			    buttons: ['取消', '确定退出']
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
			    if(index==2){
			    	_uot();
			    	_msg('退出成功')
			    	setTimeout(function(){
			    		_close();
			    	},1000)
			    }
			});
		}
	</script>
</html>

<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>首页</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<style>
			.aui-list {
				border: 0px;
				background: none;
			}
			.aui-list .aui-list-item {
				margin: 0 0.7rem;
				padding: 0.4rem 0px;
			}
			.aui-img-round {
			}
			.aui-list .aui-list-item-inner {
				padding-right: 0px;
				margin-right: 5rem;
			}
			.aui-ellipsis-2 {
				-webkit-line-clamp: 1
			}
			.guanzhu {
				position: absolute;
				right: 0px;
				top: 1.3rem
			}
			.guanzhu i {
				font-size: 0.6rem !important;

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/member/guanzhuList/type/2', 1, 1);
			})
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/member/guanzhuList/type/2', pagenum);
				}
			});
		}
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('yiguanzhu')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('yiguanzhu');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} 
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/fastclick.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var add=0; 
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/member/shoucangList/type/'+api.pageParam['id'], 1, 1);			
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/member/shoucangList/type/'+api.pageParam['id'], pagenum);
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		};
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('fx-weitoutiao-guanzhuHivdeo')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('fx-weitoutiao-guanzhuHivdeo');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} 
		}
		function pingZan_xia(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud aui-margin-r-5"></i> ' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/zancai/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid,type:1})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function img(id){
			if(add==0){
				_url({id:id},'view_win')
			}else{
			}
		}
		function urlsa(data,asdasd){
			if(add==0){
				_url(data,asdasd)
			}else{
				var adds=$('#add'+data.id)
				if (adds.prop('checked')) {
					adds.prop("checked", false);
				}else{
					adds.prop("checked", true);
				}
				deltongji()
			}
		}
		function deltongji(){
			var result = new Array();
			$(".sx-radio .aui-radio").each(function(){
				if($(this).prop('checked')){
					result.push($(this).attr("value"));
				}
			});
			if(result.length){
				$('#del .aui-pull-right').html('<span>删除('+result.length+')</span>');
			}else{
				$('#del .aui-pull-right').text('删除');
			}
			return result.join(",");
		}
		function _add(){
			add=1
			$('.sx-radio .aui-radio').show();
			$('.sx-radio .aui-list-item-inner').css("margin-left","80px")
			$('.sx-radio .fx-video-content').css("margin-left","80px")
			$('.sx-radio #sx-radio-right').css("margin-left","80px")
			$('#del').show()
		}
		function _addDel(){
			add=0
			$('.sx-radio .aui-radio').hide();
			$('.sx-radio .aui-list-item-inner').removeAttr('style')
			$('.sx-radio .fx-video-content').removeAttr('style');
			$('.sx-radio #sx-radio-right').removeAttr("style")
			$('#del').hide()
		}
		function ajaxdel(){
			_ajax('api/member/sclsDel',function(ret,err){
				_msg('删除成功')
				_addDel()
				api.refreshHeaderLoading();
			},{id:deltongji(),type:api.pageParam['id']})
		}
		function urlsaweix(a,b,c){
			if(add==0){
				_url({id:a,videoUrl:b,title:c},'videoView_win')
			}else{
			}
		}
		function pingZan_xias(_this,a,b){
			if(add==0){
				pingZan_xia(_this,a,b)
			}else{
			}
		}
		function radio(id){
			if(add!=0){
				var adds=$('#add'+id)
				if (adds.prop('checked')) {
					adds.prop("checked", false);
				}else{
					adds.prop("checked", true);
				}
				deltongji()
			}
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_heibai(1) 
			var len=$api.domAll($api.dom('.fx-tab'), 'div.aui-tab-item');
			var frames = [];
			var framesUrl={0:'gz',1:'fs',2:'fk'}
			for (var i = 0; i < len.length; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = 'GzFsFk_' + i;
				frame.url = html_win + 'member/'+framesUrl[i]+'.html';
				frame.pageParam = {
					id : 0,
				};
				frames.push(frame);
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'GzFsFk',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				bounces : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h,
					w : 'auto',
					h : api.winHeight - headerPos.h,
				},
				index : api.pageParam['index'],
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.index;
				active(index)
			});
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index) {
			active(index)
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'GzFsFk',
				index : index,
				scroll : true, 
			});
		}
		function active(index) {
			$api.removeCls($api.dom(".fx-tab .aui-active"), 'aui-active');
			$api.addCls($api.byId('tab' + index), 'aui-active');
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/fastclick.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_uot();
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			$('.URLwai div').click(function() {
				_loading()
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				_loginTyle(id)
			})
			if(!_getPrefs('app')){
				$('.fx-yijiandengl').removeAttr('style')
			}
		}
		function xuan(job, type) {
			$('.fx-top .aui-row div').removeClass('chait');
			$(job).addClass('chait');
			if (type == 2) {
				$('#login-1').hide();
				$('#login-2').show();
				$('#shuoming').hide();
			} else {
				$('#login-1').show();
				$('#login-2').hide();
				$('#shuoming').show();
			}
		}
		function login() {
			var type = $('.fx-top .aui-row div.chait').data('id')
			type = 1
			if (type == 1) {
				var username = $('#login-1 #mobile input').val();
				var password = $('#login-1 #yzm input').val();
				if (!_isMobile(username)) {
					_msg('手机号码不正确！')
					return;
				}
				if (!yzm) {
					_msg('请输入验证码！')
					return;
				}
			} else {
				var username = $('#login-2 #mobile input').val();
				var password = $('#login-2 #yzm input').val();
				if (!_isMobile(username)) {
					_msg('手机号码不正确！')
					return;
				}
				if (!pwa) {
					_msg('请输入密码！')
					return;
				}
			}
			_loading()
			_ajax('api/user/login', function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.ret) {
					console.info("ret:" + JSON.stringify(ret))
					_ajax('api/member/info', function(rets, errs) {
						console.info("ret:" + JSON.stringify(rets))
						console.info("err:" + JSON.stringify(errs))
						if (rets.ret) {
							_loadingCloes()
							_setPrefs('token', ret.ret);
							_setPrefs('user', rets.ret);
							api.execScript({
							    name: 'root',
							    frameName: 'ffxiang_win',
							    script: 'rongyun_init()'
							});
					    	_msg('登录成功')
					    	api.sendEvent({
							    name: 'ext',
							    extra: {
							        key1: 'value1',
							    }
							});
					    	setTimeout(function(){
					    		_hone()
					    	},1000)
						} else {
							_loadingCloes()
							_msg(rets.err)
						}
					}, {
						token : ret.ret
					})
				} else {
					_loadingCloes()
					_msg(ret.err)
				}
			}, {
				username : username,
				password : password
			})
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var body_h;
		var headerPos;
		var typeid;
		var NVNavigationBar;
		var retindex=0
		var heiff = 35;
		var activity
		var likaitime=60000;
		var time;
		var mnPopups;
		var typeid_keyback=false
		var rong
		apiready = function() {
			aMapLBS = api.require('aMapLBS');
			aMapLBS.configManager({
			    accuracy: 'hundredMeters',
			    filter: 1
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if (ret.status) {
			    }else{
			    	alert('定位初始失败，请联系管理员！');
			    }
			});
			_init();
			mnPopups = api.require('MNPopups');
			NVNavigationBar = api.require('NVNavigationBar');
			if(!_getPrefs('yindaotu')){
				_openFrame('yindaotu')
			}else{
				dat()
			}
			_daily({name:'money_login'})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				userImg()
				_heibai();
				api.setFullScreen({
				    fullScreen: false
				});
				_daily({name:'money_login'})
				typeid_keyback = false;
			});
			_heibai();
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'smartupdatefinish'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				alert('APP自动修复完成，需要重启APP才能生效');
				api.rebootApp();
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			_gengxin()
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'pause'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				time = Date.parse(new Date());
				time = time + likaitime
				_setPrefs('time', time);
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'resume'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				time = Date.parse(new Date());
				cityNews(1)
				if (_getPrefs('time')) {
					if (time > _getPrefs('time')) {
						ad()
					}
				}
			});
			rong = api.require('rongCloud2');
			if(_getPrefs('user')){
				rongyun_init();
			}
		}
		function rongyun_init(){
			rong.init(function(ret, err) {
				if(ret.status == 'success'){
					rong_token();
				}else if (ret.status == 'error') {
					console.log('初始化错误：' + JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			});
		}
		function rong_connect(tokens){
			if(!tokens){
				alert("tokens不能为空");
				return
			}
			rong.connect({
				token : tokens
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret.status == 'success'){
				}else{
					console.log('获取用户失败:'+JSON.stringify(err));
					return console.log(_cuowu(err.code))
				}
			});
		}
		function rong_token(){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				console.log('用户未登录，无法设置融云设置 connect')
				return;
			}
			api.execScript({
				script: 'bindAliasAndTags()'
			});
			_ajax('api/rong/token',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.token){
						_setPrefs('rong_token', ret);
						rong_connect(ret.token)
					}else{
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
		function index_uot(){
				_removePrefs('token')
					_removePrefs('user')
					_removePrefs('rong_token')
					_user = ''
					_token = '';
			rong.logout(function(ret, err) {
				if(ret.status=='success'){
					console.log('融云注销成功')
				}else{
					console.log('融云注销失败')
				}
			}); 
		}
		function _cuowu(msg){
			if(msg == '-10002'){
				return ('输入参数错误，错误码：' + msg)
			}
			switch(msg) {
				case '30014':
					return ('发送处理失败，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '30003':
					return ('服务器超时，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '31009':
					return ('用户被屏蔽，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '-10000':
					return ('未调用 init 方法进行初始化，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '-10001':
					return ('未调用 connect 方法进行连接，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				case '-10002':
					return ('输入参数错误，错误码：' + msg)
					break;
				default:
					return ('用户在黑名单中，错误码：' + msg);
			}
		}
		function view() {
			header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			body_h = $api.offset($api.dom('body')).h;
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('fx-footer'))
			footerh = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			footerh = footerh - 5
				var ret = _typeid_data_get();
				_shangjia()
				config();
				if (ret) {
					api.closeFrame({
						name : 'error'
					});
					typeid = ret.typeid
					type_Info(ret.data,typeid)
				} else {
					api.openFrame({
						name : 'error',
						url : html_win + 'error.html',
						bounces : false,
						rect : {
							x : 0,
							y : 0,
							w : 'auto',
							h : 'auto'
						},
						useWKWebView : true,
						historyGestureEnabled : true,
						vScrollBarEnabled : false,
						hScrollBarEnabled : false,
					})
				}
		 		userImg()
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames,typeid) {
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'ffxiang_frm',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h + heiff - 35,
					w : 'auto',
					h : body_h - headerPos.h - heiff + 30 - footerh,
				},
				index : 1,
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
				NVNavigationBar.setSelected({
					id : 'first',
					index : ret.index,
					selected : true
				});
				retindex = typeid[ret.index]
			});
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index,typeid) {
			if(typeid[index]==retindex){
				shuaxin()
				return;
			}
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'ffxiang_frm',
				index : index,
				scroll : true,	
			});
		}
		function _user() {
			api.sendEvent({
				name : 'ffxiangUser',
				extra : {
					user : _getPrefs('user'),
				}
			});
		}
		function search() {
			api.openWin({
				name : 'search_win',
				url : html_win+'search_win.html',
				slidBackEnabled : false,
				animation : {
					type : "fade", 
					subType : "from_right", 
					duration : 300
				},
				pageParam : {
					qian : 1,
					fan : 0
				}
			});
		}
		function UILoadings() {
			var loading = new Array;
			for (var i = 0; i < 39; i++) {
				loading[i] = {
					frame : 'widget:
				};
			}
			UILoading = api.require('UILoading');
			UILoading.keyFrame({
				rect : {
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : api.winHeight
				},
				styles : {
					bg : '#fff',
					corner : 0,
					interval : 39,
					frame : {
						w : 247,
						h : 271
					}
				},
				content : loading,
				mask : '#fff'
			}, function(ret) {
			});
		}
		function UILoadingClose() {
			UILoading.closeKeyFrame();
		}
		function yejian() {
			api.sendEvent({
				name : 'yejian',
				extra : {
					yejian : '1',
				}
			});
		}
		function cityAjax(){
			aMapLBS.singleLocation({
			    timeout: 10
			}, function(ret, err) {
					var a = ret;
			    if (ret) {
			    	if(ret.status){
			    		_ajax('api/index/cityDingwei',function(ret,err){
			        		if(ret){
			        			if(ret.ret){
				        			ret=ret.ret
				        			_setPrefs('city', encodeURIComponent(encodeURIComponent(ret)));
				        			cityNews(1);
			        			}else{
			        				console.log("cityDingwei_err1："+JSON.stringify(ret));
											alert("cityDingwei_err1："+JSON.stringify(a)+" : "+JSON.stringify(ret))
			        			}
			        		}else{
			        			console.log("cityDingwei_err2："+JSON.stringify(err));
										alert("cityDingwei_err2："+JSON.stringify(err))
			        		}
			        	},{latitude:ret.lat,longitude:ret.lon})
			    	}else{
							alert("定位失败："+JSON.stringify(ret))
						}
			    }else{
			    	alert("定位err："+JSON.stringify(err));
			    }
			});
			return;
			var city = decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(_getPrefs('city')));
			api.ajax({
			    url: 'https:
			    method: 'get',
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if (ret) {
			    	_setPrefs('tianqi',ret);
			        if(ret.city){
			        	var ret = encodeURIComponent(encodeURIComponent(ret.city));
						_setPrefs('city',ret);
						updateItem(ret.city);
						return;
			        }
			    } else {
			        console.log(JSON.stringify(err))
			    }
			});
		}
		function updateItem(ret){
			ret = ret ? ret : decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(_getPrefs('city')));
			if(!ret || ret==""){
				return;
			}
			if(ret == 'undefined'){
				ret='本地'
			}
			var w=typeidstrlen(ret);
			NVNavigationBar.updateItem({
					id: 'first',
					index: 2,
					item:{
						title:ret,
						bgSelected:'#fff',
						bg:'#fff',
						size:{
							w:w,
							h:heiff
						}
					}
			});
		}
		function cityNews(ren){
			var city = decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(_getPrefs('city')));
			var url = 'https:
			var url = 'https:
			api.ajax({
					url: url+(city ? city : ''),
					method: 'get',
			}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret) {
						_setPrefs('tianqi',ret);
					}
					updateItem();
				api.execScript({
					frameName:'frame_888888888',
					script: 'cityNews()'
				});
				if(ren){
					return;
				}
				NVNavigationBar.setSelected({
					id : 'first',
					index : 2,
					selected : true
				});
			});
		}
		function typeidstrlen(str){
			if(str.length < 3){
				return 50;
			}
		    var len = 0;
		    for (var i=0; i<str.length; i++) {
		     var c = str.charCodeAt(i);
		     if ((c >= 0x0001 && c <= 0x007e) || (0xff60<=c && c<=0xff9f)) {
		       len++;
		     }
		     else {
		      len+=3;
		     }
		    }
		    return Math.ceil(len*8.3333333);
		}
		function ad(){
return;
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				return;
			}
			if(_getPrefs('ad') && _getPrefs('adimage')){
				api.openWin({
					name : 'ad',
					url : html_win+'ad.html',
					reload:true,
					bounces:false,
					animation:{
						type:"none",                
						subType:"from_bottom",       
						duration:300
					},
				});
			}else{
				adAjax()
			}
		}
		function adAjax(){
			_ajax('api/article/ad',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret.data){
						_setPrefs('ad', ret.ret);
						api.imageCache({
							url : fx_cdn + ret.ret.data.img+'?imageView2/1/w/'+api.winWidth+'/h/'+api.winHeight+'/format/jpg',
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								if (ret.status) {
									_setPrefs('adimage', ret.url);
								}else{
								}
							}else{
								console.log('缓存失败'+JSON.stringify(err));
							}
						});
						return;
					}else{
						console.log('没有获取到哦')
					}
				}else{
					console.log(JSON.stringify(ret));
				}
				_removePrefs('ad')
				_removePrefs('adimage')
			})
		}
		function config(){
			_ajax('api/article/config',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					_setPrefs('config', ret);
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			})
		}
		function _shangjia(){
			_ajax('api/index/pingguoApp',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					_setPrefs('app', '1');
				}else{
					_removePrefs('app')
				}
			})
		}
		function _userInfo(){
			_user=_getPrefs('user')
			if(!_user){
				return;
			}
			_ajax('api/member/info', function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					_setPrefs('user', ret.ret);
				}
			})
		}
		function dat(){
			UILoadings()
			view();
			ad()
		}
		function userImg(){
			return;
			var user=_getPrefs('user');
			if(user){
				$api.css($api.dom('.user1'),"display: block");
				$api.css($api.dom('.user2'),"display: none");
				$api.attr($api.dom('.sx-user-img'),"src",user.img);
			}else{
				$api.css($api.dom('.user1'),"display: none");
				$api.css($api.dom('.user2'),"display: block");
			}
		}
		function shuaxin(){
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.aui-active img'),'Rotation')
			api.execScript({
				frameName:'frame_'+retindex,
				script: 'shuaxin()'
			});
		}
		function typeid_add(y) {
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'typeid_add',
				url : html_win + 'typeid_add.html',
				bounces : false,
				rect : {
					x : api.winWidth - 80,
					y : headerPos.h  - heiff-1,
					w :80,
					h : heiff-1,
				},
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				animation:{
					type:"none",                
				    subType:"from_right",       
				    duration:300
				},
				pageParam:{
					h:headerPos.h
				}
			})
		}
		function type_Info(a,typeid){
			NVNavigationBar.open({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h - 36,
					w : api.frameWidth,
					h : heiff
				},
				styles : {
					orientation : 'horizontal',
					bg : '#fff',
					bgAlpha : 1,
					font : {
						size : 17,
						sizeSelected : 18,
						color : '#222222',
						colorSelected : '#F85959',
						alpha : 1
					},
					itemSize : {
						w : 50,
						h : heiff
					},
					bounces:true,
				},
				items : a,
				selectedIndex : 0,
				fixedOn : api.frameName,
				id : 'first',
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.eventType == 'click') {
					randomSwitchBtn(ret.index,typeid)
				}
				if(ret.eventType=='show'){
					typeid_add(headerPos.h - 36)
					UILoadingClose()
					if(_getPrefs('tianqi')){
						cityAjax()
					}else{
						cityAjax()
					}
				}
			});
			api.closeFrameGroup({
			    name: 'ffxiang_frm'
			});
			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < typeid.length; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = 'frame_' + typeid[i];
				if(typeid[i] == 777777777){
					frame.url = html_win + 'zhibo/index.html';
				}else{
					frame.url = html_win + 'ffxiang_frm.html';
				}
				frame.pageParam = {
					id : typeid[i],
				};
				frames.push(frame);
				frames.useWKWebView = true;
				frames.historyGestureEnabled = true;
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames,typeid);
			api.parseTapmode();
		}
		function typeDataAdd(){
			var a = _getPrefs('typeid_get');
			type_Info(a.data,a.typeid)
			return;
			NVNavigationBar.update({
			    id: 'first',
			    items:a
			}, function(ret) {
			    alert(JSON.stringify(ret));
			});
		}
		function keyback(){
			if(!typeid_keyback){
				_close()
			}else{
				api.closeFrame({name:'typeid_add_info'});
				typeid_keyback_false();
			}
		}
		function typeid_keyback_true(){
			typeid_keyback=true;
		}
		function typeid_keyback_false(){
			typeid_keyback=false;
		}
	</script>
</html>
<!doctype html>
<html>
<head>
	<meta charset="utf-8">
	<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0" />
	<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
	<title>首页</title>

			background-color: #000;

			outline: 0;*/

<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	var oxPlayer, di_data, video_index_i, video_index_p, video_index_xh, ad_list_video, _root = 1,uid,
		systemType,video_url_ajax;
		var page = 2;
	var list_data = [];
	apiready = function() {
		_user = _getPrefs('user')
		timestamp = Date.parse(new Date());
		MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
		timestamp=timestamp/1000
		video_url_ajax = 'api/article/lists/mychannel/4/ids/'+api.pageParam['data']['id']+'/timestamp/'+timestamp
		systemType = api.systemType;
		video_index_i = video_index_xh = 0;
		video_index_p = 1;
		oxPlayer = api.require('oxPlayer');
		oxPlayer.addEventListener(function(ret, err) {
				switch (ret.code) {
					case 0:
						_close();
						break;
					case 1:
						break;
					case 2:
						break;
					case 4:
						page ++;
						video_url_ajax = 'api/article/lists/mychannel/4/ids/'+api.pageParam['data']['id']+'/timestamp/'+timestamp+'/?page='+page
						data_ajax();
						break;
					case 5:
						video_index_xh = ret.index;
						video_index_i++;
						di_data = list_data[video_index_xh];
						_ajax('api/article/clickAjax/id/'+di_data.id);
						break;
					case 6:
						if(pingAdd_dakai == 1){
							pingAdd_dakai = 0;
							pingHide();
						}
						break;
					case 7:
						console.log('7')
						if(pingAdd_dakai == 1){
							pingAdd_dakai = 0;
							pingHide();
						}
						break;
					case 8:
						break;
					case 10:
						break;
					case 99990:
						_url({id:ret.userInfo.uid},'u_win')
						break;
					case 3:
						var userInfo = ret.userInfo;
						userInfo.isLike = true;
						userInfo.likeNum = userInfo.likeNum + 1;
						oxPlayer.updateUserInfo({
							vid: ret.vid,
							userInfo: userInfo
						});
						_zan(ret.vid,'',true);
						_zd();
						break;
					case 99991:
						if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
							return _login();
						}
						console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
						var userInfo = ret.userInfo;
						if (ret.isLike) {
							_zd();
							userInfo.isLike = ret.isLike;
							userInfo.likeNum = userInfo.likeNum+1;
						} else {
							userInfo.isLike = ret.isLike;
							userInfo.likeNum = userInfo.likeNum-1;
						}
						oxPlayer.updateUserInfo({
							vid: ret.vid,
							userInfo: userInfo
						});
						_zan(ret.vid);
						break;
					case 99992:
						_ping(ret.vid, ret.userInfo.commentNum, true);
						break;
					case 99993:
						fenxiang();
						break;
					case 99994:
						break;
					case 27:
						console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
						pingAdd();
						break;
					default:
				}
			});
		data_ajax();
		inputField = api.require('inputField');
		inputField.setInputFieldListener(function(ret, err) {
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'viewappear'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			isPlaying(true);
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'viewdisappear'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			isPlaying();
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'pause'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			isPlaying();
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'resume'
		}, function(ret, err) {
		});
	};
	var video_url_ajaxs;
	function data_ajax() {
		video_url_ajaxs = video_url_ajax;
		_ajax(video_url_ajaxs, function(ret, err) {
			if (ret) {
				var data = [];
				if(video_index_i){
					ret = ret.data;
					if (ret) {
						for (var i = 0; i < ret.length; i++) {
							var a = find(ret[i]);
							if(a){
								data.push(a);
								list_data.push(ret[i]);
							}
						}
					}
					oxPlayer.addDataAfter({styles: find_style(),data:data});
				}else{
					if (api.pageParam['data']) {
						data.push(find(api.pageParam['data']));
						list_data.push(api.pageParam['data']);
					}
					ret = ret.data;
					if (ret) {
						for (var i = 0; i < ret.length; i++) {
							var a = find(ret[i]);
							if(a){
								data.push(a);
								list_data.push(ret[i]);
							}
						}
					}
					var marginBottom = api.safeArea.bottom;
					if(api.winName == 'root'){
						marginBottom = marginBottom + 56;
					}else{
						marginBottom = marginBottom + 5
					}
					var dbPlay = {
						fixedOn: api.frameName,
						rect: {
							x: 0,
							y: 0,
							w: 'auto',
							h: 'auto'
						},
						fixed: true,
						index: 0,
						event: 'MyClickEvent', 
						openCache: true,
						rightSlide: false,
						leftSlide:false,
						showBack: true, 
						showDoubleClick: true, 
						marginBottom: marginBottom, 
						backgroundColor: '#000000',
						backgroundHolder:_image + 'load-svideo.png',
						downFresh:false,
	        	upFresh:false,
						data: data
					};
					oxPlayer.dbPlay(dbPlay);
					_root = 0;
				}
			}
		})
	}
	function find(ret) {
		var a = {};
		a.vid = ret.id;
		if(ret.mychannel == 99){
			return;
		}
		a.title = "@" + ret.user.username + "\r\n\r\n" + ret.title;
		a.thumb = ret.image;
		a.url = ret.video;
		var b = {};
		b.uid = ret.uid;
		b.userName = ret.user.username;
		b.avatar = ret.user ? (ret.user.img ? _img(ret.user.img, 100, 100) : _image + 'touxiang.png') : _image + 'touxiang.png';
		b.isFocus = false;
		b.likeNum = ret.zan;
		b.isLike = ret.zanUser ? true : false;
		b.commentNum = ret.pingNum;
		b.shareNum = 0;
		a.userInfo = b;
		var b = {};
		b.musicId = ret.uid;
		b.musicName = ret.user.username;
		b.musicIcon = ret.user ? (ret.user.img ? _img(ret.user.img, 100, 100) : _image + 'touxiang.png') : _image + 'touxiang.png';
		a.music = b;
		a.styles = find_style()
		return a;
	}
	function find_ad_style(){
		var a = {vid: di_data.ad.id,type:'like',hidden:true,code:99991,scroll:true,num:{hidden:false}};
		oxPlayer.updateComponent({vid:di_data.ad.id,component:a});
		var a = {vid: di_data.ad.id,type:'comment',hidden:true,code:99992,scroll:true};
		oxPlayer.updateComponent({vid:di_data.ad.id,component:a});
		var a = {vid: di_data.ad.id,type:'avatar',hidden:true,code:99990,scroll:true};
		oxPlayer.updateComponent({vid:di_data.ad.id,component:a});
		var a = {vid: di_data.ad.id,type:'share',hidden:true,code:99993,scroll:true};
		oxPlayer.updateComponent({vid:di_data.ad.id,component:a});
		var a = {vid: di_data.ad.id,type:'focus',hidden:true,code:99994,scroll:true};
		oxPlayer.updateComponent({vid:di_data.ad.id,component:a});
	}
	function find_style() {
		var h = api.winHeight;
		var w = api.winWidth;
		var music, share, comment, like, avatar, focus, title, userName, musicName, hoverText, component = {};
		var x = w - (systemType == 'ios' ? 50 : 50);
		var y = h - 430 - api.safeArea.bottom;
		if(api.winName != 'root'){
			y = y + 60
		}
		var y_r = 85;
		var w_s = 40;
		var h_s = 40;
		var zan_r = 12;
		var num_ico = systemType == 'ios' ? 35 : 40;
		avatar = {
			type: 'avatar',
			x: x - (zan_r / 2),
			y: y,
			w: w_s + zan_r,
			h: h_s + zan_r,
			pic: '',
			radius: 25,
			border:1,
			borderColor: '#FFFFFF',
			hidden: false,
			code: 99990,
		}; 
		var focus_w = systemType == 'ios' ? 33 : 30;
		focus = {
			type: 'focus',
			x: x + (systemType == 'ios' ? 4 : 5),
			y: y + (systemType == 'ios' ? 35 : 35),
			w: focus_w,
			h: focus_w,
			pic: '',
			hidden: false,
			code: 99994,
		}; 
		y = y + y_r;
		like = {
			type: 'like',
			x: x - (systemType == 'ios' ? 0 : 5),
			y: y,
			w: w_s + (systemType == 'ios' ? 0 : 10),
			h: h_s + (systemType == 'ios' ? 0 : 10),
			hidden: false,
			code: 99991,
			num: {
				hidden: false,
				textColor: '#FFFFFF',
				textSize: 14,
				x: x - (systemType == 'ios' ? 0 : 5),
				y: y + num_ico + (systemType == 'ios' ? -5 : +5),
				w: w_s + (systemType == 'ios' ? 0 : 10),
				h: h_s + (systemType == 'ios' ? 0 : 10),
			}
		}; 
		y = y + y_r;
		comment = {
			type: 'comment',
			x: x,
			y: y,
			w: w_s,
			h: h_s,
			hidden: false,
			code: 99992,
			num: {
				hidden: false,
				textColor: '#FFFFFF',
				textSize: 14,
				x: x,
				y: y + num_ico,
				w: w_s,
				h: h_s - (systemType == 'ios' ? 10 : 0),
			}
		}; 
		y = y + y_r;
		share = {
			type: 'share',
			x: x,
			y: y,
			w: w_s,
			h: h_s,
			hidden: false,
			code: 99993,
		}; 
		if (time_jinbi) {
			_right_h = y;
		}
		userName = {};
		y = h - 220 - api.safeArea.bottom;
		if(api.winName == 'root'){
		}else{
			y = y + 60;
		}
		x = 0;
		w = w - 50
		if (systemType == 'ios') {
			y = y + 20;
			x = x + 15;
			w = w - 30;
		}
		title = {
			type: 'title',
			x: x,
			y: y,
			w: w,
			h: systemType == 'ios' ? 120 : 150,
			textSize: 16,
			textColor: '#FFFFFF',
			hidden: false,
			code:99995
		}; 
		music = {}; 
		musicName = {}; 
		hoverText = {}; 
		component = {
        type: 'component',
        x: 0,
        y: h - 45,
        w: api.winWidth,
        h: 40,
        rect: {
            x: 10,
            y: 10,
            w: 20,
            h: 20
        },
        radius: 3,
        backgroundColor: '#000000',
        alpha: 0.1,
        border: 0,
        borderColor: '#01000000',
        text: '说点什么',
        textSize: 14,
        textColor: '#C0FF3E',
        alignment: 0,
        processColor: '#FF0000',
        processValue: 0,
        scroll: true,
        code: 27,
        hidden: false
    }; 
		var styles = [music, share, comment, like, avatar, focus, title, userName, musicName, hoverText, component];
		return styles;
	}
	function isPlaying(a) {
		if (!a) {
			oxPlayer.pause();
		} else {
			oxPlayer.start();
		}
	}
	var time_jinbi = true;
	function yuandu() {
		return alert('关了')
		if (_config.config.app == 1) {
			return;
		} else if (api.winName != 'root') {
			return;
		} else if (!_getPrefs('_config').time_show) {
			return;
		}
		_ajax('renwu/time_jinbi', function(ret, err) {
			if (ret) {
				time_jinbi = false;
				if (ret.ret) {
					url = 'time';
					api.openFrame({
						name: url,
						url: _h_w + url + '.html',
						rect: {
							x: api.winWidth - 65,
							y: api.winHeight - _right_h,
							w: 58,
							h: 168,
						},
						bgColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
					})
					setTimeout(function() {
						if (_is_video()) {
							api.execScript({
								frameName: 'time',
								script: 't(' + true + ');'
							});
						} else if (di_data && di_data.money) {
							api.execScript({
								frameName: 'time',
								script: 't(' + true + ');'
							});
						}
					}, 1000)
				} else {
					return;
				}
			} else {
				_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
			}
		})
	}
	function fufei() {
		if(!_getPrefs('user')){
			return _login();
		}
		_loading('正在请求');
		_ajax('member/video_money', function(ret, err) {
			_loadingCloes();
			if (ret) {
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
				if (ret.ret) {
					_suxiangw_msg2({
						rightTitle: '立刻观看视频',
					}, function(ret) {
						if (ret.eventType == 'right') {
							di_data.money = 0;
							data_ajax();
							api.closeFrame({
								name: 'isPlaying'
							});
						}
						dialogBox.close({
							dialogName: 'alert'
						});
					});
				} else {
					_suxiangw_msg({content:ret.err,rightTitle:'立即充值',url:"_url({url: 'zhibo_view_frm_chongzhi',title: '充值'})"})
				}
			}else{
				_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
			}
		}, {
			vid: di_data.id
		})
	}
	function goumai(){
		if (_config.config.app == 1) {
			return;
		}
		url = 'a'
		api.openFrame({
			name: url,
			url: _h_w + url + '.html',
			rect: {
				x: 0,
				y: api.winHeight / 2,
				w: 120,
				h: 30,
			},
			bgColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
		})
	}
	function _img(url, w, h, video) {
	    if (w) {
	        w = Math.round(w);
	    }
	    if (h) {
	        h = Math.round(h);
	    }
	    h = h ? h : w;
	    var a = url + (video ? '?vframe/jpg/offset/0/w/' + w + '/h/' + h + '/format/jpg' : '?imageView2/1/w/' + w + '/h/' + h + '/format/jpg');
	    return a;
	}
	function _zan(vid){
		_ajax('api/member/zan_s',function(ret,err){
			console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
			api.execScript({
			    name: 'xiaoshipin_win',
			    script: 'shuaxin();'
			});
			if(ret){
				if(ret.err){
				}
			}else{
			}
		},{aid:vid,type:1})
	}
	function _ping(vid, num) {
	    if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
	        return _login();
	    }
      url = 't';
      api.openFrame({
          name: url,
          url: html_win + url + '.html',
          rect: {
              x: 0,
              y: 0,
              w: 'auto',
              h: 'auto'
          },
          pageParam: {
              frameName: 'xiaoshipin_ping_win'
          },
          bgColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
          animation: {
              type: "none", 
              subType: "from_bottom", 
              duration: 0
          },
      })
	    url = 'xiaoshipin_ping_win'
	    api.openFrame({
	        name: url,
	        url: html_win + url + '.html',
	        rect: {
	            x: 0,
	            y: api.winHeight / 3.5,
	            w: 'auto',
	            h: api.winHeight - (api.winHeight / 3.5),
	        },
	        bgColor: '#ffffff',
	        pageParam:di_data,
	        animation: {
	            type: "movein", 
	            subType: "from_bottom", 
	            duration: 300
	        },
	    })
	}
	function fenxiang(){
			data = di_data;
			fx_data=di_data
			fx_data={title:data.title,description:data.description,url:fx_url+"m/a/"+data.id+'.html',img:data.image+"?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100"}
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'},{icon: _image+'share/105.png',title: '举报'}];
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: 2,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        },
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						return;
					}
				}
			});
	}
	function _weixin(type,data) {
		var wx = api.require('wx');
		wx.shareWebpage({
			scene : type,
			title : data.title,
			description : data.content,
			thumb : data.img,
			contentUrl : data.url
		}, function(ret, err) {
			if (ret.status) {
				_msg('分享成功')
			}
		});
	}
	function _qq(type,data){
		var obj = api.require('qq');
		obj.shareNews({
			url : data.url,
			title : data.title,
			description : data.content,
			imgUrl : data.img,
			type : type,
		}, function(ret, err) {
			if (ret.status) {
				_msg('分享成功')
			}
		});
	}
	function _weibo(data) {
		var weibo = api.require('weibo');
		weibo.shareWebPage({
			text : data.title,
			title : data.title,
			description : data.content,
			thumb : data.img,
			contentUrl : data.url
		}, function(ret, err) {
			if (ret.status) {
				_msg('分享成功')
			}
		});
	}
	var pingAddPen = 1;
	var pingAdd_dakai = 0;	
	function pingAdd(username,pingId) {
		if(pingAdd_dakai == 1){
			return;
		}
		pingAdd_dakai = 1;
		if(!pingId){pingId=0}
		pingIds=pingId;
		if(!_user){
			_login();
			return;
		}
		if(username){
			username='回复   '+username+'：'
		}else{
			username='优质评论将会被优先展示';
		}
		if (pingAddPen == 1) {
			pingAddPen = 2;
			inputField.open({
				bgColor : '#fff',
				lineColor : '#D8D8D8',
				fileBgColor : '#f5f5f5',
				borderColor : '#F4F5F6',
				autoFocus : true,
				placeholder : username,
				placeholderStyles : {
					color : '#bbb', 
					size : 14, 
					marginL : 5 
				},
				maxLines : 3,
				sendBtn : {
					bg : '#03a9f4', 
					bgHighlight : '#0287BF', 
					title : '发送', 
					titleSize : '14', 
					titleColor : '#fff', 
					corner : 5 
				},
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.msg == '') {
						_msg('请输入评价');
					} else {
						pingAddTent(ret.msg);
						pingHide()
						inputField.resignFirstResponder();
					}
				} else {
				}
			});
		} else {
			inputField.setPlaceholder({
					placeholder: username
			});
			inputField.becomeFirstResponder(function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					setTimeout(function() {
						pingHide(1)
					}, 500)
				} else {
				}
			});
		}
	}
	function pingAddTent(text) {
		if(text){
			var html=''
			_ajax('api/member/ping',function(ret,err){
			console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
				api.pageParam['pingNum']++;
				api.execScript({
					name : 'xiaoshipin_win',
					frameName : 'xiaoshipin_ping',
					script : 'pingnum('+api.pageParam['pingNum']+')'
				});
			},{aid:di_data.id,content:text,pingId:pingIds})
			_msg('发布成功')
		}
	}
	function pingHide(a){
		if(a==1){
			inputField.show();
			inputField.becomeFirstResponder()
		}else{
			inputField.hide();
			inputField.resignFirstResponder();
		}
	}
</script>
</html>
<!doctype html>

		<section class="aui-content">
			<div class="div">
				<h1>邀请码怎么用？</h1>
				<p>1.通过分享邀请链接非朋友在线注册，或面对面扫描注册时自动绑定您邀请码，不需师徒要再手动输入。</p>
				<img src="../../image/yaoqing/about_1.png" />
				<p>1.若您的好友是通过手机应用商店搜索APP安装注册的，需登录后输入您的邀请码后才能成为您的徒弟。</p>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			 _init();
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			fx_data={
				title:_config.yaoqing.title,
				description:_config.yaoqing.content,
				img:_image+'logo.png',
				url:fx_url+'m/yaoqing/uid/'+_getPrefs('user').id
			}
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制链接'}];
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: 2,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        }, 
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title+fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} 
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content+fx_data.url,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else if(index==10){
						api.actionSheet({
						    cancelTitle: '取消',
						    destructiveTitle: '确认要删除吗？',
						}, function(ret, err) {
						    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
						 	if(index==1){
						 		_loading('正在删除')
						 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										_loadingCloes()
										if(ret.ret){
											var view = 'view();';
											api.execScript({
											    name: 'weitoutiao_win',
								    			frameName: 'weitoutiao',
											    script: view
											});
											_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
												_close(1)
											})
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}
								},{aid:article.id})
						 	}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type) {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				} 
			});
		}
		function _weibo() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
	</script>

	 			color: #ff5645;

	 			padding-top: 0.3rem;
	 		}
	 		/*签到样式*/
	 		.qiandao{
	 			background: url('../../image/yaoqing/task_hall_1.png') no-repeat;
	 			background-size: 100% 100%;
	 			width: 100%;
	 			position: relative;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao .qiandao_1{
	 			padding-top: 3.8rem;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao .qiandao_1 div:nth-child(1),.qiandao .qiandao_1 div:nth-child(3){
	 			background: rgba(216, 67, 54, .85);
	 			position: relative;
	 			color: #fff;
	 			text-align: center;
	 			padding: 0.25rem 0.7rem;
	 			font-size: 0.75rem;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao .qiandao_1 div:nth-child(1){
	 			border-top-right-radius:1rem;
	 			border-bottom-right-radius:1rem;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao .qiandao_1 div:nth-child(3){
	 			border-top-left-radius:1rem;
	 			border-bottom-left-radius:1rem;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao .qiandao_1 div:nth-child(2){
	 			background: url('../../image/yaoqing/task_hall_3.png') no-repeat;
	 			background-size: 100% 100%;
	 			width: 7rem;
	 			height: 7rem;
	 			text-align: center;
	 			color: #fff;
	 			line-height: 6.5rem;
	 			color: rgba(216, 67, 54, .85);
	 			font-size: 0.8rem;
	 			font-weight: bold;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao_2{
	 			overflow: hidden;
	 			position: relative;
	 			padding: 0.5rem;
	 			padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
	 			text-align: center;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao_2 .qiandao_2_1{
	 			background: #F6603F;
	 			border:1px solid #FF965D;
	 			border-radius: 50%;

	 			width: 2.2rem;

	 			line-height: 2.2rem;
	 		}

	 		}
	 		.qiandao_2 p{
	 			color: #D0021B;
	 			font-size: 0.8rem;
	 			padding-top: 0.2rem;
	 		}

	 			background: #DCDCDC;
	 			border: 1px solid #FF965D;
	 			line-height: 0.8rem;
	 			padding-top:0.3rem;
	 			color: #999999;
	 			font-size: 0.65rem;
	 		}

	 			font-size: 0.65rem;
	 			color: #DCDCDC;
	 			font-weight: bold;
	 		}
	 		.qiandao .qiandao_1 div.yiqiandao{
	 			background: url('../../image/yaoqing/task_hall_16.png') no-repeat;

	 			padding: 1.2rem;

	 			padding-top: 2.2rem;

	 		}

	 		}

	 		}

	 		}

	 		}
		</style>

		<div class="qiandao_chuang" >

		</div>
		<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
		<div class="qiandao">
			<div class="aui-card-list-footer qiandao_1">
				<div tapmode onclick="_url({url:'yaoqing/shouru',title:'我的收入'},'',true)">金币 :{{= _user.yaoqing.jinbi}}</div>
				{{? it.qiandao.code==1}}
				<div class="yiqiandao">{{= it.qiandao.lingqu}}</div>
				{{??}}
				<div Tapmode onclick="qiandaoAjax()" id="qiandao" class="">立即签到</div>
				{{?}}
				{{? !_getPrefs('app')}}
				<div tapmode onclick="_url({url:'about',id:'5',title:'如何赚钱'})">如何赚钱</div>
				{{?}}
			</div>
			<div class="aui-card-list-footer qiandao_2">
				{{ for(var i=0;i < it.config.qiandao.length; i++) { }}
				{{? i >= it.qiandao.tianshu}}
				<div id="{{= it.config.qiandao[i]}}">
					<div class="qiandao_2_1">
						<span>{{= it.config[it.config.qiandao[i]]}}</span>
						<img src="../../image/yaoqing/task_hall_4.png" />
					</div>
					<p>{{= i+1}}天</p>
				</div>
				{{??}}
				<div class="qiandao_2_0" id="{{= it.config.qiandao[i]}}">
					<div class="qiandao_2_1">
						已领<br>+{{= it.config[it.config.qiandao[i]]}}
					</div>
					<p>已领取</p>
				</div>
				{{?}}
				{{ } }}
			</div>
		</div>
		 {{? !_getPrefs('app')}}
			<div class="baoxiang">
				<div class="baoxiangTime">
					{{? it.baoxiang}}
					<div class="baoxiang_1">
						<p>距离打开宝箱还有</p>
						<b><i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-date"></i><span id="time">{{= miaotime(it.baoxiang)}}</span></b>
					</div>
					{{??}}
					<div class="baoxiang_1s" Tapmode onclick="baoxiangAjax()">
						<span>开启宝箱</span>
					</div>
					{{?}}
				</div>
				<div class="baoxiang_2">
					宝箱每{{= it.timeText}}开启1次
				</div>

					近期收徒越多，宝箱奖励金币就越多
				</div>
			</div>
        	<div class="aui-timeline">
			{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}	
			<div class="xiahuaxian">
            <div class="aui-timeline-item-header sx-header">
           		<img src="{{= it.data[i].img}}" />
           		{{= it.data[i].title}}
            </div>
			{{ for(var is=0,lens=it.data[i].data.length; is < lens; is++) { }}
            <div class="aui-timeline-item">
                <div class="aui-timeline-item-label sx-yuan"></div>
                <div class="aui-timeline-item-inner">
                    <div class="aui-card-list">
                        <div class="aui-card-list-header sx-asdasd" data-id="0">
                        	<span>{{= it.data[i].data[is].name}}</span>
                        	<span class="jiangli">
                        		{{= it.data[i].data[is].money}}
                        		<img src="../../image/yaoqing/renwu_jinbi.png" />
                        	</span>
                        	<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-down"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="aui-card-list-content-padded">
                        	{{? it.data[i].data[is].btn}}
                        	<div>{{= it.data[i].data[is].text}}</div>
                        	<div {{? it.data[i].data[is].btn=='已完成'}}class="yiwancheng"{{?}} onclick="{{= it.data[i].data[is].url}}">{{= it.data[i].data[is].btn}}</div>
                        	{{??}}
                        	{{= it.data[i].data[is].text}}
                        	{{?}}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            {{ } }}
            </div>
         	{{ } }}
         	</div>
         	{{?}}
		</script>  
    	<section class="aui-content" id="fx-view"><div id="jiazai"><img src="../../image/loading_more.gif" /></div></section>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/fastclick.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var times=0,sx,fx_data
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
			$('.aui-media-list').hide();
			$('.qiandao_chuang_huan').hide();
			}
			view()
		}
		function view(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/renwu',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
					$api.html($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData(ret));
					$('.fenxiang_text p').html(ret.config.baoxiang_fenxiang);
					sx=ret
					qiandaoList()
					if(ret.baoxiang){
						times=ret.baoxiang
						countDown();
					}
					api.parseTapmode();
					data();
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
		function data(){
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
			$('.aui-card-list .sx-asdasd').click(function(){
				var _this=$(this)
				var data=_this.data('id');
				if(data==0){
					_this.data('id',1);
					_this.children('i').removeClass('aui-icon-down');
					_this.children('i').addClass('aui-icon-top');
				}else{
					_this.data('id',0);
					_this.children('i').removeClass('aui-icon-top');
					_this.children('i').addClass('aui-icon-down');
				}
				_this.next().toggle(); 
			})
		}
		function countDown(){
		  var timer=null;
		  timer=setInterval(function(){
		  	 times--;
		    var day=0,
		      hour=0,
		      minute=0,
		      second=0;
		    if(times > 0){
		      day = Math.floor(times / (60 * 60 * 24));
		      hour = Math.floor(times / (60 * 60)) - (day * 24);
		      minute = Math.floor(times / 60) - (day * 24 * 60) - (hour * 60);
		      second = Math.floor(times) - (day * 24 * 60 * 60) - (hour * 60 * 60) - (minute * 60);
		    }
		    if (day <= 9) day = '0' + day;
		    if (hour <= 9) hour = '0' + hour;
		    if (minute <= 9) minute = '0' + minute;
		    if (second <= 9) second = '0' + second;
		    $api.text($api.dom('#time'),hour+":"+minute+":"+second)
		    if(times<0){
		      clearInterval(timer);
		      baoxiangBtn(1)
		    }
		  },1000);
		}
		function addTiem(te){
			times=te;
			countDown()
		}
		function baoxiangBtn(id){
			var html=''
			if(id==1){
				html += '<div class="baoxiang_1s" onclick="baoxiangAjax()">'
				html += '<span>开启宝箱</span></div>'
			}else{
				times=sx.config.baoxiang*60;
				countDown()
				html += '<div class="baoxiang_1">';
				html += '<p>距离打开宝箱还有</p>';
				html += '<b><i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-date"></i><span id="time">'+miaotime(times)+'</span></b>';
				html += '</div>';
			}
			$('.baoxiangTime').html(html);
		}
		function baoxiangAjax(){
			_loading()
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/baoxiangAjax',function(ret,err){
			 	console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
				_loadingCloes();
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						baoxiangBtn(0);
						fenxiang_text(ret.ret)
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}
			})
		}
		function miaotime(t){
			day = Math.floor(t / (60 * 60 * 24));
		      hour = Math.floor(t / (60 * 60)) - (day * 24);
		      minute = Math.floor(t / 60) - (day * 24 * 60) - (hour * 60);
		      second = Math.floor(t) - (day * 24 * 60 * 60) - (hour * 60 * 60) - (minute * 60);
		      if (day <= 9) day = '0' + day;
		    if (hour <= 9) hour = '0' + hour;
		    if (minute <= 9) minute = '0' + minute;
		    if (second <= 9) second = '0' + second;
			return hour+":"+minute+":"+second
		}
		function fenxiang_text(text){
			$('.fenxiang .jinbi').text(text);
			$('.fenxiang').show();
		}
		function fenxiang_close(){
			$('.fenxiang').hide();
		}
		function qiandaoAjax(){
			var _this=$('#qiandao');
			if(_this.hasClass('yiqiandao')){
				return;
			}
			_this.addClass('yiqiandao');
			_this.text('明日签到可领'+sx.qiandao.lingqu);
			$('.qiandao_chuang').show();
			$('.qiandao_chuang_list h4').text(sx.qiandao.lingqu);
			if((sx.qiandao.tianshu+1) <= 7){
				var qiandao=$('#qiandao_'+(sx.qiandao.tianshu+1));
				qiandao.addClass('qiandao_2_0');
				qiandao.children('.qiandao_2_1').html('已领<br>'+sx.config[sx.config.qiandao[sx.qiandao.tianshu]]);
				qiandao.children('p').text('已领取');
			}
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/qiandaoAjax',function(ret,err){
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
			})
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			fx_data={
				title:_config.yaoqing.title,
				description:_config.yaoqing.content,
				img:_image+'logo.png',
				url:fx_url+'m/yaoqing/uid/'+_getPrefs('user').id
			}
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
				sharedModule.share({
					text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
					type : 'text'
				});
				return;
			}
			var row=2;
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制链接'}];
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: 3,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        }, 
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title+fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} 
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content+fx_data.url,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type) {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				} 
			});
		}
		function _weibo() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function qiandao_chuang_close(){
			$('.qiandao_chuang').hide();
		}
		function qiandaoList(a){
			var ret=sx.data;
			 a=''
			if(!a){
				var html='';
				for(var i=0;i < ret.length; i++){
					html += '<li class="aui-list-item aui-list-item-middle" id="li'+i+'">';
					html += '	<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">';
					html +=	'		<div class="aui-list-item-media" style="width: 2.5rem;">';
					html +=	'			<img src="'+ret[i].img+'" class="aui-img-round aui-list-img-sm">';
					html += '		</div>';
					html +=	'		<div id="suijirenwu">';
					html += 			qiandaoListRand(ret[i].data);
					html += '		</div>';
					html +=	'	</div>';
					html +=	'</li>'; 
				}
				$('.qiandao_chuang_list .aui-list').html(html);
				console.log(html)
			}else{
				for(var i=0;i < ret.length; i++){
					var html = qiandaoListRand(ret[i].data); 
					console.log(html)
					$('#li1 .div2').html(html)
				} 
			}
		}
		function qiandaoListRand(ret){
			var html = '';
			var b=Math.floor(Math.random()*(ret.length-1));
			a = ret[b];
			if(!a){
				return;
			}
			html += '<div class="aui-list-item-inner div2">';
			html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text">'+a.name+'</div>';
			html +=	'<div class="aui-list-item-text">'+a.money+'</div>';
			html += '</div>';
			html +=	'<div class="qiandao_chuang_btn" onclick="'+a.url+'">'+a.btn+'</div>';
			return html;
		}
		function qiandaoRand(){
			html = qiandaoListRand();
			$('.qiandao_chuang_list .aui-list').html(html)
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var UIScrollPicture,viewO=0;
		apiready = function() {
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('sx-footer'))
			UIScrollPicture = api.require('UIScrollPicture');
			view();
		}
		function view(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/mallView',function(ret,err){
				$('#top').css('padding-top',(api.winWidth)+'px')
				var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
				sx=ret
				$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'), evalData());
				if(sx.jinbi > _getPrefs('user').yaoqing.jinbi){
					$('.aui-bg-warning').attr('style','background-color:#ccc !important');
				}
				if((sx.money*100) > _getPrefs('user').yaoqing.money){
					$('.aui-bg-danger').attr('style','background-color:#ccc !important'); 
				}
				$('.aui-bg-warning').text(ret.jinbi+'金币兑换');
				$('.aui-bg-danger').text(ret.money+'元兑换');
				slide();
			},{id:api.pageParam['id']})
		}
		function slide() {
			UIScrollPicture.open({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : api.winWidth
				},
				data : {
					paths : sx.images
				},
				styles : {
					indicator : {
						align : 'center',
						color : '#ddd',
						activeColor : '#FF2D4B'
					}
				},
				placeholderImg : _image+'load-img.png',
				contentMode : 'scaleToFill',
				interval : 5,
				loop : true,
				fixedOn : api.frameName,
				fixed : false
			});
		}
		function pay(type){
			if(type==1){
				if(sx.jinbi > _getPrefs('user').yaoqing.jinbi){
					_msg('金币不足，无法兑换');
					return;
				}
			}else{
				if((sx.money*100) > _getPrefs('user').yaoqing.money){
					_msg('零钱不足，无法兑换');
					return;
				}
			}
			_url({url:'yaoqing/mallPay',id:sx.id,type:type,title:'兑换商品'},'',true);
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/fastclick.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			$api.fixTabBar($api.dom('.btn'))
			data()
		}
		function data(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/diaochaInfo',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
					$api.append($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData(ret));
					FastClick.attach(document.body);
					$(function(){
						$('label').click(function(){
							var id=$(this).data('id');
							$('label.a'+id).removeClass('active');
							$(this).addClass('active');
						})
						var mycars=new Array()
						$('.btn').click(function(){
								for(var i=0;i < ret.length;i++){
									var text=$(".a"+i+" input:checked").val()
									if(!text || text=='undefined'){
										var h=$('#h'+i).offset().top;
										console.log(h)
										$("body").scrollTo({
							                toT: h
							            });
							            _msg('请选'+ret[i].title)
										return;
									}
									mycars[i]=text;
								}
								_ajax('api/yaoqing/diaochaAdd',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
												_index_win('user_win');
											});
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}
								},{data:mycars})
						})
					})
				}
			})
		}
		$.fn.scrollTo =function(options){
        var defaults = {
            toT : 0,    
            durTime : 500,  
            delay : 30,     
            callback:null   
        };
        var opts = $.extend(defaults,options),
            timer = null,
            _this = this,
            curTop = _this.scrollTop(),
            subTop = opts.toT - curTop,    
            index = 0,
            dur = Math.round(opts.durTime / opts.delay),
            smoothScroll = function(t){
                index++;
                var per = Math.round(subTop/dur);
                if(index >= dur){
                    _this.scrollTop(t);
                    window.clearInterval(timer);
                    if(opts.callback && typeof opts.callback == 'function'){
                        opts.callback();
                    }
                    return;
                }else{
                    _this.scrollTop(curTop + index*per);
                }
            };
        timer = window.setInterval(function(){
            smoothScroll(opts.toT);
        }, opts.delay);
        return _this;
    };
	</script>

				name : 'viewappear'

				user()
			});

		function shoplist(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/mall',function(ret,err){
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
					$api.html($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData(ret));
					_imageCache();
					api.parseTapmode();
				}
			})
		}
		function user(){
			_user = _getPrefs('user')
			console.log(JSON.stringify(_user))
			$('#jinbi').text(_user.yaoqing.jinbi);
			$('#money').text((_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
		}
