					<div>昵称</div>
					<div>加入时间</div>
				</div>
				<div class="sx-view"><div id="jiazai"><img src="../../image/loading_more.gif" /></div></div>
			</div>
			<div class="sx-tab-list sx-yq-list2" style=" display: none;">
				<div class="aui-card-list-footer sx-yq-list2-1">
					<div>昵称</div>
					<div>加入时间</div>
				</div>
				<div class="sx-view"><div id="jiazai"><img src="../../image/loading_more.gif" /></div></div>
			</div>
			<div class="sx-tab-list sx-yq-list3" style=" display: none;">
				<ul class="sx-view aui-list aui-media-list"><div id="jiazai"><img src="../../image/loading_more.gif" /></div></ul>
			</div>
		</div>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/fastclick.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var name='zongbang/type/2',type=tabList1=tabList2=tabList3=1,heigutgao=0,Gao1=Gao2=Gao3=0,fx_data;
		apiready = function() {
_init();
			$('.sx-yq-1 p').html('我的邀请码： <b>'+_user.id+'</b>  >');
	 		list();
	 		_shangla(function(ret,err){
				switch(type)
					{
					case 2:
						tabList2=1
					  	break;
					case 3:
						tabList3=1
					  	break;
					default:
						tabList1=1
				}
				list()
			},1)
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
			$(function(){
				$('.aui-tab .aui-tab-item').click(function(){
					heigutgao=0;
					var _this=$(this);
					$('.aui-active').removeClass('aui-active');
					_this.addClass('aui-active');
					type=_this.data('id');
					$('.sx-tab-list').hide();
					$('.sx-yq-list'+type).show();
					var dada_list=_this.data('list');
					if(!dada_list){
						_this.data('list',1)
						list();
					}
				})
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (Gao1 == 1 && type==1) {
					Gao1 = 0
					tabList1=tabList1+1
					list(tabList1)
				}else if(Gao2==1 && type==2){
					Gao2 = 0
					tabList2=tabList2+1
					list(tabList2)
				}else if(Gao3==1 && type==3){
					Gao3 = 0
					tabList3=tabList3+1
					list(tabList3)
				}
			});
		}
		function list(pages){
			pages=pages ? pages : 1;
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/'+_name() + '?page=' + pages,function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
					_loadingCloes()
					var _this=$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view');
					page_total = ret.total
					if(!page_total){
						_this.html('<div id="tishi">暂无数据</div>');
						return;
					}
					if(pages != 1){
						$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view .fx-dibu_loading').remove();
					}
					console.log(pages)
					var html=''
					for(var i=0;i<ret.data.length;i++){
						if(type==2){
							html += '<div class="aui-card-list-footer sx-yq-list2-2">';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].time+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
						}else if(type==3){
							html += '<li class="aui-list-item">';
							html += '<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-inner">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-title">'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-right">'+ret.data[i].time+'</div>'
							html += '</div>';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text aui-ellipsis-1">'+ret.data[i].content+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '</li>';
						}else{
							html += '<div class="aui-card-list-footer sx-yq-list2-2">';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].time+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
						}
					}
					page_per_page = Math.ceil(page_total / ret.per_page);
					if (page_per_page <= pages) {
						switch(type)
						{
						case 2:
							Gao2=0
						  	break;
						case 3:
							Gao3=0
						  	break;
						default:
							Gao1=0
						}
						html += '<div id="loadingNo">底部没有数据了...</div>';
					}else {
						switch(type)
						{
						case 2:
							Gao2=1
						  	break;
						case 3:
							Gao3=1
						  	break;
						default:
							Gao1=1
						}
						html += '<div class="fx-dibu_loading load-container loadingdi"><div class="loader">loadingdi...</div></div>';
					}
					if(pages==1 || !pages){
						_this.html(html);
					}else{
						_this.append(html);
					}
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
		function _name(){
			switch(type)
			{
			case 2:
			name='zongbang/type/2'
			  break;
			case 3:
			name='mingxi'
			  break;
			default:
				name='zongbang/type/2'
			}
			return name;
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			fx_data={
				title:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_title,
				description:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_content,
				img:_image+'logo.png',
				url:fx_url+'m/yaoqing/uid/'+_getPrefs('user').id
			}
			var row=2;
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制链接'}];
			console.log(JSON.stringify(fx_data))
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: row,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        }, 
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title+fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} 
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content+fx_data.url,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type) {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				} 
			});
		}
		function _weibo() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>

		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>资讯站 - </title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<style>

	<body>
		<script id="sx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
		<section class="aui-grid" >
	        <h3>商品信息</h3>
	        <ul class="aui-list aui-media-list">
	        	<li class="aui-list-item aui-list-item-middle">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media assssdasd">
							<img  id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{= sx.image }}" src="../../image/loadingImage.png">
						</div>
						<div class="sx-tab-2-1 aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-ellipsis-2">
									{{= sx.title}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-text  ">
								<div class="aui-ellipsis-2">
									{{? api.pageParam['type']==1 }}
									{{= sx.jinbi}}金币
									{{??}}
									{{= sx.money}}元
									{{?}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-ellipsis-2">
									数量：1 件
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
			</ul>
			<h3>填写信息</h3>
			<div class="aui-content">
				<ul class="aui-list aui-form-list">
					<li class="aui-list-item">
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-label">
								姓名
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-input">
								<input type="text" id="xingming" placeholder="请输入姓名" value="">
							</div>
						</div>
					</li>
					<li class="aui-list-item">
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-label">
								手机号码
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-input">
								<input type="tel" value="" id="mobile" onkeyup="this.value=this.value.replace(/[^0-9]/g,'')" onafterpaste="this.value=this.value.replace(/[^0-9]/g,'')" placeholder="请输入手机号码">
							</div>
						</div>
					</li>
					<li class="aui-list-item">
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-label">
								地址
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-input" >
								<input type="text" id="dizhi" placeholder="请输入省/市/详细地址" value="">
							</div>
						</div>
					</li>
					<li class="aui-list-item">
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-label">
								支付宝号码
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-input">
								<input type="text" id="alipay" placeholder="请输入支付宝号码" value="">
							</div>
						</div>
					</li>
				</ul>
			</div>
			<h3>实际结算</h3>
			<div class="aui-content">
		        <div class="aui-text-right aui-padded-10 aui-padded-r-15 aui-border-b">
		        	{{? api.pageParam['type']==1 }}
					<b>{{= sx.jinbi}}金币</b>
					{{??}}
					<b>{{= sx.money}}元</b>
					{{?}}
				</div>
		    </div>
		</section>
		<div style="width: 90%;margin: 0 auto;margin-top: 1.2rem;"><div class="aui-btn-block aui-btn {{? api.pageParam['type']==1 }}aui-bg-warning{{??}}aui-bg-danger{{?}}" style="color: #fff;" tapmode onclick="pay()">立即兑换</div></div>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var sx
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			ajax()
		}
		function ajax(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/mallView',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					sx=ret
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
					$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'),evalData());
					_imageCache()
					api.parseTapmode();
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},{id:api.pageParam['id']})
		}
		function pay(){
			if(_getPrefs('user').sfz !=1){
				return _alert('请先实名认证');
			}
			var xingming=$('#xingming').val();
			var mobile=$('#mobile').val();
			var dizhi=$('#dizhi').val();
			var alipay=$('#alipay').val();
			if(!xingming){
				_msg('请输入姓名')
				return;
			}
			if(!mobile){
				_msg('请输入手机号码')
				return;
			}
			if(!_isMobile(mobile)){
				_msg('手机号码不正确');
				return;
			}
			if(!dizhi){
				_msg('请输入详细地址')
				return;
			}
			if(!alipay){
				_msg('请输入支付宝号码')
				return;
			}
			if(!_isEmail(alipay)){
				_msg('支付宝号码错误')
				return;
			}
			var money=api.pageParam['type']==1 ? sx.jinbi+'金币' : sx.money+'元'
		 	api.confirm({
			    title: '您确认要花'+money+'兑换商品吗？',
			    buttons: ['确定', '取消']
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
			    if(index==1){
			    	 _loading();
					_ajax('api/yaoqing/mallPay',function(ret,err){
						_loadingCloes()
						if(ret){
							if(ret.ret){
								api.execScript({
									name: 'yaoqing/mallView',
									frameName:'yaoqing/mallView',
								    script: 'view()'
								});
								api.execScript({
									name: 'root',
								    script: '_userInfo()'
								});
								_alert('兑换成功，请到兑换记录查看物流状态',function(ret,err){
									_close();
								})
							}else{
								_msg(ret.err)
							}
						}else{
							alert('err：'+JSON.stringify(err))
						}
					},{shopid:sx.id,xingming:xingming,mobile:mobile,dizhi:dizhi,alipay:alipay,type:api.pageParam['type']})
			    }
			});
		}
		function _isEmail(obj){
             var reg = new RegExp("^[a-z0-9]+([._\\-]*[a-z0-9])*@([a-z0-9]+[-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9]+.){1,63}[a-z0-9]+$"); 
			　　if(!reg.test(obj)){ 
					if(_isMobile(obj)){
						return true;
					}
			　　　　 return false;
			　　}else{
			　　　　return true;
			　　}
             return true;
        }
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>资讯站 - </title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/aui.css" />
		<style>
	 		.aui-timeline .sx-yuan{
	 			width: 1.2rem;
	 			height: 1.2rem;
	 			border:1px solid #e8e8e8;
	 			background: #fff;

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var sx
		apiready = function() {
			data()
		}
		function data(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/datiInfo',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
					$api.append($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData(ret));
					FastClick.attach(document.body);
					$(function(){
						$('label').click(function(){
							var id=$(this).data('id');
							$('label.a'+id).removeClass('active');
							$(this).addClass('active');
						});
						var mycars=new Array()
						$('.btn').click(function(){
								for(var i=0;i < ret.length;i++){
									var text=$(".a"+i+" input:checked").val()
									if(!text || text=='undefined'){
							            _msg('请选'+ret[i].title)
										return;
									}
									console.log(text)
									mycars[i]=text;
								}
								return;
								_ajax('api/yaoqing/diaochaAdd',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
												_index_win('user_win');
											});
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}
								},{data:mycars})
						})
					})
				}
			})
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			$api.css($api.dom('.a1'),'height:'+api.winHeight+'px')
			api.parseTapmode();
		}
		function ajax(){
			var yaoqingma=$api.val($api.dom('.a2 input'));
			if(!yaoqingma){
				_msg('请输入邀请码');
				return;
			}
			if(yaoqingma == _user.id){
				_msg('不能自己当师傅哦');
				return;
			}
			_loading();
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/yaoqingma',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes()
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						_alert(ret.ret,function(ret){
							_close()
						})
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err);
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},{yaoqingma:yaoqingma})
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var typeid=0
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			typeid=api.pageParam['id'] ? api.pageParam['id'] : 0;
			user()
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				user()
			});
			_lists('api/yaoqing/mallList/typeid/'+typeid,1, 1);
			_shangla(function(){
				_lists('api/yaoqing/mallList/typeid/'+typeid,1, 1);
			},1)
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/yaoqing/mallList/typeid/'+typeid,pagenum);
				}
			});
		}
		function user(){
			_user=_getPrefs('user')
			$('#jinbi').text(_user.yaoqing.jinbi);
			$('#money').text((_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
		}
	</script>

	 		list()
	 		_shangla(function(ret,err){
				list()
			},1)
			$(function(){
				$('.aui-tab .aui-tab-item').click(function(){
					var _this=$(this);
					$('.aui-active').removeClass('aui-active');
					_this.addClass('aui-active');
					type=_this.data('id');
					$('.sx-tab-list').hide();
					$('.sx-yq-list'+type).show();
					if(type==2 && tabList2==1){
						tabList2=0
						list('paihang');
					}
				})
			})
		}
		function list(name){
			name=name ? name : 'paihang/type/1'
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/'+name,function(ret,err){
				api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
				if(ret){
					var html=''
					for(var i=0;i<ret.length;i++){
						html += '<div class="aui-card-list-footer sx-yq-list-2">';
						html +=	'<div>'+(i+1)+'</div>';
						html += '<div>'+ret[i].nickname+'</div>';
						html +=	'<div>'+ret[i].tudi_num+'</div>';
						html += '<div>'+ret[i].money+'</div>';
						html += '</div>';
					}
					var _this=$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view');
					_this.html(html); 
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var name='mingxi/type/1',tabList1=tabList2=tabList3=1,heigutgao=0,Gao1=Gao2=Gao3=0,fx_data,yesterday1=yesterday2=0,type=1;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				$('#shouru').hide();
			}
			if(api.pageParam['index']){
				type=2;
				var auiTb=$('.aui-tab .aui-tab-item').eq(1);
				auiTb.addClass('aui-active')
				auiTb.data('list',1)
			}else{
				var auiTb=$('.aui-tab .aui-tab-item').eq(0);
				auiTb.addClass('aui-active')
				auiTb.data('list',1)
			}
			$('.sx-yq-list'+type).show();
			yesterday()
		 	var l=$('.sx-wode .row2 .aui-col-xs-4');
			l.eq(0).children('.aui-grid-label').text(_user.yaoqing.jinbi+'个');
			l.eq(1).children('.aui-grid-label').text('￥'+(_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
			var text;
			if(api.pageParam['index']){
				l.eq(2).children('.aui-grid-label').text('￥'+(_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
			}else{
				l.eq(2).children('.aui-grid-label').text('￥'+(_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
			}
			l.eq(2).children('.aui-grid-label').text(text);
	 		list()
	 		_shangla(function(ret,err){
				switch(type)
					{
					case 2:
						tabList2=1
					  	break;
					default:
						tabList1=1
				}
				list()
			},1)
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
			$(function(){
				$('.aui-tab .aui-tab-item').click(function(){
					heigutgao=0;
					var _this=$(this);
					$('.aui-active').removeClass('aui-active');
					_this.addClass('aui-active');
					type=_this.data('id');
					$('.sx-tab-list').hide();
					$('.sx-yq-list'+type).show();
					if(type==1){
						$('#shouru p').text('昨天金币收入');
						$('#shouru div').text(yesterday2+'个');
					}else{
						$('#shouru p').text('昨天零钱收入');
						$('#shouru div').text('￥'+yesterday1);
					}
					var dada_list=_this.data('list');
					if(!dada_list){
						_this.data('list',1)
						list();
					}
				})
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (Gao1 == 1 && type==1) {
					Gao1 = 0
					tabList1=tabList1+1
					list(tabList1)
				}else if(Gao2==1 && type==2){
					Gao2 = 0
					tabList2=tabList2+1
					list(tabList2)
				}
			});
		}
		function list(pages){
			pages=pages ? pages : 1;
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/'+_name() + '?page=' + pages,function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					_loadingCloes()
					var _this=$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view');
					page_total = ret.total
					if(!page_total){
						_this.html('<div id="tishi">暂无数据</div>');
						return;
					}
					if(pages != 1){
						$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view .fx-dibu_loading').remove();
					}
					var html=''
					for(var i=0;i<ret.data.length;i++){
						html += '<li class="aui-list-item">';
							html += '<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-inner">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-title">'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-right">'+ret.data[i].time+'</div>'
							html += '</div>';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text aui-ellipsis-1">'+ret.data[i].content+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '</li>';
					}
					page_per_page = Math.ceil(page_total / ret.per_page);
					if (page_per_page <= pages) {
						switch(type)
						{
						case 2:
							Gao2=0
						  	break;
						default:
							Gao1=0
						}
						html += '<div id="loadingNo">底部没有数据了...</div>';
					}else {
						switch(type)
						{
						case 2:
							Gao2=1
						  	break;
						default:
							Gao1=1
						}
						html += '<div class="fx-dibu_loading load-container loadingdi"><div class="loader">loadingdi...</div></div>';
					}
					if(pages==1 || !pages){
						_this.html(html);
					}else{
						_this.append(html);
					}
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
		function _name(){
			switch(type)
			{
			case 2:
			name='mingxi/type/2'
			  break;
			default:
				name='mingxi/type/1'
			}
			return name;
		}
		function yesterday(){
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/yesterday',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					yesterday1=ret.a;
					yesterday2=ret.b;
					if(type==1){
						$('#shouru p').text('昨天金币收入');
						$('#shouru div').text(yesterday2+'个');
					}else{
						$('#shouru p').text('昨天零钱收入');
						$('#shouru div').text('￥'+yesterday1);
					}
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var name='zongbang',type=tabList1=tabList2=tabList3=1,heigutgao=0,Gao1=Gao2=Gao3=0,fx_data;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				api.openFrame({
					name : 'index_s',
					url : html_win + 'yaoqing/index_s.html',
					bounces : true,
					reload:true,
					rect : {
						x : 0,
						y : 0,
						w : 'auto',
						h : 'auto',
					},
					bounces:false,
					bgColor:'rgba(0,0,0,0)'
				})
				return;
			}
			$('.sx-yq-1 p').html('我的邀请码： <b>'+_user.id+'</b>  >');
	 		list();
	 		_shangla(function(ret,err){
				switch(type)
					{
					case 2:
						tabList2=1
					  	break;
					case 3:
						tabList3=1
					  	break;
					default:
						tabList1=1
				}
				list()
			},1)
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
			$(function(){
				$('.aui-tab .aui-tab-item').click(function(){
					heigutgao=0;
					var _this=$(this);
					$('.aui-active').removeClass('aui-active');
					_this.addClass('aui-active');
					type=_this.data('id');
					$('.sx-tab-list').hide();
					$('.sx-yq-list'+type).show();
					var dada_list=_this.data('list');
					if(!dada_list){
						_this.data('list',1)
						list();
					}
				})
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (Gao1 == 1 && type==1) {
					Gao1 = 0
					tabList1=tabList1+1
					list(tabList1)
				}else if(Gao2==1 && type==2){
					Gao2 = 0
					tabList2=tabList2+1
					list(tabList2)
				}else if(Gao3==1 && type==3){
					Gao3 = 0
					tabList3=tabList3+1
					list(tabList3)
				}
			});
		}
		function list(pages){
			pages=pages ? pages : 1;
			_ajax('api/yaoqing/'+_name() + '?page=' + pages,function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
					_loadingCloes()
					var _this=$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view');
					page_total = ret.total
					if(!page_total){
						_this.html('<div id="tishi">暂无数据</div>');
						return;
					}
					if(pages != 1){
						$('.sx-yq-list'+type+' .sx-view .fx-dibu_loading').remove();
					}
					console.log(pages)
					var html=''
					for(var i=0;i<ret.data.length;i++){
						if(type==2){
							html += '<div class="aui-card-list-footer sx-yq-list2-2">';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].time+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
						}else if(type==3){
							html += '<li class="aui-list-item">';
							html += '<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-inner">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text">';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-title">'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-right">'+ret.data[i].time+'</div>'
							html += '</div>';
							html += '<div class="aui-list-item-text aui-ellipsis-1">'+ret.data[i].content+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '</div>';
							html += '</li>';
						}else{
							html += '<div class="aui-card-list-footer sx-yq-list-2">';
							html +=	'<div>'+(((pages-1)*10)+i+1)+'</div>';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].username+'</div>';
							html +=	'<div>'+ret.data[i].tudi_num+'</div>';
							html += '<div>'+ret.data[i].money_num+'</div>';
							html += '</div>';
						}
					}
					page_per_page = Math.ceil(page_total / ret.per_page);
					if (page_per_page <= pages) {
						switch(type)
						{
						case 2:
							Gao2=0
						  	break;
						case 3:
							Gao3=0
						  	break;
						default:
							Gao1=0
						}
						html += '<div id="loadingNo">底部没有数据了...</div>';
					}else {
						switch(type)
						{
						case 2:
							Gao2=1
						  	break;
						case 3:
							Gao3=1
						  	break;
						default:
							Gao1=1
						}
						html += '<div class="fx-dibu_loading load-container loadingdi"><div class="loader">loadingdi...</div></div>';
					}
					if(pages==1 || !pages){
						_this.html(html);
					}else{
						_this.append(html);
					}
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
		function _name(){
			switch(type)
			{
			case 2:
			name='zongbang/type/2'
			  break;
			case 3:
			name='mingxi'
			  break;
			default:
				name='zongbang'
			}
			return name;
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			fx_data={
				title:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_title,
				description:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_content,
				img:_image+'logo.png',
				url:fx_url+'m/yaoqing/uid/'+_getPrefs('user').id
			}
			var row=2;
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制链接'}];
			console.log(JSON.stringify(fx_data))
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: row,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        }, 
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title+fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} 
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content+fx_data.url,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type) {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				} 
			});
		}
		function _weibo() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>

			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){

			});
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen: false
			});

				}

			_openFrame('view_ping', '', '', api.pageParam)

			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {

					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}

			$api.text($api.dom('.aui-title'),title)
		}

			var gundong = 'gundong();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view_ping',
				script : gundong
			});
		}
		function pingAdd(){
			var pingAdd='pingAdd();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view_ping',
				script : pingAdd
			});
		}
		function pingZan(type) {
			return;
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.pingZan'),'pingZanColor')
			if(type){
				var pingZan = 'pingZan();';
				api.execScript({
					frameName : 'view_ping',
					script : pingZan
				});
			}
		}
		function fenxiang(){
			return;
			var fenxiang = 'fenxiang();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view_ping',
				script : fenxiang
			});
		}
		function c(){
			_close(fan)
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var videoPlayer ;
		apiready = function() {
			videoPlayer = api.require('videoPlayer');
			view()
		}
		function view(){
			var y = $api.offset($api.dom('.fx-video-view'));
			videoPlayer.open({
				rect:{
				    x: 0,   
				    y: 0, 
				    w:api.winWidth,
				    h: y.h
				},
				autoPlay:false,
			    path: 'http:
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if (ret) {
			     	console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
			    } else {
			        console.log(JSON.stringify(err))
			    }
			});
			videoPlayer.addEventListener({
				name: 'rightUp'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					console.log("ret"+JSON.stringify(ret))
				} else {
				    console.log("err"+JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			});
		}
		function _video(type){
			if(type=='b'){		
				videoPlayer.start();
			}else if(type=='z'){
				videoPlayer.pause();
			}else if(type=='q'){
				videoPlayer.fullScreen();
			}
		}
	</script>

				top: 0;

		<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
		{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}
		{{? it.data[i].mychannel != 99}}
		<div class="aui-col-xs-6" id="id{{= it.data[i].id }}" data-data='{{= JSON.stringify(it.data[i]) }}' id="id{{= it.data[i].id }}">
			<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{= it.data[i].image }}" src="../image/kongbai.png" class="sx-imasdasd" tapmode onclick="videodata({{= it.data[i].id }})">
			<div class="sx-imgtext" tapmode onclick="videodata({{= it.data[i].id }})">
				<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1">
					{{= it.data[i].title }}
				</div>
				<div class="aui-card-list-footer">
					<div>
						<img src="../image/xiaoshipin.png" />
						{{= it.data[i].click }}次播放
					</div>
					<div>
						{{= it.data[i].zan }}赞
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			{{? uid}}
				{{? it.data[i].uid}}
					{{? it.data[i].uid==uid}}
						<em class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-close" tapmode onclick="video_del({{= it.data[i].id }})"></em>
					{{?}}
				{{?}}
			{{?}}
		</div>
		{{?}}
		{{ } }}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var moviePlayer, data , typeid=0 , timestamp,MNActionButton,uid,loginis=0;
		apiready = function() {
 			_init();
			wodeshipping();
			timestamp = Date.parse(new Date());
			timestamp=timestamp/1000
			moviePlayer = api.require('moviePlayer');
			_shangla(function(ret, err) {
				_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/4/img_w/1/uid/'+uid+'/date/'+timestamp, 1, 1);
			},api.pageParam['id'] ? 0 : 1)
	    	api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(heigutgao==1){	
					pagenum+=1
					_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/4/img_w/1/uid
				}
			});
			MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				wodeshipping()
			});
		}
		function videodata(id){
			var a = $('#id'+id);
			data=a.data('data')
			_url({data:data},'oxPlayer_frm');
			return;
			video(data);
		}
		var xiaoshipin_img = 0;
		var videoUrls
		function video(data) {
			var json = {};
			var json1 = data;
			var json2 = {
				win_index : api.pageParam['id']
			};
			json = eval('(' + (JSON.stringify(json1) + JSON.stringify(json2)).replace(/}{/, ',') + ')');
			data = json;
			_ajax('api/article/clickAjax/id/'+data.id);
			xiaoshipin_img = 1
	 		videoUrls = data.video;
	 		moviePlayer.open({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : api.winHeight
				},
				showBack:false,
				autorotation:false,
 			 	videoDirection:'landscape',
 			 	seekBarDragable:false,
 			 	isShowStatusBar:false,
 			 	isShowControlView:false,
				path : data.video,
				autoPlay : true,
				scalingMode:'aspectFill',
				useGestureControl:false,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					win(data);
				}
			});
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : true
			});
		}
		function videoUrl() {
			moviePlayer.replay({
				path : videoUrls
			});
		}
		function huavideo(videodatga){
			videoUrls = videodatga
			videoUrl();
		}
		function win(data) {
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_img',
				url : html_win + 'xiaoshipin_img.html',
				bounces : false,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto',
				},
				pageParam : data,
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				animation:{
					type:"none",                
				    subType:"from_bottom",       
				    duration:300
				},
			})
		}
		function winclose() {
			return;
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_img'
			});
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_ping_win'
			});
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_ping'
			});
			moviePlayer.close();
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
			xiaoshipin_img = 0;
			MNActionButton.close();
		}
		function winfrem() {
			if (xiaoshipin_img == 1) {
				api.execScript({
					name:'xiaoshipin_win',
					frameName : 'xiaoshipin_img',
					script : 'guanbi()'
				});
				return;
			}
			_hone()
		}
		function pause(){
			moviePlayer.pause();
		}
		function start(){
			moviePlayer.play();
		}
		var fx_data
		function fenxiang() {
			fx_data=data
			fx_data={title:data.title,description:data.description,url:fx_url+"m/a/"+data.id+'.html',img:data.image+"?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100"}
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'},{icon: _image+'share/105.png',title: '举报'}];
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: 2,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        },
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type,data) {
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.content,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type,data){
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.content,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function _weibo(data) {
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.content,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function wodeshipping(){
			if(api.pageParam['id']){
				return;
			}
			uid=_getPrefs('user') ? _getPrefs('user').id : '';
			if(!uid){
				loginis=0;
				var h=api.winHeight/2-100;
				$('#fx-view').html('<a tapmode onclick="_url({url:\'login\',title:\'登录\',exe:\'1\'})" class="aui-btn aui-btn-danger qingdengli" style="position: fixed;margin:auto;left:0; right:0; top:0; bottom:0;width: 120px; height:38px; line-height:38px;text-align: center;margin-top:'+h+'px">请先登录</a>');
				api.parseTapmode();
				return;
			}else{
				if(loginis==1){
					return;
				}
			}
			api.refreshHeaderLoading();
			loginis=1;
		}
		function video_del(id){
			if(!id){ return _msg('删除失败') }
			api.actionSheet({
			    title: '您确认要删除视频吗？',
			    cancelTitle: '取消',
			    destructiveTitle: '确认删除',
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
			    if(index==1){
			    	api.confirm({
					    title: '您确认要删除视频吗？',
					    msg: '删除后不能恢复，请谨慎操作！',
					    buttons: ['取消', '确认删除']
					}, function(ret, err) {
					    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
					    if(index==2){
					    	$('#id'+id).remove();
							_msg('删除成功');
					    	ajaxdel(id)
					    }
					});
			    }
			});
		}
		function ajaxdel(id){
	 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}
			},{aid:id})
		}
		function shuaxin(){
			api.refreshHeaderLoading();
		}
	</script>
</html>
<!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>

		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />

		<style>
			body, .aui-content, .aui-card-list, .aui-card-list-footer {
				background: none;
				background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
				border: 0px;
			}

				background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
				color: #FFFFFF;
				border-radius: 0.25rem;
				padding: 0.2rem 0.4rem;
				font-size: 0.65rem;

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			$api.text($api.byId('ffxiang'), api.pageParam['num']);
		}
		function ffxiang(num) {
			$api.html($api.byId('ffxiang'), num)
		}
		function baocun() {
			var baocun = 'baocun();';
			api.execScript({
				script : baocun
			});
		}
	</script>
</html><!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<title>APP</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/aui.css" />
		<style type="text/css">
			body {
				background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
			}
		</style>

	<body></body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js" ></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js" ></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var photoBrowser, tool_show = true, images_list, images_text,photoBrowser,MNActionButton,inputField;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai()  
			   api.setFullScreen({
					fullScreen : false
				});
				setTimeout(function(){
					_daily({name:'money_news'})
				},_config.yaoqing.money_news_time)
			});
			photoBrowser = api.require('photoBrowser');
			MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			inputField = api.require('inputField');
			inputField.setInputFieldListener(function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.eventType == 'move') {
						if (ret.chatViewH == 0 || ret.chatViewH == -1) {
							inputField.hide();
							inputField.resignFirstResponder();
						}
					}
				} else {
					_msgz(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			});
			api.parseTapmode();
			photo_browser(0)
		}
		function photo_browser(index) {
			_loading();
			_ajax('api/article/view', function(ret, err) {
				_loadingCloes()
				if (ret) {
					var view=ret
					fx_data={title:ret.title,description:ret.description,url:fx_url+"m/a/"+ret.id+'.html',img:ret.image}
					if(!fx_data.title){
						fx_data.title=fx_data.description
						if(!fx_data.title){
							fx_data.title=fx_data.url
						}
					}
					if(ret.video){
						fx_data.img=ret.video+'?vframe/jpg/offset/2/w/100/h/100';
					}
					if(!fx_data.description){
						fx_data.description=func(ret.content);
					}
					fx_data.img=fx_data.img+"?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100"
					api.imageCache({
						url : fx_data.img,
						thumbnail:false,
					}, function(ret, err) {
						if (ret) {
							if (ret.status) {
								fx_data.img=ret.url
							}
						}
					});
					images_list = ret.images_list
					images_text = ret.images_text
					var images = images_list;
					var texts = images_text;
					var comment_num = ret.pingNum;
					photoBrowser.open({
						images : images,
						bgColor : '#000',
						activeIndex : index,
					}, function(ret, err) {
						if (ret) {
							if (ret.eventType == 'show') {
								api.openFrame({
									name : 'photo_browser_foot',
									url : html_win+'photo_browser_foot.html',
									rect : {
										x : 0,
										y : api.winHeight, 
										w : 'auto',
										h : 'auto'
									},
									bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0.0)',
									pageParam : {
										winHeight : api.winHeight,
										index : index, 
										total : images.length,
										texts : texts,
										comment_num : comment_num,
										view:view
									}
								});
								api.openFrame({
									name : 'photo_browser_header',
									url : html_win+'photo_browser_header.html',
									rect : {
										x : 0,
										y : 0, 
										w : 'auto',
										h : 0
									},
									bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0.0)',
									pageParam : {
										winHeight : api.winHeight,
										view:view
									}
								});
							}
							if (ret.eventType == 'click') {
								inputField.hide();
								inputField.resignFirstResponder();
								if (tool_show) {
									api.setFrameAttr({
										name : 'photo_browser_foot',
										hidden : true
									});
									api.setFrameAttr({
										name : 'photo_browser_header',
										hidden : true
									});
									api.setFullScreen({
										fullScreen : true
									});
									tool_show = false;
								} else {
									api.setFrameAttr({
										name : 'photo_browser_foot',
										hidden : false
									});
									api.setFrameAttr({
										name : 'photo_browser_header',
										hidden : false
									});
									api.setFullScreen({
										fullScreen : false
									});
									tool_show = true;
								}
							}
							if (ret.eventType == 'change') {
								api.execScript({
									frameName : 'photo_browser_foot',
									script : 'set_frame_attr(' + ret.index + ', ' + tool_show + ');'
								});
							}
							if (ret.eventType == 'longPress') {
								photoBrowser.getImage({
									index : ret.index
								}, function(ret_getImage, err_getImage) {
									if (ret_getImage) {
										api.actionSheet({
											cancelTitle : '取消',
											buttons : ['保存图片']
										}, function(ret_actionSheet, err_actionSheet) {
											if (ret_actionSheet.buttonIndex ==1) {
												if(api.systemType == 'ios'){
													api.saveMediaToAlbum({
														path : ret_getImage.path
													}, function(ret_saveImage, err_saveImage) {
														if (ret_saveImage && ret_saveImage.status) {
															api.toast({
																msg : '图片保存成功',
																duration : 2000,
																location : 'middle'
															});
														} else {
															console.log(JSON.stringify(err_saveImage));
														}
													});
												}else{
													baocun(images[ret.index])
												}
											}
										});
									} else {
										console.log(JSON.stringify(err_getImage));
									}
								});
							}
						} else {
							console.log(JSON.stringify(err));
						}
					});
				}
			}, {
				id : api.pageParam['id']
			})
		}
		function close_photo_browser() {
			photoBrowser.close();
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'photo_browser_header'
			});
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'photo_browser_foot'
			});
			api.execScript({
				script : 'api.removeEventListener({name: "keyback"});'
			});
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
		}
		var pingAddPen = 1;
		function pingAdd() {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if (pingAddPen == 1) {
				pingAddPen = 2;
				inputField.open({
					bgColor : '#fff',
					lineColor : '#D8D8D8',
					fileBgColor : '#f5f5f5',
					borderColor : '#F4F5F6',
					autoFocus : true,
					placeholder : '优质评论将会被优先展示',
					placeholderStyles : {
						color : '#bbb', 
						size : 14, 
						marginL : 5 
					},
					maxLines : 3,
					sendBtn : {
						bg : '#03a9f4', 
						bgHighlight : '#0287BF', 
						title : '发送', 
						titleSize : '14', 
						titleColor : '#fff', 
						corner : 5 
					},
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret) {
						if (ret.msg == '') {
							_msg('请输入评价');
						} else {
							pingAddTent(ret.msg);
							inputField.hide();
							inputField.resignFirstResponder();
						}
					} else {
					}
				});
			} else {
				inputField.becomeFirstResponder(function(ret, err) {
					if (ret.status) {
						setTimeout(function() {
							inputField.show();
						}, 500)
					} else {
					}
				});
			}
		}
		function pingAddTent(text) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if(text){
				_ajax('api/member/ping',function(ret,err){	
					if(ret){
						if(ret.ret){
							_msg('评价成功')
						}else{
							_msg('评价失败')
						}
					}
				},{aid:api.pageParam['id'],content:text})
			}
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'},{icon: _image+'share/105.png',title: '举报'}];
			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: 2,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        }, 
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} 
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type,data) {
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type,data){
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				} 
			});
		}
		function _weibo(data) {
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function html(s){
			var dd=s.replace(/<\/?.+?>/g,"");
			var dds=dd.replace(/ /g,"");
			return dds;
		}
		function func(s, n) {
			s=html(s)
			n=100;
	　　　	return s.slice(0, n).replace(/([^x00-xff])/g, "$1a").slice(0, n).replace(/([^x00-xff])a/g, "$1");
	　　	}
		function baocun(getImage) {
 				_loading('正在下载');
				api.download({
				    url: getImage,
				    report: true,
				    cache: true,
				    allowResume: true
				}, function(ret, err) {
				    if (ret.state == 1) {
				        api.saveMediaToAlbum({
							path : ret.savePath
						}, function(ret_saveImage, err_saveImage) {
							_loadingCloes();
							if (ret_saveImage && ret_saveImage.status) {
								_msg('图片保存成功')
							}
						});
				    } else {
						_loadingCloes();
						_msg('下载失败')
				    }
				});
		}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>

			    name:'viewappear'

				_heibai(1)

		function x(){
			api.actionSheet({
			    title: '请选择举报操作',
			    cancelTitle: '取消',
			    buttons: ['举报淫秽色情', '举报违法信息', '举报营销广告','举报恶意攻击谩骂','拉黑作者']
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
			    if(index == 5){
			    	_msg('已拉黑作者');
			    }else if(index == 6){
			    }else{
			    	_msg('举报成功，等待核实');
			    }
			});
		}
	</script>

		apiready = function() {
			_heibai(1)
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			api.parseTapmode();
			var f = $api.dom('.footer');
			var a = $api.offset(f).h;
			var h = api.winHeight - (a*2);
			$api.css($api.dom('.footer'),"height: "+h+"px");
			console.log(h+" : "+api.winHeight);
			time();
		}
		function time(){
			setTimeout(function(){
				$api.text($api.dom('.time'),i+'秒');
				a();
			},1000) 
		}
		function a(){
			$api.css($api.dom('.time'),'display: none');
			api.openApp({
				iosUrl : 'https:
			});
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var shuaxin=false;
		apiready = function() {
			ajax();
			api.parseTapmode();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		};
		function ajax(){
			var typeid = _typeid_data_get()	
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('yes'), evalData(typeid.data));
			if(typeid.no){
				var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('list-no')));
				$api.html($api.byId('no'), evalData(typeid.no));
			}
		}
		function data(jos, yesno) {
			shuaxin=true;
			var id = $(jos).data('id');
			var size = $(jos).data('size');
			var name = $(jos).data('title');
			var bg = $(jos).data('bg');
			var bgs = $(jos).data('bgs');
			var html = '<div class="aui-col-xs-3" tapmode onclick="data(this,'+(yesno==1 ? 0 : 1)+')" data-size="'+ size +'" data-id="'+ id +'" data-title="'+ name +'" data-bg="'+bg+'" data-bgs="'+ bgs +'" >';
			if (yesno == 1) {
				var num = $api.domAll('#yes .aui-grid-label');
				if(num.length < 2) {
					api.toast({
						msg : '至少要保留一个',
						duration : 2000,
						location : 'bottom'
					});
					return false;
				}
				$api.remove(jos);
				html += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1">+ ' + name ;
				var _this = $api.byId('no');
			} else if(yesno == 0) {
				$api.remove(jos);
				html += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1" >' + name ;
				var _this = $api.byId('yes');
			}
			html += '</div></div>';
			$api.append(_this, html)
			api.parseTapmode();
		}
		function c(){
			if(shuaxin){
				var _yes = yes();
				var _no = no();
				var _typeid = typeidsss();
				var _md5 = _getPrefs('typeid').md5
				var json = {'data':_yes,'typeid':_typeid,'no':_no,'md5':_md5};
				_setPrefs('typeid_get', json);
				api.execScript({
					name:'root',
					frameName : 'ffxiang_win',
					script :  'typeDataAdd()'
				});
			}
			api.execScript({
				name:'root',
				frameName : 'ffxiang_win',
				script : 'typeid_keyback_false()'
			});
			api.closeFrame();
		}
		function yes(){
			var typeData_no = [];
			$("#yes .aui-col-xs-3").each(function(){
				var size = $(this).data('size');
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				var title = $(this).data('title');
				var bg = $(this).data('bg');
				var bgs = $(this).data('bgs');
				var a = {};
				a.size = {"w":size};
				a.id   = id;
				a.title= title;
				a.bg   = bg;
				a.bgSelected = bgs;
				typeData_no.push(a);
			});
			var a = {};
				a.size = {"w":50};
				a.id   = '555555555';
				a.title= '';
				a.bg   = '#fff';
				a.bgSelected = '#fff';
				typeData_no.push(a);
			return typeData_no;
		}
		function typeidsss(){
			var typeData_no = [];
			$("#yes .aui-col-xs-3").each(function(){
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				typeData_no.push(id);
			});
			return typeData_no;
		}
		function no(){
			var typeData_no = [];
			$("#no .aui-col-xs-3").each(function(){
				var size = $(this).data('size');
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				var title = $(this).data('title');
				var bg = $(this).data('bg');
				var bgs = $(this).data('bgs');
				var a = {};
				a.size = {"w":size};
				a.id   = id;
				a.title= title;
				a.bg   = bg;
				a.bgSelected = bgs;
				typeData_no.push(a);
			});
			return typeData_no;
		}
	</script>
</html>

			<a class="aui-pull-left aui-btn" tapmode onclick="_close(3)">
			<span class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-close"></span>　　
			</a>
			<div class="aui-title"></div>

			</a>
			{{? it.uid && it.userImg}}
			<a class="aui-pull-right aui-btn"  Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{=it.uid}}},'u_win');" >
			<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.userImg}}" src="../image/touxiang.png"  style="width: 1.3rem; height: 1.3rem;" class="aui-img-round"  Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{=it.uid}}},'u_win');" />

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
			set_frame_attr();
		}
		function set_frame_attr() {
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('fx-list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('fx-view'), evalData(api.pageParam['view']));
			api.parseTapmode();
			_imageCache();
			var header = $api.byId('aui-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var body = $api.byId('body');
			var body_offset = $api.offset(body);
			api.setFrameAttr({
				name : 'photo_browser_header',
				rect : {
					x : 0, 
					y : 0, 
					w : 'auto', 
					h : body_offset.h 
				}
			});
		}
		function close_photo_browser() {
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'photo_browser',
				script : 'close_photo_browser();'
			});
		}
		function test(msg) {
			api.toast({
				msg : msg,
				duration : 2000,
				location : 'middle'
			});
		}
		function fenxiang(){
			api.execScript({
				script : 'fenxiang();'
			});
		}
	</script>

		var mnPopups
		apiready = function() {
			mnPopups = api.require('MNPopups');
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){        
			   _heibai(1)
				_daily({name:'money_weitoutiao'})
			});
			_heibai(1)
			_openFrame('weitoutiao', '', '', '', true)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function shuaxin(){
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.aui-active img'),'Rotation')
			api.execScript({
				frameName:'weitoutiao',
				script: 'shuaxin()'
			});
		}

			</div>

			<div class="aui-pull-left" id="current">
				00:00
			</div>
			<div class="aui-pull-right" id="qq">
				<span class="">00:00</span>
				<img class="" src="../image/video_quanping_heng.png" tapmode onclick="_video('qq')" />

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var time = 0,zong=0;
		apiready = function() {
		}
		function formatSeconds2(a, hide) {
			var hh = parseInt(a / 3600);
			var mm = parseInt((a - hh * 3600) / 60);
			if (mm < 10)
				mm = "0" + mm;
			var ss = parseInt((a - hh * 3600) % 60);
			if (ss < 10)
				ss = "0" + ss;
			var length = mm + ":" + ss;
			if (a > 0) {
				return length;
			} else {
				return "00:00";
			}
		}
		function duration(a) {
			zong=a
			a = formatSeconds2(a);
			$api.text($api.dom('.fx-shu .aui-pull-right .aui-pull-left'), a);
			$api.text($api.dom('.fx-heng #qq span'), a);
			start()
		}
		function current(a) {
			var jindu=width(a,zong,100)
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-jindu'),'width: '+jindu+'%;')
			a = formatSeconds2(a);
			$api.text($api.dom('.fx-shu #current'), a);
			$api.text($api.dom('.fx-heng #current'), a);
			var timestamp = Date.parse(new Date());
			timestamp = timestamp / 1000
			if (timestamp == time) {
				hide();
			} else {
			}
		}
		function _video(type) {
			if (type == 'z') {
				var bd = $api.cssVal($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'display');
				if (bd == 'block') {
					var data = $api.attr($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type');
				} else {
					var data = $api.attr($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type');
				}
				var data = $api.attr($api.dom('.fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type');
				if (data == 1) {
					type = 'z';
					$api.attr($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type', '2');
					$api.addCls($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'fx-video-zanting');
					$api.attr($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type', '2');
					$api.addCls($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'fx-video-zanting');
				} else {
					type = 'b';
					$api.attr($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type', '1');
					$api.removeCls($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'fx-video-zanting');
					$api.attr($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type', '1');
					$api.removeCls($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'fx-video-zanting');
					hide()
				}
			} else if (type == 'q') {
				$api.css($api.dom('.fx-shu'), 'display: none');
				$api.css($api.dom('.fx-heng'), 'display: block');
			} else if (type == 'qq') {
				$api.css($api.dom('.fx-shu'), 'display: block');
				$api.css($api.dom('.fx-heng'), 'display: none');
			}
			var _video = '_video("' + type + '");';
			api.execScript({
				script : _video
			});
		}
		function hide() {
			api.execScript({
				script : '_frame("hide");'
			});
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'display: none');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'display: none');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-botton'), 'display: none');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-shu #current'), 'display: none');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-heng #current'), 'display: none');
			$api.css($api.dom('#qq'), 'display: none');
			$api.css($api.dom('body'), 'background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.0) !important');
			$api.attr($api.dom('.click'), 'data-type', '2');
		}
		function show() {
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'display: block');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'display: block');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-botton'), 'display: block');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-shu #current'), 'display: block');
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-heng #current'), 'display: block');
			$api.css($api.dom('#qq'), 'display: block');
			$api.css($api.dom('body'), 'background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important');
		}
		var timeID
		function click(times) {
			alert('123')
			time = times
			show();
		}
		function start() {
			hide();
		}
		function complete() {
			$api.attr($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type', '2');
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.fx-shu .fx-video-bofang'), 'fx-video-zanting');
			$api.attr($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'data-type', '2');
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.fx-heng .fx-video-bofang'), 'fx-video-zanting');
			show();
		}
		function pause() {
			show();
			clearTimeout(timeID);
		}
		function clicks() {
			var data=$api.attr($api.dom('.click'), 'data-type');
			if(data==2){
				$api.attr($api.dom('.click'), 'data-type', '1');
				var timestamp = Date.parse(new Date());
				timestamp = timestamp / 1000 + 2
				time=timestamp;
				show()
			}else{
				hide();
			}
		}
		function width(p, t, w) {
			return p / t * w;
		}
		function jindu(){
			$api.css($api.dom('.fx-jindu'),'width: 100%;')
		}
	</script>

	function x() {

		});

		apiready = function() {
			$api.text($api.dom('b'),api.pageParam['b'])
			api.parseTapmode();
			var _this = $api.dom('.b');
			var a =	$api.offset(_this).h;
			a = api.winHeight - a;
			a = a / 2;
			$api.css(_this,'top:'+a+"px"); 
			var _this = $api.dom('.b');
			var a =	$api.offset(_this).w;
			a = api.winWidth - a;
			a = a / 2;
			$api.css(_this,'left:'+a+"px"); 
		}
	</script>

		{{?it.data}}

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var typeid,timestamp,city='',moviePlayer,MNActionButton,svideodata = 0;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			$('.index-videos .wrap ul').css('width',api.winWidth+'px');
			timestamp = Date.parse(new Date());
			timestamp=timestamp/1000
			if(api.frameName == 'frame_0'){
				svideodata = 1;
			}
			typeid = api.pageParam['id'];
			if(typeid==888888888){
				city = decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(_getPrefs('city')));
				if(city){
					citybtn();
				}else{
					citybtn(1)
				}
			}
			_shangla(function(ret, err) {
				if(_getPrefs('token') || typeid != 999999999){
					if(typeid==888888888){
						if(!city){
							citybtn(1)
							return;
						}
						citybtn()
					}
					console.log(city)
					_lists('api/article/lists/svideodata/'+svideodata+'/typeid/' + typeid+'/date/'+timestamp+'/city/'+city, 1, 1);
				}else{
					$('#fx-view').html('');
					api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
					var h=api.winHeight/2-100;
					$('body').append('<a tapmode onclick="_url({url:\'login\',title:\'登录\',qian:1,fan:0,exe:\'1\'})" class="aui-btn aui-btn-danger qingdengli" style="position: fixed;margin:auto;left:0; right:0; top:0; bottom:0;width: 120px; height:38px; line-height:38px;text-align: center;margin-top:'+h+'px">请先登录</a>');
					api.parseTapmode();
				}
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/lists/svideodata/'+svideodata+'/typeid/' + typeid+'/date/'+timestamp+'/city/'+city,pagenum);
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.parseTapmode();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'ext'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if(ret){
			    	if(_getPrefs('token')){
						$('.qingdengli').remove();
					}
					api.refreshHeaderLoading();
			    }
			});
			MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
		};
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('fx-weitoutiao-guanzhuHivdeo')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('fx-weitoutiao-guanzhuHivdeo');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			}
		}
		function pingZan_xia(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud aui-margin-r-5"></i> ' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/zancai/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid,type:1})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function img(id,index){
			_url({id:id,qian:1,fan:1},'view_win')
		}
		function cityNews(){
			city = decodeURIComponent(decodeURIComponent(_getPrefs('city')));
			api.refreshHeaderLoading();
		}
		function citybtn(type){
			if(type==1){
				$('#sx-shoudongdingwei').show();
				$('.sx-bendichengshi').hide();
				_loadingCloes()
			}else{
				tianqi_name();
				$('#sx-shoudongdingwei').hide();
				$('.sx-bendichengshi').show();
			}
		}
		function citywin(){
			api.openWin({
			    name: 'citywin',
			    url: html_win+'city.html',
			    animation:{
				   	type:"fade",                
					subType:"from_right",       
					duration:300
				},
				bounces:false
			});
		}
		function videodata(id){
			var a = $('#id'+id);
			data=a.data('data')
			_url({data:data},'oxPlayer_frm');
			return;
			video(data);
		}
		var xiaoshipin_img = 0;
		var videoUrls
		function video(data) {
			var json = {};
			var json1 = data;
			var json2 = {
				root : 1
			};
			json = eval('(' + (JSON.stringify(json1) + JSON.stringify(json2)).replace(/}{/, ',') + ')');
			data = json;
			_ajax('api/article/clickAjax/id/'+data.id);
			xiaoshipin_img = 1
	 		videoUrls = data.video;
	 		moviePlayer.open({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : api.winHeight
				},
				showBack:false,
				autorotation:false,
 			 	videoDirection:'landscape',
 			 	seekBarDragable:false,
 			 	isShowStatusBar:false,
 			 	isShowControlView:false,
				path : data.video,
				autoPlay : true,
				scalingMode:'aspectFill',
				useGestureControl:false,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					win(data);
				}
			});
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : true
			});
		}
		function videoUrl() {
			moviePlayer.replay({
				path : videoUrls
			});
		}
		function huavideo(videodatga){
			videoUrls = videodatga
			videoUrl();
		}
		function win(data) {
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_img',
				url : html_win + 'xiaoshipin_img.html',
				bounces : false,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto',
				},
				pageParam : data,
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				animation:{
					type:"none",                
				    subType:"from_bottom",       
				    duration:300
				},
			})
		}
		function winclose() {
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_img'
			});
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_ping_win'
			});
			api.closeFrame({
				name : 'xiaoshipin_ping'
			});
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
			xiaoshipin_img = 0;
			MNActionButton.close();
		}
		function winfrem() {
			if (xiaoshipin_img == 1) {
				api.execScript({
					name:'xiaoshipin_win',
					frameName : 'xiaoshipin_img',
					script : 'guanbi()'
				});
				return;
			}
			_hone()
		}
		function pause(){
			moviePlayer.pause();
		}
		function start(){
			moviePlayer.play();
		}
		var fx_data
		function fenxiang() {
			fx_data=data
			fx_data={title:data.title,description:data.description,url:fx_url+"m/a/"+data.id+'.html',img:data.image+"?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100"}
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'},{icon: _image+'share/105.png',title: '举报'}];
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: 2,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        },
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else{
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type,data) {
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.content,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type,data){
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.content,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function _weibo(data) {
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.content,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
				}
			});
		}
		function tianqi_name(){
			var a = _getPrefs('tianqi');
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-tianqi-list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('sx-tianqi-view'), evalData(a));
		}
		function dates(){
			now = new Date(),hour = now.getHours()
			if(hour < 6){return false;}
			else if (hour < 9){return true;}
			else if (hour < 12){return true;}
			else if (hour < 14){return true;}
			else if (hour < 17){return true;}
			else if (hour < 19){return false;}
			else if (hour < 22){return false;}
			else {return false;}
		}
		function redian(){
			api.openWin({
			    name: 'redian_frm',
			    url: html_win + 'redian_frm.html',
			    bgColor:'#fff',
			    reload:true,
			    bounces:true
			});
		}
	</script>
</html>
