	<script type="text/javascript">
		var win_index=1;
		apiready = function() {
			mnPopups = api.require('MNPopups');
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				userImg()
				_heibai(1)
			});
			_heibai(1)
			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = 'xiaoshipin_' + i;
				frame.url = html_win + 'xiaoshipin.html';
				frame.pageParam = {
					id : i,
				};
				frames.push(frame);
				frames.useWKWebView = true;
				frames.historyGestureEnabled = true;
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames);
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'keyback'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				api.execScript({
					frameName : 'xiaoshipin_'+win_index,
					script : 'winfrem()'
				});
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function userImg(){
			return;
			var user=_getPrefs('user');
			if(user){
				$api.css($api.dom('.user1'),"display: block");
				$api.css($api.dom('.user2'),"display: none");
				$api.attr($api.dom('.sx-user-img'),"src",user.img);
			}else{
				$api.css($api.dom('.user1'),"display: none");
				$api.css($api.dom('.user2'),"display: block");
			}
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			api.parseTapmode();
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			var body_h = api.winHeight;
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('fx-footer'))
			var footerh = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'xiaoshipin',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h,
					w : 'auto',
					h : body_h - headerPos.h -  footerh,
				},
				index : 1,
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
				win_index=ret.index
				if(win_index==0){
					wodeshipping()
				}
				active(win_index)
			});
		}
		function active(index) {
			$api.removeCls($api.dom(".titles"), 'titles');
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.tab' + index), 'titles');
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index) {
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'xiaoshipin',
				index : index,
				scroll : true,	
			});
		}
		function wodeshipping(){
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'xiaoshipin_0',
				script : 'wodeshipping()'
			});
		}
		function shuaxin(){
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.aui-active img'),'Rotation')
			api.execScript({
				frameName:'xiaoshipin_'+win_index,
				script: 'shuaxin()'
			});
		}
	</script>

				 background: #000;

				<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-star"></i>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var id, inputField, uid = 0, fan, moviePlayer, znashiti;
		apiready = function() {
			_config  = _getPrefs('config')
			_heibai()
			oxPlayer = api.require('oxPlayer');
			oxPlayer.addEventListener(function(ret, err) {
					switch (ret.code) {
						case 0:
							_close();
							break;
						default:
					}
				});
			id = api.pageParam['id'];
			fan = api.pageParam['fan'];
			if (!id) {
				_alert("文章不存在或已被删除！", function(ret) {
					_hone();
				})
			}
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var headerh = $api.offset(header).h;
			headerh = headerh + $api.offset($api.dom('#video')).h+api.safeArea.top
			var body_h = api.winHeight;
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('fx-footer'))
			var footerh = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'view',
				url : html_win + 'view.html',
				bounces : true,
				reload : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerh,
					w : 'auto',
					h : body_h - headerh - footerh
				},
				pageParam : api.pageParam,
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
			})
			video()
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				_heibai()
				setTimeout(function() {
					_daily({
						name : 'money_news'
					})
				}, _config.yaoqing.money_news_time)
			});
				api.addEventListener({
					name : 'pause'
				}, function(ret, err) {
				oxPlayer.pause();
				});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'keyback'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				oxPlayer.isFull(function(ret) {
					if(ret.isFull){
						oxPlayer.exitFullScreen();
					}else{
						_close();
					}
        });
				return;
			});
								api.addEventListener({
								    name:'viewdisappear'
								}, function(ret, err){
									oxPlayer.pause();
								});
		}
		function video(urlv_video) {
			console.log(api.pageParam['videoUrl'])
			oxPlayer.fixdPlay({
				rect: {
					x: 0,
					y: api.safeArea.top,
					w: api.winWidth,
					h: $('#video').height()+25
				},
				fixedOn: api.frameName,
				fixed: true,
				showBack: true, 
				showSelect: false, 
				showSpeed: false, 
				showDlna: {
					small: false,
					full: false
				}, 
				showShot: {
					small: false,
					full: false
				}, 
				showBottomProcess: true,
				autoPlay: true, 
				openCache: true, 
				styles: [],
				index: 0,
				hideControl:false,
				showMore:{small:false,full:false},
				showDlna:{small:false,full:false},
				showDunmaku:{small:false,full:false},
				showShot:false,
				loop:false,
				data: [{
						thumb: _image + 'load-video.png',
						url: api.pageParam['videoUrl']
					}
				]
			});
			return;
			var h = $('#video').height();
			var a = $('#fx-header').height();
			moviePlayer.open({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : a,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : h
				},
				videoDirection : 'landscape',
				path : urlv_video ? urlv_video : api.pageParam['videoUrl'],
				autoPlay : true,
				autorotation:false,
				styles : {
					head : {
						bg : 'rgba(161,161,161,0)',
						height : 44,
						y : 20,
						backSize : 30,
						backImg : _image + 'leftbofang.png',
					},
					foot : {
						bg : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
						height : 44,
						palyBtn : {
							size : 15,
							playImg :  _image + 'fx_bofang_s.png',
							pauseImg : _image + 'fx_zanting_s.png',
							marginLeft : 15
						},
						currentTimeLabel : {
							textSize : 14,
							textColor : "#FFF",
							textWidth : 43,
							marginLeft : 15
						},
						seekBar : {
							sliderW : 20,
							sliderH : 20,
							progressColor : '#696969',
							progressSelected : '#F85959',
							marginLeft : 15,
							marginRight : 15
						},
						totalTimeLabel : {
							textSize : 14,
							textColor : "#FFF",
							textWidth : 43,
							marginRight : 15
						},
						fullscreenBtn : {
							size : 30,
							verticalImg : _image + '2019/video_quan.png',
							horizontalImg : _image + '2019/video_quan_tui.png',
						}
					}
				},
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
			return;
			playModule.play({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : a,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : h
				},
				url : api.pageParam['videoUrl'],
				defaultBtn : true,
				enableFull : false,
				isBackBtn : true,
				title : api.pageParam['title'],
				isTopView : true,
				isLocalCache : true,
			});
			return;
		}
		function gundong() {
			var gundong = 'gundong();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : gundong
			});
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			var fenxiang = 'fenxiang();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : fenxiang
			});
		}
		function shoucang(ojb) {
			if (!_user) {
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var type = $(ojb).data('id');
			if (type == 1) {
				_ajax('api/member/favoriteAdd', function(ret, err) {
					_loadingCloes()
					if (ret.ret) {
						$(ojb).data('id', '2')
						$(ojb).css("color", "#FCACAC")
						_msg(ret.ret)
					} else {
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}, {
					aid : id
				})
			} else {
				_ajax('api/member/favoriteDel', function(ret, err) {
					_loadingCloes()
					if (ret.ret) {
						$(ojb).data('id', '1')
						$(ojb).css("color", "")
						_msg(ret.ret)
					} else {
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}, {
					aid : id
				})
			}
		}
		function _views(shoucang, pingNum) {
			if (shoucang) {
				$('#shoucang').data('id', '2')
				$('#shoucang').css("color", "#FCACAC")
			}
			if (pingNum) {
				$('#pingNum').data('num', pingNum)
				$('#pingNum').text(pingNum)
			} else {
				$('#pingNum').hide();
			}
		}
		function pingNum() {
			var num = $('#pingNum').data('num')
			$('#pingNum').show();
			$('#pingNum').text(num + 1)
			$('#pingNum').data('num', num + 1)
		}
		function pingAdd() {
			var pingAdd = 'pingAdd();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : pingAdd
			});
		}
		function title(text, uids) {
			uid = uids;
			if (uid || text) {
				$('.aui-title').text(text)
			} else {
				$('.aui-title').text('内容详细')
			}
		}
		function userUrl() {
			if (uid) {
				_url({
					id : uid
				}, 'u_win')
			}
		}
		function dibugaodu() {
			var h = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : 'dibugaodu(' + h + ');'
			});
		}
		function replay(path){
			oxPlayer.updateAll({
				data:[{
					thumb:_image + 'load-video.png',
					url:path
				}]
			});
			oxPlayer.playIndex({index:0});
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var content = $api.byId('fx-header');
		var gradualChange = $api.offset(content).h / 2;
		var _h = 0;
		var timestamp
		apiready = function() {
			var date = new Date();
			var weekday = ["星期日","星期一","星期二","星期三","星期四","星期五","星期六"];
			$('.aui-timeline-item-header').text((date.getMonth() + 1) + '.'+date.getDate()+" "+weekday[date.getDay()]);
			timestamp = Date.parse(new Date());
			timestamp=timestamp/1000
			_lists('api/article/lists/flags/2/date/'+timestamp, 1, 1);
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/lists/flags/2/date/'+timestamp, pagenum);
				}
			});
			$api.fixStatusBar(content);
			api.openFrame({
	            name: 'redian_win',
	            url: html_win + 'redian_win.html',
	            bounces: false,
	            vScrollBarEnabled: false,
	            hScrollBarEnabled: false,
	            bgColor: 'rgb(0,0,0,0)',
	            rect: {
	                x: 0,
	                y: 0,
	                w: 'auto',
	                h: 0
	            },
	            hidden:false
	        });
			var k = 0;
			window.onscroll = function(e) {
	            var scrollTop = document.body.scrollTop;   
				$api.css($api.dom('.a2 p'),'opacity:'+(1-(scrollTop / (gradualChange + _h))));
	            if (scrollTop > _h) {
	            	scrollTop = scrollTop - _h     
	            }else{
	            	scrollTop = 0;
	            }
	            api.execScript({
					frameName: 'redian_win',
					script: 'show('+(scrollTop / gradualChange )+')'
				});
	        };
		}
		function h(a){
			_h = a;
			gradualChange = gradualChange - _h
			api.setFrameAttr({
			    name: 'redian_win',
			    rect: {
	                x: 0,
	                y: 0,
	                w: 'auto',
	                h: a
	            },
			});
		}
		function formatDate(a) { 
			var now=new Date(a*1000); 
		     var month=now.getMonth()+1; 
		     var date=now.getDate(); 
		     var hour=now.getHours(); 
		     var minute=now.getMinutes(); 
			if(month < 10){
				month = "0"+month;
			}
			if(hour < 10){
				hour = "0"+hour;
			}
			if(minute < 10){
				minute = "0"+minute;
			}
			var day2 = new Date();
 			var j_d = day2.getDate();
 			if(j_d == date){
				return hour+":"+minute;
			}
 			var j_d_1 = day2.getDate()-1;
			if(j_d_1 == date){
				return "昨天 "+hour+":"+minute;
			}
 			var j_d_1 = day2.getDate()-2;
			if(j_d_1 == date){
				return "前天 "+hour+":"+minute;
			}
 			if(date < 10){
				date = "0"+date;
			}
		    return month+"-"+date+" "+hour+":"+minute;
		} 
	</script>

			<div id="asd">
				<img id="img" src="../image/jindu.png" />
				<div id="text"><img src="../image/qh.png" /> + <b>0</b></div>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script>
		var time = 0 ,jindu_time = 1;
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			time = parseInt(_config.yaoqing.money_jindu_time) * 5.8;
			if(!time){
				time = 175;
			}
			api.parseTapmode();
			time = 10 / time;
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				jindu_time = 1;
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewdisappear'
			}, function(ret, err){
				jindu_time = 0;
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'pause'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				jindu_time = 0;
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'resume'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				jindu_time = 1;
			});
		}
		window.onload = function() {
			var canvas = document.getElementById('canvas'), 
			context = canvas.getContext('2d'), 
			centerX = canvas.width / 2, 
			centerY = canvas.height / 2, 
			rad = Math.PI * 2 / 100
			speed = 1;
			function blueCircle(n) {
				context.save();
				context.strokeStyle = "#FF4927";
				context.lineWidth = 55;
				context.beginPath();
				context.arc(centerX, centerY, 100, -Math.PI / 2, -Math.PI / 2 + n * rad, false);
				context.stroke();
				context.closePath();
				context.restore();
			}
			function whiteCircle() {
				context.save();
				context.beginPath();
				context.lineWidth = 55;
				context.strokeStyle = "#FFF8F7";
				context.arc(centerX, centerY, 100, 0, Math.PI * 2, false);
				context.stroke();
				context.closePath();
				context.restore();
			}
			function text(n) {
				context.save();
				context.strokeStyle = "#fff";
				context.font = "50px Arial";
				context.strokeText(n.toFixed(0) + "%", centerX - 25, centerY + 10);
				context.stroke();
				context.restore();
			}
			( function drawFrame() {
					if (speed > 101) {
						speed = 0
						_ajax('api/yaoqing/daily/type/money_jindu',function(ret,err){
							if(ret){
								if(ret.jinbi){
									var _text = $('#text');
									var _img = $('#img');
									_text.html('<img src="../image/qh.png" /> + <b>'+ret.jinbi+'</b>');
									_img.animate({left:"-60px"},500);
									_text.animate({left:"0px"},500);
									setTimeout(function(){
										_img.animate({left:"0px"});
										_text.animate({left:"60px"});
										window.requestAnimationFrame(drawFrame);
									},3000)
								}else{
									_setPrefs('money_jindu', _myDate());
									setTimeout(function(){
										api.closeFrame();
									},300)
								}
							}else{
							}
						})
						return;
					};
					window.requestAnimationFrame(drawFrame);
					if(jindu_time){
						context.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
						whiteCircle();
						blueCircle(speed);
						speed += time;
					}
				}());
		}
	</script>
</html>

		<style>
			.ad, .ad img {
				width: 100%;
			}
			#djs {
				position: fixed;
				top: 2rem;
				right: 0.75rem;
				background: #888;
				color: #fff;
				padding: 0.3rem 1rem;
				font-size: 0.55rem;
				border-radius: 0.25rem
			}
			#t{
				position: fixed;
				bottom:2rem;
				right: 0.75rem;

		</div>
		<em  tapmode onclick="c()" id="djs">跳过 <b>0</b></em>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var s = 0,data,adjson
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'keyback'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
			api.parseTapmode();
			adjson=_getPrefs('ad');
			data=adjson.data
			var image=_getPrefs('adimage');
			$api.html($api.dom('.ad'),'<img src="'+image+'"  />');
			s=adjson.config.time;
			$api.text($api.dom('#djs b'),s);
			djs()
			adAjax()
		}
		function djs() {
			setTimeout(function(){
				$api.text($api.dom('#djs b'),s);
				if(s==0){
					c()
					return;
				}else{
					djs()
				}
				s--
			}, 1000)
		}
		function c(){
			api.closeWin();
		}
		function url(){
			_url({url:data.url,title:data.title},'curl')
			c()
		}
		function adAjax(){
			var id=_getPrefs('ad').data.id;
			_ajax('api/article/ad/id/'+id,function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						_setPrefs('ad', ret.ret);
						s=ret.ret.config.time
						$api.text($api.dom('#djs b'),s);
						api.imageCache({
							url : fx_cdn+ret.ret.data.img+'?imageView2/3/w/'+api.winWidth+'/h/'+api.winHeight+'/format/jpg',
							thumbnail:false,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								if (ret.status) {
									_setPrefs('adimage', ret.url);
								}
							}
						});
						return;
					}
				}
				_removePrefs('ad')
				_removePrefs('adimage')
			})
		}
	</script>
</html>

								获取验证码
							</div> </span>
					</div>
				</li>
			</ul>
			<div class="aui-btn-blocks aui-margin-15">
				<div class="aui-btn aui-btn-block aui-btn-danger" id="tijiao">
					提交找回

		<script type="text/javascript">
			var _user;
			apiready = function() {
				_init()
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
				if (_user.mobile) {
					$('#username').val(_user.mobile);
				}
				FastClick.attach(document.body);
				$('#tijiao').click(function() {
					var username = $('#username').val();
					var password = $('#password').val();
					var code = $('#code').val();
					if (!username) {
						_alert('手机号码不能空', function(ret, err) {
							$('#username').focus()
						})
						return;
					}
					if (!_isMobile(username)) {
						_alert('请输入正确手机号码', function(ret, err) {
							$('#username').focus()
						})
						return;
					}
					if (!password) {
						_alert('请设置新密码', function(ret, err) {
							$('#password').focus()
						})
						return;
					}
					if (!code) {
						_alert('手机验证码不能为空', function(ret, err) {
							$('#code').focus()
						})
						return;
					}
					_loading()
					_ajax('api/user/password', function(ret, err) {
						_loadingCloes();
						if (ret.ret) {
							_uot()
							if (_user) {
								_alert(ret.ret, function(ret) {
									_hone()
								})
							} else {
								_alert(ret.ret, function(ret) {
									_close()
								})
							}
						} else {
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}, {
						username : username,
						password : password,
						code : code
					})
				})
				$('#sendVerify').click(function() {
					var mobileVal = $('#username').val();
					if (!mobileVal) {
						_alert('请输入手机号码', function(ret, err) {
							$('#username').focus()
						})
						return false;
					}
					if (!_isMobile(mobileVal)) {
						_alert('请输入正确手机号码', function(ret, err) {
							$('#username').focus()
						})
						return;
					}
					var status = $('#sendVerify').attr('status');
					if (status != 1) {
						return;
					}
					_loading()
					_ajax('api/index/code', function(ret, err) {
						if (ret.ret) {
							$("#sendVerify").html('<span id="GetVerify">120</span>S');
							times = 119;
							isinerval = setInterval("CountDown()", 1000);
							setTimeout(function() {
								_alert(ret.ret)
								$('#sendVerify').attr('status', '0');
							}, 500)
						} else {
							_alert(ret.err)
						}
						_loadingCloes()
					}, {
						username : mobileVal,
						text : '找回密码'
					})
				})
			}
			var smsVerify
			function CountDown() {
				if (times < 1) {
					var sendVerify = $('#sendVerify');
					$(sendVerify).attr('onclick', 'getVerify()');
					$(sendVerify).attr('status', '1');
					$(sendVerify).html('重新获取');
					clearInterval(isinerval);
					return;
				}
				var getVerify = $('#GetVerify');
				$(getVerify).html('' + times + '');
				times--;
			}
			function _isMobile(mobile) {
				if (mobile == "") {
					return false;
				} else {
					if (! /^0{0,1}(13[0-9]|15[0-9]|17[0-9]|18[0-9]|14[0-9])[0-9]{8}$/.test(mobile)) {
						return false;
					}
					return true;
				}
			}
		</script>
	</body>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var sx
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			sx=api.pageParam
			aid = api.pageParam['id'];
			$('#sx-huifuNum').text(api.pageParam['pingNum']+'条回复')
			api.parseTapmode();
			var header=$api.offset($api.dom('header')).h;
			$api.css($api.dom('.pingList'),'margin-top: '+header+"px");
			_lists('api/article/pingList/aid/'+aid, 1, 1);
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : 500 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/pingList/aid/'+aid, pagenum,'');
				}
			});
		};
		function g(){
			api.execScript({
					frameName : 'xiaoshipin_img',
					script : 'xiaoshipin_ping_win_url()'
				}); 
			api.closeFrame({
			    name: 'xiaoshipin_ping_win'
			});
		}
		function pingZan(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/pingZan/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function pingnum(text){
			$('#sx-huifuNum').text(text+'条回复')
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var uid,mychannel;
		apiready = function() {
			_init()
			uid=api.pageParam['id'];
			if(!uid){ 
				uid=api.pageParam['uid'];
				if(!uid){
					return;
				}
			}
			mychannel=api.pageParam['mychannel']
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/'+mychannel+'/uid/'+uid, 1, 1);
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/'+mychannel+'/uid/'+uid, pagenum);
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		};
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('fx-weitoutiao-guanzhuHivdeo')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('fx-weitoutiao-guanzhuHivdeo');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} 
		}
		function pingZan_xia(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud aui-margin-r-5"></i> ' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/zancai/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid,type:1})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function img(id,index){
			_url({id:id,qian:1,fan:1},'view_win') 
		}
		function del(id){
			api.actionSheet({
			    cancelTitle: '取消',
			    destructiveTitle: '确认要删除吗？',
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
			 	if(index==1){
			 		_loading('正在删除')
			 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
						if(ret){
							_loadingCloes()
							_msg(ret.ret ? ret.ret : ret.err)
							if(ret.ret){
								$('#id'+id).remove();
							}
						}
					},{aid:id})
			 	}
			});
		}
	</script>

	<head>

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/view.css" />
	</head>
	<body>
		<header class="aui-bar aui-bar-nav fx-view-header " id="fx-header">

				加载中

					请输入评论内容
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="aui-bar-tab-item" tapmode style="width: 2.2rem;" tapmode  onclick="gundong()">
				<div class="aui-badge" id="pingNum" data-num="0">
					0
				</div>
				<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-comment"></i>
			</div>

				<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-star"></i>
			</div>
			<div class="aui-bar-tab-item" tapmode onclick="fenxiang()" style="width: 2.2rem;margin-right: 0.5rem;">
				<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-share"></i>
			</div>
		</footer>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var id, inputField,uid=0,fan;
		apiready = function() {
	 		_init();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1);
				setTimeout(function(){
					_daily({name:'money_news'})
				},_config.yaoqing.money_news_time)
			});
			fan=api.pageParam['fan'];
			_heibai(api.pageParam['qian']);
			id = api.pageParam['id'];
			if(!id){
				_alert("文章不存在或已被删除！",function(ret){
					_hone();
				})
				return;
			}
			_openFrame('view', '', '', api.pageParam, 1)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function gundong() {
			var gundong = 'gundong();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : gundong
			});
		}
		function fenxiang(){
			var fenxiang = 'fenxiang();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : fenxiang
			});
		}
		function shoucang(ojb){
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var type=$(ojb).data('id');
			if(type==1){
				_ajax('api/member/favoriteAdd',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(ojb).data('id','2')
						$(ojb).css("color","#FCACAC")
						_msg(ret.ret)
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{aid:id})
			}else{
				_ajax('api/member/favoriteDel',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(ojb).data('id','1')
						$(ojb).css("color","")
						_msg(ret.ret)
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{aid:id})
			}
		}
		function _views(shoucang,pingNum){
			if(shoucang){
				$('#shoucang').data('id','2')
				$('#shoucang').css("color","#FCACAC")
			}
			if(pingNum){
				$('#pingNum').data('num',pingNum)
				$('#pingNum').text(pingNum)
			}else{
				$('#pingNum').hide();
			}
		}
		function pingNum(){
			var num=$('#pingNum').data('num')
			$('#pingNum').show();
			$('#pingNum').text(num+1)
			$('#pingNum').data('num',num+1)
		}
		function pingAdd(){
			var pingAdd='pingAdd();';
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : pingAdd
			});
		}
		function title(text,uids){
			uid=uids;
			if(uid && text){
				$('.aui-title').text(text)
			}else{
				$('.aui-title').text('内容详细')
			}
		}
		function userUrl(){
			if(uid){
				_url({id:uid},'u_win')
			}
		}
		function c(){
			_close(fan)
		}
		function dibugaodu(){
			var h = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			api.execScript({
				frameName : 'view',
				script : 'dibugaodu('+h+');'
			});
		}
	</script>

			{{??}}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var typeid,text,mychannel;
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			text = api.pageParam['text'];
			mychannel = api.pageParam['mychannel'];
			if(!mychannel){mychannel=0}
			if(!text){
				_msg('请输入搜索关键词')
				return;
			}
			_shangla(function(ret, err) {
				_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/' + mychannel, 1, 1,{search:text});
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/' + mychannel, pagenum,0,{search:text});
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'shifdakai'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    text=ret.value.text;
			    api.refreshHeaderLoading();
			});
		};
		function img(id,index){
			_url({id:id,qian:1,fan:1},'view_win') 
		}
		function delHtmlTag(str)
		{
		return str.replace(/<[^>]+>/g,"");
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var index, total, texts,aid,pingNum;
		apiready = function() {
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('body'))
			aid=api.pageParam['view'].id;
			pingNum=api.pageParam['view'].pingNum;
			_shoucang(api.pageParam['view'].shoucang)
			api.parseTapmode();
			index = api.pageParam.index;
			texts = api.pageParam.texts;
			$api.html($api.byId('total'), api.pageParam.total);
			if (api.pageParam.comment_num > 0) {
				var comment_num_el = $api.byId('comment_num');
				comment_num_el.style.display = "inline";
				$api.html(comment_num_el, api.pageParam.comment_num);
			}
			set_frame_attr(index, true);
		}
		function set_frame_attr(index, tool_show) {
			$api.html($api.byId('index'), index + 1);
			$api.html($api.byId('texts'), "undefined" != typeof texts[index] ? texts[index] : '');
			if (tool_show == false) {
				return false;
			}
			var body = $api.byId('body');
			var body_offset = $api.offset(body);
			api.setFrameAttr({
				name : 'photo_browser_foot',
				rect : {
					x : 0, 
					y : api.pageParam.winHeight - body_offset.h, 
					w : 'auto', 
					h : 'auto' 
				}
			});
		}
		function test(msg) {
			api.toast({
				msg : msg,
				duration : 2000,
				location : 'middle'
			});
		}
		function shoucang(ojb) {
			if (!_user) {
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var type = $(ojb).data('id');
			if (type == 1) {
				_ajax('api/member/favoriteAdd', function(ret, err) {
					_loadingCloes()
					if (ret.ret) {
						$(ojb).data('id', '2')
						$(ojb).css("color", "#FCACAC")
						_msg(ret.ret)
					} else {
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}, {
					aid : api.pageParam['view'].id
				})
			} else {
				_ajax('api/member/favoriteDel', function(ret, err) {
					_loadingCloes()
					if (ret.ret) {
						$(ojb).data('id', '1')
						$(ojb).css("color", "")
						_msg(ret.ret)
					} else {
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}, {
					aid : api.pageParam['view'].id
				})
			}
		}
		function gundong(){
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
			_url({aid:aid,pingNum:pingNum,qian:1,fan:0},'view_ping_win')
		}
		function pingAdd(){
			api.execScript({
				script : 'pingAdd();'
			});
		}
		function fenxiang(){
			api.execScript({
				script : 'fenxiang();'
			});
		}
		function _shoucang(shoucang){
			if(shoucang){
				$('#shoucang').data('id','2')
				$('#shoucang').css("color","#FCACAC")
			}
		}
	</script>

		var fan
		apiready = function() {
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_heibai(1);
			fan=api.pageParam['fan'];
			$api.html($api.dom('.aui-title'), api.pageParam['title'])
			_openFrame(api.pageParam['url'], '', '1', api.pageParam, api.pageParam['useHi'])
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function c(){
			_close(fan)
		}

		apiready = function() {
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar($api.dom('.b'));
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			api.execScript({
			    script: 'h('+headerPos.h+')'
			});
		}
		function show(opacity){
			$('header').css('opacity',opacity);
		}
		function hide(opacity){
			$('header').css('opacity',opacity);
		}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var videoUrl
		apiready = function() {
			$api.fixStatusBar($api.dom('.aui-pull-left'));
			videoUrl=api.pageParam['videoUrl'] ? api.pageParam['videoUrl'] : '';
			if(!videoUrl){
			 	_close();
			 	return;
			}
			FastClick.attach(document.body);
		}
		function em(){
			var len=$('textarea').val().length;
			$('em').text(len);
		}
		function fabu(){
			$("textarea").blur();
			_loading('视频上传中...')
			api.ajax({
			    url: fx_url+'api/member/videoUpload',
			    method: 'post',
			    timeout:6000000000,
			    data: {
			    	values:{
			    		token:_getPrefs('token'),
			    	},
			        files: {
			            video: videoUrl
			        }
			    },
			}, function(ret, err) {
				console.log('视频：'+JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
			    if (ret) {
 					if(ret.err){
 						_loadingCloes();
 						_msg(ret.err)
 					}else{
 						var videojson=ret.ret.persistentId;
 						var videourl=ret.ret.key;
 						var title=$('textarea').val();
						_ajax('api/member/articleAdd',function(ret,err){
							_loadingCloes();
							if(ret){
								if(ret.ret){
									_alert(ret.ret,function(ret){
										_close()
									})
								}else{
									_alert(ret.err)
								}
							}else{
								alert(JSON.stringify(err));
							}
						},{title:title,mychannel:4,video:videojson,videourl:videourl,image:api.pageParam['img']})
 					}
			    } else {
			    	_loadingCloes();
			        api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
			    }
			});
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			if(api.pageParam['textsearch']){
				var text=api.pageParam['textsearch'];
				api.execScript({
					name : 'search_win',
					script : 'key("' + text + '")'
				});
			}else{
				view()
			}
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function view() {
			if(api.pageParam['text']){
				lists(api.pageParam['text'])
				api.execScript({
					script : 'title("'+api.pageParam['text']+'")'
				});
			}else{
				var searchText = _getPrefs('searchText');
				if (searchText) {
					var textHtml = "";
					if (searchText.indexOf(",") > 0) {
						var strs = new Array();
						strs = searchText.split(",");
						for (var i = 0; i < strs.length; i++) {
							textHtml += '<div class="aui-col-xs-6 aui-border-r" tapmode onclick=\'key("'+strs[i]+'")\'>';
							textHtml += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1 asdasd123">' + strs[i] + '</div>';
							textHtml += '</div>';
						}
					} else {
						textHtml += '<div class="aui-col-xs-6 aui-border-r" tapmode onclick=\'key("'+searchText+'")\'>';
						textHtml += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1">' + searchText+ '</div>';
						textHtml += '</div>';
					}
					$('#textHtml').html(textHtml);
				}
				var html = "";
 		 			var ret= new Array();
		 			ret = _config.config.guanjianci.split(',');
					console.log(ret)
  					if (ret) {
						for (var i = 0; i < ret.length; i++) {
							html += '<div class="aui-col-xs-6 aui-border-r" tapmode onclick="key(\''+ret[i]+'\')">';
							html += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1">' + ret[i] + '</div>';
							html += '</div>';
						}
					} else {
						html += '<h6 class="aui-text-center aui-padded-15 aui-font-size-14">暂无推荐词</h6>'
					}
					$('#html').html(html);
			}
		}
		function hide() {
			$('.fx-chakan').show();
			$('.remen').hide();
			$('#html').hide();
		}
		function show() {
			$('.fx-chakan').hide();
			$('.remen').show();
			$('#html').show();
		}
		function del() {
			$('#textHtml').html();
			$('#lishi').hide();
			api.execScript({
				script : 'del()'
			});
		}
		function searchList(data) {
			$('#lishi').hide();
			$('#tuijian').hide();
			$('#searchList').show();
		}
		function lishi() {
			$('#lishi').show();
			$('#tuijian').show();
			$('#searchList').hide();
		}
		var shifdakai=0;
		function lists(text){
			searchList()
			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = i;
				frame.url =  html_win+'search_frame.html';
				frame.pageParam = {
					mychannel : i,
					text:text,
				};
				frame.bgColor = '#fff';
				frames.push(frame);
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames)
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			var header = $api.byId('searchList');
			var header = $api.offset(header);
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'search',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : header.h+api.pageParam['w'],
					w : 'auto',
					h : api.winHeight-header.h-api.pageParam['w']
				},
				index : 0,
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0, 
				bgColor : '#fff'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.index;
				active(index)
			});
			shifdakai=1;
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index) {
			active(index)
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'search',
				index : index,
				scroll : true, 
			});
		}
		function active(index) {
			$api.removeCls($api.dom(".fx-tab .hover"), 'hover');
			$api.addCls($api.byId('tab' + index), 'hover');
		}
		function key(text){
			if(!text){
				_msg("请输入关键词搜索")
				return;
			}
			var key='key("'+text+'")';
			api.execScript({
				script : key
			});
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var uid,fx_data
		apiready = function() {
			var header = $api.dom('.fx-member-top');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			api.parseTapmode();
			if(_yejian){
				$('#yejian').html('<img src="../image/member-rijian.png" /><div class="aui-grid-label">日间</div>')
			}else{
				$('#yejian').html('<img src="../image/member-yejian.png" /><div class="aui-grid-label">夜间</div>')
			}
			view();
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
			 	viewAjax();
			},1)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				viewAjax();
				_daily({name:'money_login'})
			});	
		}
		function view(){
			_user=_getPrefs('user')
			if(!_user || _user=='undefined'){
				_uot()
				_user='';
			}
			if(!_user){
				$('.fx-login-disf').show('style')
				$('.fx-login-disf2').hide('style')
				$('#dongtai').text(0)
				$('#fensi').text(0)
				$('#fangke').text(0);
				$('#guanzhuList').html('');
				var l=$('.sx-wode .aui-col-xs-4');
				l.eq(0).children('.aui-grid-label').text('0个');
				l.eq(1).children('.aui-grid-label').text('￥0.00');
				l.eq(2).children('.aui-grid-label').text('0人');
			}else{
				$('.fx-login-disf').hide('style')
				$('.fx-login-disf2').show('style')
				$('#username').text(_user.username);
				uid=_user.id
				$('#userImg').attr('src',_user.img)
				$('#dongtai').text(_user.dongtai)
				$('#fensi').text(_user.fensi)
				$('#fangke').text(_user.fangke);
				if(!_user.yaoqing.s1){
					$('#zailingmoney').text('再领取'+_config.yaoqing.money_yaoqing+'元红包')
					$('.yaoqingma').show();
				}else{
					$('.yaoqingma').hide()
				}
				var l=$('.sx-wode .aui-col-xs-4');
				l.eq(0).children('.aui-grid-label').text(_user.yaoqing.jinbi+'个');
				l.eq(1).children('.aui-grid-label').text('￥'+(_user.yaoqing.money/100).toFixed(2));
				l.eq(2).children('.aui-grid-label').text(_user.yaoqing.tudi_num+'人');
				fx_data={
					title:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_title,
					description:_config.yaoqing.fenxiang_content,
					img:_image+'logo.png',
					url:fx_url+'m/yaoqing/uid/'+_getPrefs('user').id
				}
			}
			if(!_getPrefs('app')){
				$('.fx-login-disf .aui-row').removeAttr('style');
				$('.fx-member-yaoqing .aui-grid').removeAttr('style');
			}
			var yaoqing=$(".fx-member-yaoqing .aui-list-item-title p");
			yaoqing.eq(0).text(_config.yaoqing.title);
			yaoqing.eq(1).text(_config.yaoqing.msg);
			$('#renwu').text(_config.yaoqing.renwu);
			$('#duihuan').text(_config.yaoqing.duihuan);
			_imageCache();
		}
		function views(){
			_user='';
			_token='';
			view()
		}
		function viewAjax(){
			_user=_getPrefs('user')
			if(!_user){
				api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
				view()
				return;
			}
			_ajax('api/member/info', function(ret, err) {
				api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret));
				if (ret) {
					_setPrefs('user', ret.ret);
					_user=ret.ret
					view()
					api.parseTapmode();
					_imageCache();
				} else {
					_uot()
					_alert('请重新登录',function(ret,err){
						_login();
					})
				}
			})
		}
		function yejian(){
			var yejian = 'yejian();';
			api.execScript({
				name: 'root',
			    script: yejian
			});
			if(_yejian){
				$('#yejian').html('<img src="../image/member-yejian.png" /><div class="aui-grid-label">夜间</div>');
			}else{
				$('#yejian').html('<img src="../image/member-rijian.png" /><div class="aui-grid-label">日间</div>');
			} 
		}
		function _u(){
			_url({uid:uid},'u_win')
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if(_getPrefs('app')){
				var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
				sharedModule.share({
					text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
					type : 'text'
				});
				return;
			}
			var row=2;
			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制链接'}];
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: row,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        }, 
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title+fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} 
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content+fx_data.url,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==9){	
						if(!_user){
							_alert('请先登录',function(ret,err){
								_login();
							})
							return;
						}
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							if(index==8){
								_url({aid:id,url:'member/jubaoAdd',title:'举报内容'})
								return;
							}
							if(index!=9){
								_ajax('api/member/jubao',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										if(ret.ret){
											_msg(ret.ret)
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}else{
										_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
									}
								},{content:buttons[index - 1],aid:id})
							}
						});
					}else if(index==10){
						api.actionSheet({
						    cancelTitle: '取消',
						    destructiveTitle: '确认要删除吗？',
						}, function(ret, err) {
						    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
						 	if(index==1){
						 		_loading('正在删除')
						 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
									if(ret){
										_loadingCloes()
										if(ret.ret){
											var view = 'view();';
											api.execScript({
											    name: 'weitoutiao_win',
								    			frameName: 'weitoutiao',
											    script: view
											});
											_alert(ret.ret,function(ret,err){
												_close(1)
											})
										}else{
											_msg(ret.err)
										}
									}
								},{aid:article.id})
						 	}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type) {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功')
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type){
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				} 
			});
		}
		function _weibo() {
			if(!_getPrefs('user')){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			data=fx_data;
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_1'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _fenxiangimg(){
			api.imageCache({
				url : sx_gurl+sx.image,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret.status){
					fenxiangimg=ret.url;
				}
			});
		}
	</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    apiready = function(){
		var ver = api.version;
		var sType = api.systemType;
		var sVer = api.systemVersion;
		var id = api.deviceId;
		var model = api.deviceModel;
		var name = api.deviceName;
		var cType = api.connectionType;
		var winName = api.winName;
		var winWidth = api.winWidth;
		var winHeight = api.winHeight;
		var frameName = api.frameName || '';
		var frameWidth = api.frameWidth || '';
		var frameHeight = api.frameHeight || '';
		var str = '<ul>';
		str += '<li>引擎版本信息: ' + ver + '</li>';
		str += '<li>系统类型: ' + sType + '</li>';
		str += '<li>系统版本: ' + sVer + '</li>';
		str += '<li>设备标识: ' + id + '</li>';
		str += '<li>设备型号: ' + model + '</li>';
		str += '<li>设备名称: ' + name + '</li>';
		str += '<li>网络状态: ' + cType + '</li>';
		str += '<li>主窗口名字: ' + winName + '</li>';
		str += '<li>主窗口宽度: ' + winWidth + '</li>';
		str += '<li>主窗口高度: ' + winHeight + '</li>';
		str += '<li>子窗口名字: ' + frameName + '</li>';
		str += '<li>子窗口宽度: ' + frameWidth + '</li>';
		str += '<li>子窗口高度: ' + frameHeight + '</li>';
		str += '</ul>';
		$api.byId('sys-info').innerHTML = str;
    };
</script>

		apiready = function() {
			api.parseTapmode();
			$api.html($api.dom('#_daily_2_2 h1'),api.pageParam['h1'])
			$api.html($api.dom('#_daily_2_2 span'),api.pageParam['span'])
			var w=api.winWidth/2;
			var h=api.winHeight;
			var div=$api.offset($api.dom('#_daily_2_1')).h;
			div=(h-div)/2;
			$api.css($api.dom('#_daily_2_1'),'padding-top:'+div+'px');
			$api.css($api.dom('#_daily_2_2'),'padding-top:'+div+'px');
		}
		function g() {
			api.closeFrame();
		}
	</script>

			</div>
			<div class="aui-bar-tab-item" tapmode onclick="_index_win('xiaoshipin_win')">
				<img class="aui-img-object" src="../image/2019/bj4.png" />
				<div class="aui-bar-tab-label">
					小视频
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="aui-bar-tab-item" tapmode onclick="_index_win('member_win')">
				<img class="aui-img-object" src="../image/2019/aqi.png" />
				<div class="aui-bar-tab-label">
					会员
				</div>
			</div>
		</footer>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var body_h;
		var headerPos;
		var typeid;
		var NVNavigationBar;
		var heiff = 35;
		var retindex=0;
		apiready = function() {
			search_val();
			mnPopups = api.require('MNPopups');
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'keyback'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				api.sendEvent({
				    name: 'video_frm',
				    extra: {
				        k: 'keyback',
				    }
				});
			});
			NVNavigationBar = api.require('NVNavigationBar');
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){
			   _heibai()
			   userImg()
			   	api.setFullScreen({
				    fullScreen: false
				});
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			body_h = $api.offset($api.dom('body')).h;
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('fx-footer'));
			footerh = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewdisappear'
			}, function(ret, err){
			  	api.sendEvent({
				    name: 'video_frm',
				    extra: {
				        k: 'hidePlayer',
				    }
				});
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'pause'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			  	api.sendEvent({
				    name: 'video_frm',
				    extra: {
				        k: 'hidePlayer',
				    }
				});
			});
			view();
		}
		function view() {
			header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			body_h = $api.offset($api.dom('body')).h;
			$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('fx-footer'))
			footerh = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
			footerh = footerh - 5
			var ret=_getPrefs('videoTypeid');
				if (ret) {
					typeid = ret.typeid
					NVNavigationBar.open({
							rect : {
								x : 0,
								y : headerPos.h - 36,
								w : api.frameWidth,
								h : heiff
							},
							styles : {
								orientation : 'horizontal',
								bg : '#fff',
								bgAlpha : 1,
								font : {
									size : 17,
									sizeSelected : 18,
									color : '#222222',
									colorSelected : '#F85959',
									alpha : 1
								},
								itemSize : {
									w : 50,
									h : heiff
								}
							},
							items : ret.data,
							selectedIndex : 0,
							fixedOn : api.frameName,
							id : 'first'
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret.eventType == 'click') {
								randomSwitchBtn(ret.index)
							}
					});
					var frames = [];
					for (var i = 0; i < typeid.length; i++) {
						var frame = {};
						frame.name = 'frame_' + i;
						frame.url = html_win + 'video_frm.html';
						frame.pageParam = {
							id : typeid[i],
						};
						frames.push(frame);
						frames.useWKWebView = true;
						frames.historyGestureEnabled = true;
					}
					openFrameGroup(frames);
					api.parseTapmode();
				} else {
					api.openFrame({
						name : 'error',
						url : html_win + 'error.html',
						bounces : false,
						rect : {
							x : 0,
							y : 0,
							w : 'auto',
							h : 'auto'
						},
						useWKWebView : true,
						historyGestureEnabled : true,
						vScrollBarEnabled : false,
						hScrollBarEnabled : false,
					})
				}
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'video_frm',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h + heiff - 35,
					w : 'auto',
					h : body_h - headerPos.h - heiff + 30 - footerh,
				},
				index : 0,
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
				NVNavigationBar.setSelected({
					id : 'first',
					index : ret.index,
					selected : true
				});
				retindex=ret.index
				api.sendEvent({
				    name: 'video_frm',
				    extra: {
				        k: 'hidePlayer',
				    }
				});
			});
		}
		function openFrameGroups(frames) {
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'video_frm',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerPos.h+heiff,
					w : 'auto',
					h : body_h - headerPos.h -heiff  -footerh,
				},
				index : 0,
				frames : frames,
				preload : 0,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
				NVNavigationBar.setSelected({
					id : 'first',
					index : ret.index,
					selected : true
				});
				api.sendEvent({
				    name: 'video_frm',
				    extra: {
				        k: 'hidePlayer',
				    }
				});
			});
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index) {
			if(index==retindex){
				shuaxin()
				return;
			}
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'video_frm',
				index : index,
				scroll : true,	
			});
		}
		function userImg(){
			return;
			var user=_getPrefs('user');
			if(user){
				$api.css($api.dom('.user1'),"display: block");
				$api.css($api.dom('.user2'),"display: none");
				$api.attr($api.dom('.sx-user-img'),"src",user.img);
			}else{
				$api.css($api.dom('.user1'),"display: none");
				$api.css($api.dom('.user2'),"display: block");
			}
		}
		function shuaxin(){
			$api.addCls($api.dom('.aui-active img'),'Rotation')
			api.execScript({
				frameName:'frame_'+retindex,
				script: 'shuaxin()'
			});
		}
		function search() {
			api.openWin({
				name : 'search_win',
				url : html_win+'search_win.html',
				slidBackEnabled : false,
				animation : {
					type : "fade", 
					subType : "from_right", 
					duration : 300
				},
				pageParam : {
					qian : 1,
					fan : 0,
					text_ding:JSON.stringify($('#search-input').data('data'))
				}
			});
		}
				function search_val(){
					return;
					var val = _getPrefs('config').config.text_ding;
					 console.log(JSON.stringify(val))
					var val = val[Math.floor(Math.random()*val.length)];
					var _this = $('#search-input');
					_this.val(val.join(" | "));
					_this.data('data',JSON.stringify(val));
				}
				function search_vals(){
					return
					setTimeout(function(){
						search_val();
						search_vals();
					},300000)
				}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var photoBrowser,index;
		apiready = function() {
			photoBrowser = api.require('photoBrowser');
			img()
			api.parseTapmode();
		}
		function img() {
			var num = false;
			photoBrowser.open({
				images : api.pageParam['images'],
				bgColor : '#000',
				activeIndex : api.pageParam['index'],
			}, function(ret, err) { 
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
				console.log(JSON.stringify(err))
				if (ret.eventType == 'show') {
					index = api.pageParam['index'];
					api.openFrame({
						name : 'view_photo_foot',
						url : html_win+'view_photo_foot.html',
						rect : {
							x : 0,
							y : api.winHeight - 50,
							w : 'auto',
							h : 50
						},
						pageParam : {
							num : (ret.index + 1) + "/" + api.pageParam['images'].length,
						},
						bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0.0)',
					});
				}
				if (ret.eventType == 'change') {
					index=ret.index
					var num = parseInt(ret.index + 1)
					num=num+ "/" + api.pageParam['images'].length;
					var ffxiang = 'ffxiang("' + num + '");';
					api.execScript({
						frameName : 'view_photo_foot',
						script : ffxiang
					});
				}
				if (ret.eventType == 'click') {
					_close(3);
				}
			});
		}
		function baocun() {
 			if(api.systemType == 'ios'){
 				photoBrowser.getImage({
					index : index
				}, function(ret_getImage, err_getImage) {
					if (ret_getImage) {
						api.saveMediaToAlbum({
							path : ret_getImage.path
						}, function(ret_saveImage, err_saveImage) {
							if (ret_saveImage && ret_saveImage.status) {
								_msg('图片保存成功')
							}
						});
					}
				});
 			}else{
 				_loading('正在下载');
				api.download({
				    url: api.pageParam['images'][index],
				    report: true,
				    cache: true,
				    allowResume: true
				}, function(ret, err) {
				    if (ret.state == 1) {
				        api.saveMediaToAlbum({
							path : ret.savePath
						}, function(ret_saveImage, err_saveImage) {
							_loadingCloes();
							if (ret_saveImage && ret_saveImage.status) {
								_msg('图片保存成功')
							}
						});
				    } else {
						_loadingCloes();
						_msg('下载失败')
				    }
				});
 			}
		}
	</script>

			<a class="aui-btn aui-btn-danger aui-pull-left" onclick="historyBack()" tapmode> <span class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-left"></span> </a>
			<div class="aui-title" id="header-title">
				资讯站
			</div>
			<a class="aui-btn aui-btn-danger aui-pull-right" onclick="asdas()" tapmode> <span class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-close"></span></a>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var browser;
		var url='';
		apiready = function() {
			url=api.pageParam['url'];
			$api.text($api.dom('.aui-title'),api.pageParam['title']);
			if(!CheckUrl){
				alert({msg:'这网址不是以http:
				_close()
				return
			}
			_heibai(1)
			var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
			$api.fixStatusBar(header);
			var headerPos = $api.offset(header);
			headerh = headerPos.h
			browser = api.require('webBrowser');
			urlW();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function urlW() {
			browser.openView({
				url : url,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : headerh,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto'
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
		}
		function historyBack() {
			browser.historyBack(function(ret, err) {
				if (!ret.status) {
					_close(3);
				}
			});
		}
		function asdas(){
			_close(3);
		}
		function CheckUrl(url){
		 var reg=/^([hH][tT]{2}[pP]:\/\/|[hH][tT]{2}[pP][sS]:\/\/)(([A-Za-z0-9-~]+)\.)+([A-Za-z0-9-~\/])+$/;
		 if(!reg.test(url)){
		 	return false;
		 }
		 else{
		 	return true;
		 }
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var uid,mychannel;
		apiready = function() {
			_init()
			uid=api.pageParam['id'];
			if(!uid){
				uid=api.pageParam['uid'];
				if(!uid){
					_alert('id用户不存在 或 已被禁止2',function(ret,err){
						_close();
					})
					return;
				}
			}
			if(_getPrefs('user') && _getPrefs('user').id == uid){
				console.log(_getPrefs('user').sfz)
				$('#sixin').text('编辑资料');
				if(_getPrefs('user').sfz == 1){
					$('#renzheng').text('已认证');
				}else if(_getPrefs('user').sfz == 2){
					$('#renzheng').text('正在审核');
				}else if(_getPrefs('user').sfz == 3){
					$('#renzheng').text('认证失败');
				}else{
					$('#renzheng').text('申请认证');
				}
			}
			info()
			mychannel=api.pageParam['mychannel']
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/article/lists/hide/1/mychannel/'+mychannel+'/uid/'+uid, 1, 1);
			},1)
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					_lists('api/article/lists/hide/1/mychannel/'+mychannel+'/uid/'+uid, pagenum);
				}
			});
		}
		function info(){
			if(_getPrefs('token')){
				fangke();
			}
			_ajax('api/user/info',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					api.execScript({
					    script: "$api.text($api.dom('.aui-title'),'"+ret.username+"');"
					});
					$('#touxiang').attr('src',ret.img+'?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100/format/jpg');
					$('.weizhi').text('位置：'+ret.weizhi);
					$('.qianming').text('简介：'+ret.qianming);
					$('#guanzhu').text(ret.dongtai);
					$('#fensi').text(ret.fensi);
					$('#fangke').text(ret.fangke);
					$('#huozan').text(ret.huozan);
					var _this = $('#renzheng');
					if(_getPrefs('user') && _getPrefs('user').id == uid){
					}else{
						if(ret.guanzhu){
							_this.data('id','2');
							_this.text('已关注');
							_this.removeClass('renzheng_a');
						}else{
							_this.data('id','1');
							_this.addClass('renzheng_a');
						}
					}
				}
				_lists('api/article/lists/hide/1/mychannel/'+mychannel+'/uid/'+uid, 1, 1);
			},{id:uid})
		}
		function active(index) {
			$api.removeCls($api.dom(".sx-i-tab .b"), 'b');
			$api.addCls($api.byId('tab' + index), 'b');
			mychannel = index;
			$('#fx-view').html('<div id="jiazai"><img src="../image/loading_more.gif" /></div>');
			pagenum = 1;
			heigutgao = 0;
			_lists('api/article/lists/hide/1/mychannel/'+mychannel+'/uid/'+uid, 1, 1);
		}
		function guanzhu(jgo) {
			if(_getPrefs('user')){
				if(_getPrefs('user').id == uid){
					_url({url:'member/sfz',title:'申请认证'},'',true);
					return;
				}
			}else{
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).removeClass('renzheng_a');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).addClass('renzheng_a')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			}
		}
		function pingZan_xia(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud aui-margin-r-5"></i> ' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/zancai/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid,type:1})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function img(id,index){
			_url({id:id,qian:1,fan:1},'view_win')
		}
		function del(id){
			api.actionSheet({
			    cancelTitle: '取消',
			    destructiveTitle: '确认要删除吗？',
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    var index = ret.buttonIndex;
			 	if(index==1){
			 		_loading('正在删除')
			 		_ajax('api/member/weitoutiaoDel/',function(ret,err){
						if(ret){
							_loadingCloes()
							_msg(ret.ret ? ret.ret : ret.err)
							if(ret.ret){
								$('#id'+id).remove();
							}
						}
					},{aid:id})
			 	}
			});
		}
		function fangke(){
			if(_user){
				if(_user.id != uid){
					_ajax('api/member/fangkejilu',function(ret,err){},{f_uid:uid})
				}
			}
		}
		function img(_this){
			var images = $(_this).attr('src').replace("?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100/format/jpg","");
			api.openWin({
			    name: 'view_photo',
			    url: html_win+'view_photo.html',
			    slidBackEnabled:false,
			    pageParam: {
			        images:[images],
			        index:0
			    },
			    animation:{
			    	type:"fade",                
				    subType:"from_right",       
				    duration:300
			    }
			});
		}
		function sixin(_this){
			if(_getPrefs('user')){
				var type = $(_this).data('type');
				if(_getPrefs('user').id == uid){
					_url({title:'设置',url:'member/sz',qian:1,fan:0},'',true);
				}else{
					_url({title:'用户id:'+uid,id:uid,url:'member/sixin_view'})
				}
			}else{
				_login();
			}
		}
	</script>
</html>

			api.parseTapmode();
			a=api.pageParam['id']
			$api.attr($api.dom('img'),"src","../image/yindaotu/"+(a+1)+".png")
		}

				api.execScript({
					frameName: 'ffxiang_win',
				    script: 'dat()'
				});
				api.closeFrameGroup({
				    name: 'yindaotu'
				});
		}
	</script>

	 <div  tapmode onclick="data(this,1)"  class="aui-col-xs-3"  data-size='50' data-id='82' data-title='财经' data-bg='#fff' data-bgs='#fff'  class="aui-col-xs-3"><div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1">财经</div>
	 </div>
					</div>
					<div style="font-size: 0.65rem;color: #999;padding: 0.5rem;">提示：您选择的频道中包含第三方内容源的文章，来源明细详见下方条款</div>
					<div class="wancheng aui-btn aui-btn-block aui-btn-danger">
						完成
					</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var shuaxin=false;
		apiready = function() { 
			ajax();
			api.parseTapmode();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		};
		function ajax(){
			var typeid = _typeid_data_get()	
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('yes'), evalData(typeid.no));
			console.log(evalData(typeid.no))
		}
		function data(jos, yesno) {
			shuaxin=true;
			var id = $(jos).data('id');
			var size = $(jos).data('size');
			var name = $(jos).data('title');
			var bg = $(jos).data('bg');
			var bgs = $(jos).data('bgs');
			var _this = $(jos).children();
			if(_this.hasClass('dui')){
				_this.removeClass('dui');
			}else{
				_this.addClass('dui');
			}
			return;
			var html = '<div class="aui-col-xs-3" tapmode onclick="data(this,'+(yesno==1 ? 0 : 1)+')" data-size="'+ size +'" data-id="'+ id +'" data-title="'+ name +'" data-bg="'+bg+'" data-bgs="'+ bgs +'" >';
			if (yesno == 1) {
				var num = $api.domAll('#yes .aui-grid-label');
				if(num.length < 2) {
					api.toast({
						msg : '至少要保留一个',
						duration : 2000,
						location : 'bottom'
					});
					return false;
				}
				$api.remove(jos);
				html += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1">+ ' + name ;
				var _this = $api.byId('no');
			} else if(yesno == 0) {
				$api.remove(jos);
				html += '<div class="aui-grid-label aui-ellipsis-1" >' + name ;
				var _this = $api.byId('yes');
			}
			html += '</div></div>';
			$api.append(_this, html)
			api.parseTapmode();
		}
		function yes(){
			var typeData_no = [];
			$("#yes .aui-col-xs-3").each(function(){
				var size = $(this).data('size');
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				var title = $(this).data('title');
				var bg = $(this).data('bg');
				var bgs = $(this).data('bgs');
				var a = {};
				a.size = {"w":size};
				a.id   = id;
				a.title= title;
				a.bg   = bg;
				a.bgSelected = bgs;
				typeData_no.push(a);
			});
			var a = {};
				a.size = {"w":50};
				a.id   = '555555555';
				a.title= '';
				a.bg   = '#fff';
				a.bgSelected = '#fff';
				typeData_no.push(a);
			return typeData_no;
		}
		function typeidsss(){
			var typeData_no = [];
			$("#yes .aui-col-xs-3").each(function(){
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				typeData_no.push(id); 
			});
			return typeData_no;
		}
		function no(){
			var typeData_no = [];
			$("#no .aui-col-xs-3").each(function(){
				var size = $(this).data('size');
				var id = $(this).data('id');
				var title = $(this).data('title');
				var bg = $(this).data('bg');
				var bgs = $(this).data('bgs');
				var a = {};
				a.size = {"w":size};
				a.id   = id;
				a.title= title;
				a.bg   = bg;
				a.bgSelected = bgs;
				typeData_no.push(a);
			});
			return typeData_no; 
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var playModule;
		var sx
		apiready = function() {
			sx = {"source":"知足常乐207755035","title":"笑死我了","click":1,"weitoutiao":0,"image":"http:
			playModule = api.require('playModule');
			videoUrl();
		}
		function videoUrl(){			
			playModule.play({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : api.winHeight
				},
				url : fx_gurl + 'mp4.mp4',
				defaultBtn : false, 
				isTopView : false, 
				title : '', 
				enableFull : false, 
				isFullBtn : false, 
				isBackBtn : false, 
				scalingMode : api.systemType == 'android' ? 4 : 3, 
				fullscreenMode : 'PORTRAIT', 
				isShowProcessView : false, 
				isShowTimeLable : false, 
				isOpenGesture : false, 
				isSmallOpenGesture : false,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					win();
				}
			});
		}
		function win() {
			api.openFrame({
				name : 'svideo',
				url : html_win + 'svideo.html',
				bounces : false,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto',
				},
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				animation:{
					type:"push",                
				    subType:"from_bottom",       
				    duration:300    
				},
			})
		}
	</script>

			<div class="aui-content">
		        <script id="sx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
					{{ for(var i=0,len=it.length; i < len; i++) { }}
		            <li class="aui-list-item ems" data-pay="{{= it[i].qudao }}" tapmode onclick="x(this)">
		                <div class="aui-list-item-label-icon">
		                    <img src="{{= fx_cdn + it[i].img }}" />
		                </div>

				<span class="aui-pull-left aui-font-size-14">预计获得</span>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var zengbi,yuji=0,_app=''
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			$('#yuji').html('0'+(_app ? '元' : _config.zhibo.liwu_title))
			zengbi=_config.config.pay_zb/100
			beecloud = api.require('beecloud');
			payList()
			var yujiMoney=$('.asdasd').data('money')
			if(zengbi){
				$(".aui-grid-label").each(function(){
					var text=$(this).text();
					text=parseInt(text*zengbi);
					if(text){
						$(this).append('<em class="aui-badge">+'+text+'</em>')
					}
				});
				$('#inputs').append('<em class="aui-badge">+0</em>')
				yuji=parseInt(yujiMoney+yujiMoney*zengbi)+(_app ? '元' : _config.zhibo.liwu_title);
			}else{
				yuji=parseInt(yujiMoney)+(_app ? '元' : _config.zhibo.liwu_title);
			}
			$('#yuji').text(yuji);
		}
		function data(){
			var money=parseInt($('.asdasd').data('money'));
			if(!money){
				money=parseInt($('.asdasd').val());
				if(!money){
					_msg('请选择或输入充值金额')
					return;
				}
			}
			if(_config.config.zuidichongzhi){
				if(money < _config.config.zuidichongzhi){
					_msg('最低充值'+ _config.config.zuidichongzhi);
				return;
				}
			}
			var channel=$('.ems').data('pay')
			if(!channel){
				_msg('请选择支付方式');
				return;
			}
			money=money*100
			if(!isNaN(channel)){
				payUrl({type:channel,money:money})
				return;
			}
			_pay({money:money,type:channel})
		}
		function _pay(data){
			return _msg('支付通道未开通！');
			_loading('正在请求')
			_ajax('api/pay/code',function(ret,err){
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
				_loadingCloes()
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						var payData = {
							title : '用户(ID'+_user.id+')充值'+data.money/100+_config.zhibo.liwu_title,
							totalfee : data.money,
							billno : ret.ret,
							channel : data.type,
							optional:{
								uid:_user.id,
								payname:'充值'+_config.zhibo.liwu_title,
							}
						};
						beecloud.pay(payData, payCallBack);
						function payCallBack(ret, err) {
							if(ret){
								if(ret.result_code==0){
									_userInfo()
									if(ret.result_msg=='支付成功'){
										_alert('已成功充值'+(data.money/100)+_config.zhibo.liwu_title,function(ret,err){
											_close()
										})
										return;
									}
								}
								if(ret.errMsg){
									alert(JSON.stringify(ret))
								}else{
									_msg(ret.result_msg)
								}
							}else{
								_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
							}
						}
					}else{
						_alert('ret.err:'+ret.err)
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},data)
		}
		function payList(){
			_ajax('api/pay/payList',function(ret,err){
				console.log(JSON.stringify(ret)+JSON.stringify(err))
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
					$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'), evalData(ret));
					api.parseTapmode();
					$("#input").bind('input propertychange', function(){
						var text=$(this).val();
						$('#inputs em').text('+'+parseInt(text*zengbi))
						var yujiMoney=$(this).val()
						yuji = parseInt(yujiMoney)+(_app ? '元' : _config.zhibo.liwu_title);
						$('#yuji').text(yuji)
					});
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			},{type:'app'})
		}
		function x(_this){
			$('.ems').removeClass('ems')
			$(_this).addClass('ems')
			var pay=$(_this).data('pay');
			$('.aui-list-in .aui-list-item em').remove()
			$(_this).append('<em class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-correct"></em>')
		}
		function i(_this){
			$('.asdasd').removeClass('asdasd')
			$(_this).addClass('asdasd')
			$('#inputs em').css('background','#FF2D4B')
			var yujiMoney=$(_this).val()
			yuji=parseInt(yujiMoney)+(_app ? '元' : _config.zhibo.liwu_title);
			$('#yuji').text(yuji)
		}
		function m(_this){
			$('.asdasd').removeClass('asdasd')
			$(_this).addClass('asdasd')
			$('#inputs em').css('background','#ccc')
			var yujiMoney=$('.asdasd').data('money')
			yuji=parseInt(yujiMoney)+(_app ? '元' : _config.zhibo.liwu_title);
			$('#yuji').text(yuji)
		}
		function payUrl(data){
			_loading();
			_ajax('pay/payUrl',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes()
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						console.log(ret.ret)
						_url({title:"在线充值",url:ret.ret},'yichuijingpai_curl')
					}else{
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				}else{
					alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},{type:data.type,money:data.money,payname:'充值'+_config.zhibo.liwu_title})
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<body>
		<div class="t" tapmode onclick="c()"></div>
		<div class="f">
			<script id="sx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
				<div class="swiper-wrapper">
				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.length; i < len; i++) { }}
				<div class="swiper-slide" tapmode onclick="liwu_money(this)" data-data='{{= JSON.stringify(it[i]) }}'>
				<img src="{{= fx_cdn + it[i].img }}" />
				<p>{{= it[i].title}}</p>
				<span>{{= it[i].money + _config.zhibo.liwu_title}}</span>
				</div>
				{{ } }}
				</div>
			</script>
			<div class="swiper-container" id="sx-view"></div>
			<div class="swiper-pagination"></div>
			<div class="text" tapmode onclick="chongzhi()">
				<span class="b2"></span>
				<span class="b3">充值</span>
			</div>
		</div>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/swiper.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
 			a()
			api.parseTapmode();
		}
		function a() {
			var ret = _config.liwu
			$('.text .b2').html(_config.zhibo.liwu_title + "：<b>" + (_user.zhibo_zuan ? _user.zhibo_zuan : 0) + "</b>")
			var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
			$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'), evalData(ret));
			api.parseTapmode();
			var swiper = new Swiper('.swiper-container', {
				slidesPerView : 4,
				spaceBetween : 15,
				slidesPerGroup : 4,
				slidesPerColumn : 2,
				loopFillGroupWithBlank : true,
				pagination : {
					el : '.swiper-pagination',
					clickable : true,
				},
			});
		}
		function c() {
			api.closeFrame();
		}
		function chongzhi() {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
			if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
				return _login();
			}
			_url({
				url : 'zhibo/view_frm_chongzhi',
				title : '充值'
			})
		}
		function liwu_money(_this){
			var data = $(_this).data('data');
			if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
				api.setFullScreen({
					fullScreen : false
				});
				return _login();
			}
			if(!api.pageParam['ret']['role'] == 2){
				return _msg('不能给自己送礼物1');
			}
	        if(!_getPrefs('user').id || _getPrefs('user').zhibo_zuan < data.money){
	            return _msg('钻石不足');
	        }
	        if(_getPrefs('user').id == api.pageParam['uid']){
	        	return _msg('不能给自己送礼物2');
	        }
	        api.execScript({
	        	frameName:'zhibo/view_frm_1',
				script: 'liwu_ajax(\''+JSON.stringify(data)+'\');'
			});
			return;
			return c();
			_ajax('api/zhibo/liwu_money',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						_msg('赠送成功');
						_user.zhibo_zuan = _user.zhibo_zuan - ret.money;
						$('.text .b2').html(_config.zhibo.liwu_title + "：<b>" + (_user.zhibo_zuan ? _user.zhibo_zuan : 0) + "</b>")
						api.execScript({
						    script: '_userInfo();'
						});
						c();
					}
					console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},{id:id,uid_zhu:api.pageParam['uid']})
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = 'zhibo/view_frm_' + i;
				frame.url = html_win + 'zhibo/view_frm_'+i+'.html';
				frame.pageParam = api.pageParam
				frames.push(frame);
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames)
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'zhibo/view_frm',
				bounces : false,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto',
				},
				frames : frames,
				index : 1,
				preload : 2,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
		}
	</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	apiready = function() {
		oxPlayer = api.require('oxPlayer');
		if (api.pageParam['img_r']) {
			$api.css($api.dom('.by'), 'background:url(' + fx_cdn + api.pageParam['img_r'] + ') center center !important')
		}
		api.setFullScreen({
			fullScreen: true
		});
		api.showProgress({
			title: '',
			text: '',
			modal: true,
			animationType: 'zoom',
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'viewappear'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen: true
			});
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'viewdisappear'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen: false
			});
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'pause'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen: false
			});
		});
		api.addEventListener({
			name: 'resume'
		}, function(ret, err) {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen: true
			});
		});
		win();
	}
	function win() {
		console.log(JSON.stringify(api.pageParam));
		var password = api.pageParam['password'];
		var nickname = api.pageParam['nickname'];
		var session = {
			roomId: api.pageParam['roomId'],
			password: password,
			nickname: nickname
		};
		var core = api.require('gotyeLiveCore');
		core.setDebugLogEnabled({
			enabled: true
		});
		core.authRoomSession(session, function(ret, err) {
			if (ret) {
				console.log(ret.role)
				if(ret.role != 2){
					_video_open(_getPrefs('config').zhibo.url+api.pageParam['roomId'])
				}
				var name = 'zhibo/view_frame';
				api.pageParam['ret'] = ret;
				api.openFrame({
					name: name,
					url: html_win + name + '.html',
					rect: {
						x: 0,
						y: 0,
						w: 'auto',
						h: 'auto'
					},
					bounces: false,
					bgColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
					vScrollBarEnabled: false,
					hScrollBarEnabled: false,
					pageParam: api.pageParam
				});
			} else {
				_alert("错误：" + JSON.stringify(err), function(ret, err) {
					_close();
				})
				_loadingCloes();
			}
		});
	}
	function _video_open(url) {
		oxPlayer.zbPlay({
			fixedOn: '',
			rect: {
				x: 0,
				y: 0,
				w: 'auto',
				h: 'auto'
			},
			fixed: true,
			showBack: false, 
			rightSlide: false, 
			leftSlide: false, 
			showDoubleClick: false, 
			playBtn: '', 
			backgroundColor: '#000000', 
			marginBottom: 0, 
			styles: [],
			data: {
				userInfo: {
					isFocus: true
				},
				music: {},
				vid: '',
				title: '',
				thumb: api.pageParam['img_l'],
				url: url
			}
		});;
	}
</script>
</html>

		        <div class="aui-tab-item" id="tab_1" tapmode onclick="randomSwitchBtn(1)">本周榜单</div>
