	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			$api.css($api.dom('.f'),'height:'+(api.winHeight/2)+'px');
 			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = 'zhibo/view_frm_liwu_user_frame_' + i;
				frame.url = html_win + 'zhibo/view_frm_liwu_user_frame.html';
				frame.pageParam = {
					type : i+1,
					uid:api.pageParam['uid']
				}
				frames.push(frame);
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames)
		}
		function a() {
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			var footerh = $api.offset($api.dom('.f')).t;
			var h = $api.offset($api.dom('.aui-tab')).h;
			footerh = footerh + h;
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'zhibo/view_frm_liwu_user_frame',
				bounces : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : footerh,
					w : 'auto',
					h : api.winHeight - footerh,
				},
				frames : frames,
				index : 0,
				preload : 0,	
			}, function(ret, err) {
		 		active(ret.index)
			});
		}
		function randomSwitchBtn(index) {
			active(index)
			api.setFrameGroupIndex({
				name : 'zhibo/view_frm_liwu_user_frame',
				index : index,
				scroll : true, 
			});
		}
		function active(index) {
			$api.removeCls($api.dom(".aui-tab .aui-active"), 'aui-active');
			$api.addCls($api.dom("#tab_"+index), 'aui-active');
		}
		function c() {
			api.closeFrameGroup({name:'zhibo/view_frm_liwu_user_frame'});
			api.closeFrame();
		}
	</script>

		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />

		 	<div class="type_add_h2">
		 		<span class="h1">当前直播分类：</span><span class="h2"></span>

		 			{{ for(var i_s=0,it_s=it[i].data; i_s < it_s.length; i_s++) { }}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			data();
		}
		function data(){
			_ajax('api/zhibo/typename',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
					$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'), evalData(ret));
					$api.html($api.dom('.type_add_p'),_config.zhibo.type_content);
					if(api.pageParam['type_title']){
						$api.text($api.dom('.type_add_h2 .h2'),api.pageParam['type_title']);
					}else{
						$api.css($api.dom('.type_add_h2'),'display: none')
					}
					api.parseTapmode();
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			})
		}
		function url(id,title){
			api.execScript({
			    name: 'zhibo/add',
			    script: '$(".sx-add-tags").data("id","'+id+'");$(".sx-add-tags").data("title","'+title+'");$(".sx-add-tags").html("'+title+'<span class=\'aui-iconfont aui-icon-right\'></span>")'
			});
			_close(1);
		}
	</script>

<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/suxiang-zhibo.css" />
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="aui-content-padded">
			<div class="sx-close" Tapmode onclick="_close();">
				<img src="../../image/close_hei.png"  />
			</div>
			<div class="sx-add-title">
				<input type="text" placeholder="标题有趣能吸引更多人气" value="" />
				<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-question" tapmode onclick="_url({url:'about',id:'8',title:'直播规则'})"></i>
			</div>
			<div class="sx-add-tags" data-id="" data-title="" tapmode onclick="type()">
				选择分类 <span class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-right"></span>
			</div>
			<div class="sx-add-img">
				<h2>上传封面</h2>
				<div class="sx-add-img-s aui-card-list-footer">
					<div class="sx-add-img-l" tapmode onclick="img(1)">
						<img src="" style="display: none" data-url="" />
						<p>
							横版封面
						</p>
					</div>
					<div class="sx-add-img-r" tapmode onclick="img(2)">
						<img src="" style="display: none" data-url="" />
						<p>
							竖版
						</p>
					</div>
					<!--
					<img class="sx-add-img-l" src="../../image/zhibosx-add-img-r.png" />
					<img class="sx-add-img-r" src="../../image/zhibo/sx-add-img-r.png" />-->
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="sx-btn aui-btn aui-btn-block" tapmode onclick="url();">
				开始直播
			</div>
		</div>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			info();
			api.parseTapmode();
			_heibai(1);
			$api.fixStatusBar($api.dom('.aui-content-padded'));
		}
		function info(){
			_loading();
			_ajax('api/zhibo/info',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						var ret = ret.ret;
						$('input').val(ret.roomName);
						var _this = $('.sx-add-img-l img');
						_this.data('url',ret.img_l);
						_this.attr('src',fx_cdn+ret.img_l);
						_this.show();
						_this = $('.sx-add-img-r img');
						_this.data('url',ret.img_r);
						_this.attr('src',fx_cdn+ret.img_r);
						_this.show();
						_this = $('.sx-add-tags');
						_this.data('id',ret.type_id);
						_this.data('title',ret.type_title);
						_this.html(ret.type_title+'<span class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-right"></span>');
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
				_loadingCloes();
			})
		}
		function type(){
			_url({url:'zhibo/type_add',title:'直播分类',bounces:1,fan:1,type_title:$('.sx-add-tags').data('title')})
		}
		function url() {
			var input = $('input').val();
			if (!input) {
				return _msg('请输入直播标题');
			}
			if (input.length < 3) {
				alert('不能少于3个字')
				return
			}
			var type_id = $('.sx-add-tags').data('id');
			if (!type_id) {
				return _msg('选择分类')
			}
			var img_l = $('.sx-add-img-l img').css('display');
			if (img_l == 'none') {
				return _msg('请上传横版封面')
			}
			var img_r = $('.sx-add-img-r img').css('display');
			if (img_r == 'none') {
				return _msg('请上传竖版封面')
			}
			add();
		}
		function img(type) {
				var sourceType = 'album'
				api.getPicture({
					sourceType : sourceType,
					encodingType : 'jpg',
					mediaValue : 'pic',
					destinationType : 'url',
					quality : 50,
					targetWidth : 800,
					targetHeight : 800,
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret) {
						if (ret.data) {
							var _this = type == 2 ? $('.sx-add-img-r img') : $('.sx-add-img-l img');
							_this.data('url',"");
							_this.attr('src',ret.data);
							_this.show();
							console.log(_this.data('url'))
						}
					}
				});
		}
		function add(){
			var img_l = $('.sx-add-img-l img').data('url');
			if (!img_l) {
				return imgAjax(1);
			}
			var img_r = $('.sx-add-img-r img').data('url');
			if (!img_r) {
				return imgAjax(2);
			}
			var data = {
				roomName 	: 	$('input').val(),
				type_id 	: 	$('.sx-add-tags').data('id'),
				img_l 		: 	img_l,
				img_r 		: 	img_r,
			}
	 		_loading();
			_ajax('api/zhibo/CreateRoom',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					if(ret.ret){
						ret = ret.ret;
						_zurl({roomId:ret.roomId,password:ret.anchorPwd,nickname:ret.creator,img_l:img_l,img_r:img_r})
					}else{
						_alert(ret.msg)
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
				_loadingCloes();
			},data)
		}
		function imgAjax(type){
			var _this = type == 2 ? $('.sx-add-img-r img') : $('.sx-add-img-l img');
			var image = _this.attr('src');
			_loading()
			api.ajax({
			    url: fx_url + 'api/member/imagesUpload',
			    method: 'post',
			    data: {
			    	values:{
			    		token:_getPrefs('token'),
			    	},
			        files: {
			            image: image
			        }
			    },
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    if (ret) {
			        if(ret.ret){
			        	_this.data('url',ret.ret);
			        	add();
			        }else{
			        	alert("上传失败"+ret.err)
			        }
			    } else {
			        api.alert({ msg: JSON.stringify(err) });
			    }
			});
		}
	</script>
</html>

			    frameName: 'zhibo/view_frm_1',

			    frameName: 'zhibo/view_frm_1',

			});
			c();

			});

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/jquery-3.2.1.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var publisher, chat, filterOn, screenOrientation = 'portrait_up', torchOn, UIChatBox, player,applause,input_ok=false;
		var session = {};
		apiready = function() {
			_init();
			applause = api.require('applause');
			userInfo()
			api.setKeepScreenOn({
				keepOn : true
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'offline'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				liaotianshi('网络异常', 'p');
			});
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'online'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				liaotianshi('网络恢复', 'p');
			});
			console.log(JSON.stringify(api.pageParam));
			session = {
				roomId : api.pageParam['roomId'],
				password : api.pageParam['password'],
				nickname : api.pageParam['nickname']
			};
			$api.fixStatusBar($api.dom('.view-header'));
			$api.fixTabBar($api.dom('.view-footer'))
			UIChatBox = api.require('UIChatBox');
			api.parseTapmode();
			if (api.pageParam['ret']['role'] == 2) {
				$('.view-footer .kaishi').show();
				$('.view-footer .view-liaotian').hide();
				$('.view-footer .aui-bar').hide();
				$('.view-footer-3 .hk').remove();
				$('.view-footer-3 p').show();
				publisher = api.require('gotyeLivePublisher');
				publisher.init({
					session : session
				});
				publisher.startPreview({
					preview : 'zhibo/view_frame',
					position : 'front',
					rect : {
						x : 0,
						y : 0,
						w : api.frameWidth,
						h : api.frameHeight
					}
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret) {
						publisher.login({
							force : true
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
							} else {
								liaotianshi('连接直播服务器失败', 'p');
							}
							api.execScript({
								script : '_loadingCloes()'
							});
						});
					} else {
						liaotianshi('打开设备摄像头失败', 'p');
						api.execScript({
							script : '_loadingCloes()'
						});
					}
				});
				publisher.addEventListener({
					name : 'connected'
				}, function(ret, err) {
					liaotianshi('连接直播服务器成功', 'p');
				});
				publisher.addEventListener({
					name : 'disconnected'
				}, function(ret, err) {
					liaotianshi('直播服务器断开连接', 'p');
				});
				publisher.addEventListener({
					name : 'reconnecting'
				}, function() {
					liaotianshi('直播服务器重新连接中', 'p');
				});
				publisher.addEventListener({
					name : 'error'
				}, function(ret, err) {
					liaotianshi(ret.description, 'p');
				});
				publisher.addEventListener({
					name : 'forceLogout'
				}, function() {
					liaotianshi('您的账号在另外的设备登录，当前设备需强制踢下线1', 'p');
					api.alert({
						msg : '您的账号在另外的设备登录，当前设备需强制踢下线',
						buttons : ['知道了']
					}, function(ret, err) {
						if (ret.buttonIndex == '1') {
							_close();
						}
					});
				});
			} else {
				xin_donghua();
				api.execScript({
					script : '_loadingCloes()'
				});
			}
			chat = api.require('gotyeLiveChat');
			chat.init(session);
			chat.login(function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					input_ok = true;
					localId = ret.account;
					liaotianshi('连接聊天服务器成功', 'p');
					zhubo_info();	
					jinru();	
				} else {
					liaotianshi('连接聊天服务器失败', 'p');
				}
			});
			chat.addEventListener({
				name : 'receiveMsg'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					console.log('收到消息ret：' + JSON.stringify(ret));
					if (ret.status == 0) {
						var extra = eval('(' + ret.extra.replace(/}{/, ',') + ')');
						if(extra.type == '100'){
							liaotianshi("<b style='color:#FFD600'>"+extra.username+"</b>进入了直播间",'p');
						}else if(extra.type == '99999'){
							liwu_donghua(extra.liwu_data)
						}else{
							var span = "";
							if (extra.role == 2) {
								span = '<span class="b2">主播</span>';
							}
							liaotianshi(extra.username + " : " + ret.text, 'p', span);
						}
					}
				}else{
					console.log('收到消息err：' + JSON.stringify(ret));
				}
			});
			chat.addEventListener({
				name : 'forceLogout'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				liaotianshi('您的账号在另外的设备登录，当前设备需强制踢下线2', 'p');
				api.alert({
					msg : '您的账号在另外的设备登录，当前设备需强制踢下线',
					buttons : ['知道了']
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret.buttonIndex == '1') {
						_close();
					}
				});
			});
		}
		function kaishi() {
			$('.view-footer .kaishi').hide();
			$('.view-footer .view-liaotian').show();
			$('.view-footer .aui-bar').show();
			publisher.publish();
		}
		function initUserList() {
			jinru();	
			chat.queryUserList({
				index : 1,
				total : 20
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					console.log(JSON.stringify(ret))
					return;
					var ht_user = '<div class="viewer-list-item aui-ellipsis-1 aui-padded-l-15"><img class="crown" src="../image/publisher/crown.png" />主播</div>';
					for (var i = 0; i < ret.entities.length; i++) {
						ht_user += '<div class="viewer-list-item aui-ellipsis-1" data-account="' + ret.entities[i].account + '" tapmode onclick="onUserClick(this);event.cancelBubble=true;">' + ret.entities[i].nickname + '</div>';
					}
					$('#viewerList').html(ht_user);
				} else {
					alert(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			});
		}
		function jinru(){
			liaotianshi("<b style='color:#FFD600'>"+_user.username+"</b>进入了直播间",'p');
			var json = {
				uid : _user.id,
				username : _user.username,
				img : _user.img,
				role:api.pageParam['ret']['role'],
				type:100  	
			}
			var json = JSON.stringify(json);	
			sendText('1',json)
		}
		function switchCamera() {
			publisher.switchCamera();
		}
		function setScreen() {
			if (screenOrientation == 'portrait_up') {
				screenOrientation = 'landscape_left';
			} else {
				screenOrientation = 'portrait_up';
			}
			api.setScreenOrientation({
				orientation : screenOrientation
			});
		}
		function setTorch() {
			if (!torchOn) {
				torchOn = true;
			} else {
				torchOn = false;
			}
			publisher.setTorchOn({
				on : torchOn
			});
		}
		function setFilter() {
			if (!filterOn) {
				filterOn = true;
				publisher.setFilter({
					filter : 'smoothSkin'
				})
			} else {
				filterOn = false;
				publisher.setFilter({
					filter : 'normal'
				})
			}
		}
		function liaotianshi(text, addClass, span) {
			console.log(text)
			var html = '<div class="text">';
			html += '<p class="' + addClass + '">' + (span ? span : '') + text + '</p>';
			html += '</div>'
			var _this = $('#view-liaotian');
			_this.append(html);
			_this.animate({
				scrollTop : document.getElementById("view-liaotian").scrollHeight
			}, 500);
		}
		function sz() {
			var name = 'zhibo/view_frm_sz'
			api.openFrame({
				name : name,
				url : html_win + name + '.html',
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto'
				},
				animation : {
					type : "push", 
					subType : "from_bottom", 
					duration : 300
				},
				bounces : false,
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				vScrollBarEnabled : false,
				hScrollBarEnabled : false
			});
		}
		function input() {
			if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
				api.setFullScreen({
					fullScreen : false
				});
				return _login();
			}
			if(!input_ok){
				return ;
			}
			UIChatBox.open({
				autoFocus:true,
				placeholder : _config.zhibo.input_text,
				maxRows : 4,
				emotionPath : _image + '2019/rong/emotion',
				texts : {
					sendBtn : {
						title : '发送'
					}
				},
				isClose : true,
				styles : {
					topDivider : {
						width : 0, 
						color : '#000' 
					},
					inputBar : {
						borderColor : '##F9F9F8',
						bgColor : '#F9F9F8'
					},
					inputBox : {
						borderColor : '#e8e8e8', 
						bgColor : '#ffffff', 
						boardBgColor : '#fff', 
						topMargin : 10,          
					},
					emotionBtn : {
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/face1.png'
					},
					keyboardBtn : {
						normalImg : _image + '2019/rong/key1.png'
					},
					recordBtn : {
						normalBg : '#e8e8e8',
						activeBg : '#c4c4c4',
						color : '#000',
						size : 14
					},
					recordPanelBtn : {
						normalImg : '', 
						activeImg : '', 
						width : 100, 
						height : 100 
					},
					indicator : {
						target : 'both',
						color : '#c4c4c4',
						activeColor : '#9e9e9e'
					},
					sendBtn : {
						titleColor : '#fff',
						bg : '#419fd9',
						activeBg : '#247DB3',
						titleSize : 15
					}
				},
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.eventType == 'show') {
					}
					if (ret.eventType == 'send') {
						if (ret.msg) {
							var span = "";
							if (api.pageParam['ret']['role'] == 2) {
								span = '<span class="b2">主播</span>';
							}
							liaotianshi(_user.username + " : " + ret.msg, 'p', span);
							var json = {
								uid : _user.id,
								username : _user.username,
								img : _user.img,
								role:api.pageParam['ret']['role']
							}
							extra = JSON.stringify(json);	
							sendText(ret.msg,extra)
							UIChatBox.closeKeyboard();
							UIChatBox.close();
						} else {
							_msg('请说输入内容')
						}
					}
				} else {
				}
			});
		}
		function sendText(text,extra){
			chat.sendText({
				text : text,
				extra : extra
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (err) {
					console.log(JSON.stringify(err))
					liaotianshi("内容发送失败，错误代码："+err.code+"，原因："+err.description);
				}
			});
		}
		function destroyRoomSession() {
			var core = api.require('gotyeLiveCore');
			core.destroyRoomSession(session);
		}
		function c() {
			if (api.pageParam['ret']['role'] == 2) {
				publisher.unpublish();
				publisher.logout();
				publisher.stop();
			} else {
			}
			chat.logout();
			destroyRoomSession();
			_close(1);
		}
		function userInfo() {
			$('.view-liaotian .text p').html(_config.zhibo.content);
			$('.view-footer-1 p').html(_config.zhibo.input_text);
			var img = api.pageParam['user'] ? fx_cdn + api.pageParam['user']['img'] : '';
			var nickname = api.pageParam['user'] ? api.pageParam['user']['username'] : '';
			var fensi = api.pageParam['user'] ? api.pageParam['user']['fensi'] : '';
			if (api.pageParam['ret']['role'] == 2) {
				img = _user.img;
				nickname = _user.nickname;
				fensi = _user.fensi;
			}
			$('.view-header ul img.aui-img-round').attr('src', img + "?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100");
			var _this = $('.view-header ul .aui-list-item-text span');
			_this.eq(0).text(nickname);
			_this.eq(1).text(fensi + ' 粉丝');
		}
		function xin_donghua(){
			var y = $('.view-footer-3').offset().top
			var w = $('.view-footer-3 img').width();
			var h = $('.view-footer-3 img').height();
			var x = $('.view-footer-3').offset().left;
			applause.showAppLause({
			    rect : {
			        x : x,
			        y : y,
			        w : w,
			        h : h
			    },
			    placeholderImg : _image + "zhibo/view-xin-t.png",
			    iamges : [
			    	_image + 'zhibo/view-xin.png',
			    ],
			    isShowNum : false,
			    applauseNum : 0,
			    fixedOn : api.frameName,
			   	fixed : true
			});
		}
		function u() {
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : false
			});
			var uid = api.pageParam['uid'] ? api.pageParam['uid'] : '';
			if (api.pageParam['ret']['role'] == 2) {
				uid = _user.id;
			}
			_url({
				uid : api.pageParam['uid'],
				qian : 0,
				fan : 1
			}, 'u_win')
		}
		function liwu(){
			if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
				api.setFullScreen({
					fullScreen : false
				});
				return _login();
			}
			var name = 'zhibo/view_frm_liwu'
			api.openFrame({
				name : name,
				url : html_win + name + '.html',
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto'
				},
				animation : {
					type : "push", 
					subType : "from_bottom", 
					duration : 300
				},
				bounces : false,
				pageParam:api.pageParam,
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				vScrollBarEnabled : false,
				hScrollBarEnabled : false
			});
		}
		function liwu_user(){
			var name = 'zhibo/view_frm_liwu_user'
			api.openFrame({
				name : name,
				url : html_win + name + '.html',
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto'
				},
				animation : {
					type : "push", 
					subType : "from_bottom", 
					duration : 300
				},
				bounces : false,
				pageParam:api.pageParam,
				bgColor : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
				vScrollBarEnabled : false,
				hScrollBarEnabled : false
			});
		}
		function xin(){
			 applause.clickAppLause();
		}
		function liwu_ajax(data){
			data = eval('(' + data.replace(/}{/, ',') + ')');
			liaotianshi(_user.username + "赠送<b style='color:#FF742D'>" + data.title+"</b>",'p');
			data.user = {};
			data.user.id = _user.id;
			data.user.img = _user.img;
			data.user.username = _user.username;
			liwu_donghua(data);
			liwu_msg(data);
			var _this = $('#zhu_zuan');
			var num = parseInt(_this.data('num')) + parseInt(data.money);
			_this.data('num',num);
			_this.text(_num(num));
			_msg('赠送成功');
			_ajax('api/zhibo/liwu_money',function(ret,err){
				_userInfo();
				if(ret){
					if(ret.err){
						_alert(ret.err)
					}
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},{id:data.id,uid_zhu:api.pageParam['uid']})
		}
		function zhubo_info(){
			chat.getRoomMemberCount(function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					$('.view-renqi-2 span').text(_num(ret.count));
				}
			});
			_ajax('api/user/info',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var _this = $('#zhu_zuan');
					_this.data('num',ret.zhibo_zuan_s);
					_this.text(_num(ret.zhibo_zuan_s_));
					$('#fensi').html(_num(ret.fensi)+" 粉丝");
					setTimeout(function(){
						zhubo_info();
					},5000)
				}else{
				}
			},{id:api.pageParam['uid'] ? api.pageParam['uid'] : _user.id})
		}
		function liwu_donghua(data){
			console.log(JSON.stringify(data))
			var x = 100;
		    var y = 0;
		    var rand = parseInt(Math.random() * (x - y + 1) + y);
		    var html = '<div class="view_frm_msg" id="view_frm_msg_'+rand+'"><div class="view_frm_msgs"><img class="a1" src="'+data.user.img+'?imageView2/1/w/100/h/100/format/jpg" /><div class="a2"><h2 class="aui-font-size-14 aui-ellipsis-1">'+data.user.username+'</h2><p class="aui-font-size-14 aui-ellipsis-1">'+data.title+'</p></div><img class="a3" src="'+fx_cdn+data.img+'" /></div></div>';
			$('header').append(html);
			setTimeout(function(){
				$('#view_frm_msg_'+rand).animate({
					opacity : 0,
					top: '-2rem',
				}, 100,function(){
					$(this).remove();
				})
			},2000)
		}
		function liwu_msg(data){
			var json = {
				uid : _user.id,
				username : _user.username,
				img : _user.img,
				role:api.pageParam['ret']['role'],
				type:99999,	
				liwu_data:data
			}
			var extra = JSON.stringify(json);	
			sendText('1',extra)
		}
		function fenxiang() {
			img = (api.pageParam['user'] ? fx_cdn+api.pageParam['user']['img'] : _user.img) + "?imageView2/1/w/200/h/200";
			fx_data 	= 	{
				title:"("+_user.nickname+')直播开始啦！',
				description:'',
				url:fx_url+"m/zhibo/"+(api.pageParam['uid'] ? api.pageParam['uid'] : _user.id)+'.html',
				img:img
			}
			var row=2;
 			var items=[{icon: _image+'share/1.png',title: '朋友圈'},{icon: _image+'share/2.png',title: '好友'},{icon: _image+'share/3.png',title: 'QQ'},{icon: _image+'share/4.png',title: '空间'},{icon: _image+'share/5.png',title:'微博'},{icon: _image+'share/101.png',title: '系统'},{icon: _image+'share/102.png',title: '短信'},{icon: _image+'share/103.png',title:'邮件'},{icon: _image+'share/104.png',title: '复制'}];
 			var MNActionButton = api.require('MNActionButton');
			MNActionButton.open({
			    layout: {
			        row: row,
			        col: 5,
			        offset: 0
			    },
			    animation: false,
			    autoHide: true,
			    styles: {
			        maskBg: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.3)',
			        bg: '#F8F8F8',
			        indicator: {
			            color: '#c4c4c4',
			            highlight: '#9e9e9e'
			        },
			    },
			    items:  items
			}, function(ret) {
				if(ret.eventType=="click"){
					var index=ret.index;
					if(index==0){
						_weixin('timeline',fx_data)
					}else if(index==1){
						_weixin('session',fx_data)
					}else if(index==2){
						_qq('shareNews',fx_data)
					}else if(index==3){
						_qq('QFriend',fx_data)
					}else if(index==4){
						_weibo(fx_data)
					}else if(index==5){	
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					}else if(index==6){	
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==7){	
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							}
						});
					}else if(index==8){	
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					}else{
						_msg(index)
						return;
					}
				}
			});
		}
		function _weixin(type,data) {
			var wx = api.require('wxPlus');
			wx.shareWebpage({
				scene : type,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _qq(type,data){
			var obj = api.require('QQPlus');
			obj.shareNews({
				url : data.url,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				imgUrl : data.img,
				type : type,
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
		function _weibo(data) {
			var weibo = api.require('weiboPlus');
			weibo.shareWebPage({
				text : data.title,
				title : data.title,
				description : data.description,
				thumb : data.img,
				contentUrl : data.url
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (ret.status) {
					_msg('分享成功');
					_daily({name:'money_fenxiang_2'});
				}
			});
		}
	</script>
</html>

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../../css/suxiang-zhibo.css" />
	</head>
	<body>
		<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
			{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}
			<div class="aui-card-list" tapmode onclick="_zurl_data(this)" data-data='{{= JSON.stringify(it.data[i]) }}'>
				<div class="aui-card-list-header aui-card-list-user">
					<div class="aui-card-list-user-avatar">
						<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{= fx_cdn + it.data[i].user.img }}?imageView2/1/w/50/h/50" src="../../image/touxiang.png" tapmode onclick="_url({uid:{{= it.data[i].uid }},qian:0,fan:1},'u_win')" class="aui-img-round">
					</div>
					<div class="aui-card-list-user-name">
						{{= it.data[i].user.username }}
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="aui-card-list-content-padded">
					<div class="text">
						<p><span>{{= it.data[i].streamStatus == 1 ? '直播中' : '未直播'}}</span>{{= it.data[i].roomName }}</p>
					</div>
					<img src="../../image/load-img.png" id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{= fx_cdn  + it.data[i].img_l }}?imageView2/1/w/300/h/200" />
				</div>
			</div>
			{{ } }}
		</script>
		<section class="aui-content sx-zhibo" id="fx-view"></section>
	</body>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/article/zhibo',1,1);
			})
	    	api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(heigutgao==1){	
					pagenum+=1
					lists('api/article/zhibo',pagenum);
				}
			});
		}
		function _zurl_data(_this){
			if (!_getPrefs('user')) {
				return _login();
			}
			var data = $(_this).data('data');
			api.setFullScreen({
				fullScreen : true
			});
			_zurl(data)
		}
	</script>
</html>

	<head>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			console.log(JSON.stringify(api.pageParam))
 			data();
		}
		function data() {
			_ajax('api/zhibo/phb/type/' + api.pageParam['type'],function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($api.html($api.byId('sx-list')));
					$api.html($api.byId('sx-view'), evalData(ret));
					_imageCache();
				}else{
					_alert(JSON.stringify(err))
				}
			},api.pageParam)
		}
	</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		var typeid,heigutgao = 1,moviePlayer;
		apiready = function() {
			oxPlayer = api.require('oxPlayer');
			api.parseTapmode();
			typeid=api.pageParam['id'];
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/3/typeid/'+typeid+'/',1,1);
			})
	    	api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(heigutgao==1){	
					pagenum+=1
					_lists('api/article/lists/mychannel/3/typeid/'+typeid+'/',pagenum);	
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'video_frm'
			}, function(ret, err) {
			    console.log(JSON.stringify(ret.value));
			});
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'video_frm'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var v=ret.value.k;
				if(v=='hidePlayer'){
					oxPlayer.pause();
				}else if(v=='keyback'){
					oxPlayer.isFull(function(ret) {
						if(ret.isFull){
							oxPlayer.exitFullScreen();
							return;
						}else{
							oxPlayer.pause();
						}
						return;
					});
				}
			});
			oxPlayer.addEventListener(function(ret, err) {
					switch (ret.code) {
						case 6:
						video_is = true;
						 break;
						default:
					}
				});
		};
		var video_is = false;
		var onsgaodu=0;
		window.onscroll = function(){
			if(video_is){
				oxPlayer.pause();
				video_is = false;
			}
				console.log(1)
		}
		function hidePlayer(){
		}
		var video_id_is = 0;
		function fx_video(id,url){
			if(video_id_is == id){
				return;
			}
			video_id_is = id;
			oxPlayer.remove();
			var y=$('#id'+id+' .fx-video-content').offset().top;
			var h=$('#id'+id+' .fx-video-content').height();
			var title=$('#id'+id).data('title');
			oxPlayer.fixdPlay({
				rect: {
					x: 0,
					y: y,
					w: api.winWidth,
					h: h
				},
				fixedOn: api.frameName,
				fixed: false,
				showBack: false, 
				showSelect: false, 
				showSpeed: false, 
				showDlna: {
					small: false,
					full: false
				}, 
				showShot: {
					small: false,
					full: false
				}, 
				showBottomProcess: true,
				autoPlay: false, 
				openCache: true, 
				styles: [],
				index: 0,
				hideControl:false,
				showMore:{small:false,full:false},
				showDlna:{small:false,full:false},
				showDunmaku:{small:false,full:false},
				showShot:false,
				loop:false,
				data: [{
						thumb: _image + 'load-video.png',
						url: url
					}
				]
			});
			oxPlayer.start();
			video_is = true;
			return;
			onsgaodu=y+300
			moviePlayer.open({
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : y,
					w : api.winWidth,
					h : h
				},
				videoDirection : 'landscape',
				path : url,
				autoPlay : true,
				fixed:false,
				fixedOn:api.frameName,
				useGestureControl:true,
				showBack:false,
				autorotation:false,
				styles : {
					head : {
						bg : 'rgba(161,161,161,0)',
						height : 44,
						y : 20,
						backSize : 30,
						backImg : _image + 'leftbofang.png',
					},
					foot : {
						bg : 'rgba(0,0,0,0)',
						height : 44,
						palyBtn : {
							size : 15,
							playImg :  _image + 'fx_bofang_s.png',
							pauseImg : _image + 'fx_zanting_s.png',
							marginLeft : 15
						},
						currentTimeLabel : {
							textSize : 14,
							textColor : "#FFF",
							textWidth : 43,
							marginLeft : 15
						},
						seekBar : {
							sliderW : 20,
							sliderH : 20,
							progressColor : '#696969',
							progressSelected : '#F85959',
							marginLeft : 15,
							marginRight : 15
						},
						totalTimeLabel : {
							textSize : 14,
							textColor : "#FFF",
							textWidth : 43,
							marginRight : 15
						},
						fullscreenBtn : {
							size : 30,
							verticalImg : _image + '2019/video_quan.png',
							horizontalImg : _image + '2019/video_quan_tui.png',
						}
					}
				},
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
			return;
			playModule.play({
			    rect:
			    {    x: 0,
			        y : y,
			        w : api.winWidth,
			        h: h
			    },
			    fixedOn: api.frameName,
			    url: url,
			    defaultBtn: true,
			    enableFull : false,
			    fixed:false,
			    title:title,
			    isTopView:true,
			}, function(ret, err) {
			});
		}
		function k(){
		}
		function shuaxin(){
			api.refreshHeaderLoading();
		}
		function asd(id,video,title){
			fx_video(id,video);
			return;
			_url({id:id,videoUrl:video,title:title},'videoView_win')
		}

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
			_setPrefs('yindaotu', 1);
			api.parseTapmode();
			var frames = [];
			for (var i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
				var frame = {};
				frame.name = i;
				frame.url = html_win + 'yindaotu_frm.html';
				frame.pageParam = {
					id : i,
				};
				frame.bgColor = '#fff';
				frame.useWKWebView=true,
				frame.bounces=false,
				frames.push(frame);
			}
			openFrameGroup(frames)
		}
		function openFrameGroup(frames) {
			api.openFrameGroup({
				name : 'yindaotu',
				scrollEnabled : true,
				bounces : true,
				rect : {
					x : 0,
					y : 0,
					w : 'auto',
					h : 'auto',
				},
				index : 0,
				frames : frames,
				preload : 2, 
				bgColor : '#fff',
			});
		}
	</script>
</html>

<!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>资讯站 - </title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/aui.css" />
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/ffxiang.css" />
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/search.css" />
	</head>
	<body>
		<header class="aui-bar aui-bar-nav aui-bar-light fx-view-header" id="fx-header">
			<div class="aui-title" style="left:0rem; right: 0rem;">
				<div class="aui-searchbar" id="search">
					<div class="aui-searchbar-input aui-border-radius">
						<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-search"></i>
						<form>
							<input type="search" autoComplete='off' placeholder="搜索关键词" id="input">
						</form>
						<div class="aui-searchbar-clear-btn">
							<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-close"></i>
						</div>
					</div>
					<div class="aui-searchbar-btn" tapmode onclick="closes()">
						取消
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<a class="aui-pull-right aui-btn"> </a>
		</header>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/zepto.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/fastclick.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var textsearch='',fan;
		apiready = function() {
			FastClick.attach(document.body)
			api.addEventListener({
			    name:'viewappear'
			}, function(ret, err){      
				_heibai(1)  
			});
			_heibai(1); 
			openFrame('search', '', '1')
			$('.aui-searchbar-btn').css('margin-right', '0rem;')
 			$('.aui-searchbar-input').css('margin-left', '0.75rem')
			window.onkeydown = function(e) {
				if (e.keyCode == 13) {
					var q = $api.val($api.byId('input'));
					if (q) {
						var text = $('#input').val();
						key(text)
					}
					return false;
				}
			}
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
		}
		function c(){
			_close(fan)
		}
		function closes(){
			_close(fan)
		}
		var asdasd = 0;
		function key(text) {
			if (!text) {
				_msg('请输入搜索关键词')
				return;
			}
			$("#input").blur();
			$("#input").val(text)
			var searchText = _getPrefs('searchText');
			if (searchText == undefined) {
				_setPrefs('searchText', text);
			} else {
				var Cts = searchText.indexOf(text);
				if (Cts == -1) {
					searchText = text + ',' + searchText
					_setPrefs('searchText', searchText);
				}
			}
			if (!asdasd) {
				api.execScript({
					frameName : 'search',
					script : 'lists("' + text + '")'
				});
				asdasd = 1;
			} else {
				api.sendEvent({
					name : 'shifdakai',
					extra : {
						text : text,
					}
				});
			}
		}
		function del() {
			_removePrefs('searchText')
		}
		function title(text){
			$("#input").val(text)
			var searchText = _getPrefs('searchText');
			if (searchText == undefined) {
				_setPrefs('searchText', text);
			} else {
				var Cts = searchText.indexOf(text);
				if (Cts == -1) {
					searchText = text + ',' + searchText
					_setPrefs('searchText', searchText);
				}
			}
		}
		function openFrame(url, header, footer, pageParam,useHi,bounces) {
	api.parseTapmode();
	if(!useHi){
		useHi=false;
	}else{
		useHi=true;
	}
	var headerh;
	var footerh;
	if (header == 1) {
		headerh = 0;
	} else {
		var header = $api.byId('fx-header');
		$api.fixStatusBar(header);
		var headerPos = $api.offset(header);
		headerh = headerPos.h
	}
	var body_h = api.winHeight;
	if (footer == 1) {
		footerh = 0;
	} else {
		$api.fixTabBar($api.byId('fx-footer'))
		footerh = $api.offset($api.byId('fx-footer')).h;
	}
	if(bounces){
		bounces=false
	}else{
		bounces=true
	}
	api.openFrame({
		name : url,
		url : html_win + url + '.html',
		bounces : true,
		reload : true,
		rect : {
			x : 0,
			y : headerh,
			w : 'auto',
			h : body_h - headerh
		},
		pageParam : {w:headerh,textsearch:api.pageParam['text']},
	})
}
	</script>
</html><!doctype html>
<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />
		<title>首页</title>

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/view_ping.css" />

	color: #3e3e3e;
}

	<body>
		<script id="fx-list-top" type="text/x-dot-template">
		<div class="pingList" style="border-bottom: 1px solid #e8e8e8;">
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list aui-content-padded" style="margin-top: 0rem">
				<li class="aui-list-item">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media">
							<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.img}}" src="../image/touxiang.png" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{= it.uid}}},'u_win');" />
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title" Tapmode onclick="_url('','u_win');">
									 {{= it.username}}
								</div>
								{{? _token}}
								{{? it.user.guanzhu != 5}}
									{{? it.user.guanzhu == 0}}
									<div class="aui-list-item-right" style="color:#406599" Tapmode onclick="guanzhu(this,{{= it.uid}});" data-id='1'>
										<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-plus"></i>关注
									</div>
									{{??}}
									<div class="aui-list-item-right" style="color:#406599" Tapmode onclick="guanzhu(this,{{= it.uid}});" data-id='2'>
										已关注
									</div>
									{{?}}
								{{?}}
								<div class="aui-list-item-right" style="color:#406599">
									<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-plus"></i>关注
								</div>
								{{?}}
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-text fx-contentuser" style="color:#333;" Tapmode onclick="pingAdd();">
								{{= it.content}}
							</div>
							<div class="aui-info aui-font-size-12 aui-padded-t-5 aui-padded-b-0">
								<div class="aui-info-item">
									{{= it.time}}
								</div>
								<div class="aui-info-item" Tapmode onclick="jubao({{= api.pageParam['pingId']}})">
									举报
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="aui-info aui-font-size-12 aui-padded-t-10 aui-padded-b-0">
								<div class="aui-info-item" Tapmode onclick="_url({url:'view_zan',pingId:{{= it.id}},title:'{{= it.zan}}人赞过'})">
									{{? it.zanList}}
									<div class="zan_img">
										{{= it.zanList}}
									</div>
									{{?}}
									<span id="zanList">{{= it.zan}}</span>人赞过 >
								</div>
								<div class="aui-info-item pingZan {{? it.user.zan}} pingZanColor{{?}}" {{? it.user.zan}} data-id='1'{{?}} Tapmode onclick="pingZan()">
									<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud" style="margin-right: 0rem;font-size: 0.8rem"></i>{{= it.zan}}
								</div>
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
			</ul>
		</div>
		</script>
		<div id="fx-view-top"></div>
		<div class="pingList" id="here">
			<script id="fx-list" type="text/x-dot-template">
				{{ for(var i=0,len=it.data.length; i < len; i++) { }}
				<li class="aui-list-item aui-padded-b-10">
					<div class="aui-media-list-item-inner">
						<div class="aui-list-item-media">
							<img id="ffxiangImgCache" ffxiang-src="{{=it.data[i].img}}" src="../image/touxiang.png" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{= it.data[i].uid}}},'u_win');" />
						</div>
						<div class="aui-list-item-inner">
							<div class="aui-list-item-text">
								<div class="aui-list-item-title" Tapmode onclick="_url({id:{{= it.data[i].uid}}},'u_win');">
									{{= it.data[i].username}}
								</div>
								{{? aid && !api.pageParam['pingId'] }}
								<div class="aui-list-item-right {{? it.data[i].zanUser}} pingZanColor{{?}}" {{? it.data[i].zanUser}} data-id='1'{{?}} Tapmode onclick="pingZan_s(this,{{= it.data[i].id}} ,{{= it.data[i].zan}})">
								{{??}}
								<div class="aui-list-item-right {{? it.data[i].zanUser}} pingZanColor{{?}}" {{? it.data[i].zanUser}} data-id='1'{{?}} Tapmode onclick="pingZan_xia(this,{{= it.data[i].id}} ,{{= it.data[i].zan}})">
								{{?}}
									<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>{{= it.data[i].zan}}
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="aui-list-item-text fx-contentuser" style="color:#333;" Tapmode onclick="pingAdd('{{= it.data[i].username}}',{{= it.data[i].id}})">
								{{= it.data[i].content}}
							</div>
							<div class="aui-info aui-font-size-12 aui-padded-t-5 aui-padded-b-5">
								<div class="aui-info-item">
									{{= it.data[i].time}}
									<span Tapmode onclick="pingAdd('{{= it.data[i].username}}',{{= it.data[i].id}})">  回复</span>
								</div>
								<div class="aui-info-item" Tapmode onclick="pingAdd('{{= it.data[i].username}}',{{= it.data[i].id}})">
									<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-comment"  style="color:#4c5276;font-size: 0.8rem;"></i>
								</div>
							</div>
							{{? api.pageParam['pingId']}}
							{{? it.data[i].pingDataList}}
							<div class="fx-huifuList" id="fx-huifuList{{= it.data[i].id}}">
								<ul id="fx-huifuLists{{= it.data[i].id}}">
									{{= it.data[i].pingDataList}}
								</ul>
							</div>
							{{?}}
							{{??}}
							{{? it.data[i].pingDataList}}
							<div class="fx-huifuList" id="fx-huifuList{{= it.data[i].id}}">
								<ul id="fx-huifuLists{{= it.data[i].id}}" Tapmode onclick="_url({aid:{{= it.data[i].aid}},pingId:{{= it.data[i].id}}},'view_ping_win_2')">
									{{= it.data[i].pingDataList}}
								</ul>
							</div>
							{{?}}
							{{?}}
						</div>
					</div>
				</li>
				{{ } }}
			</script>
			<ul class="aui-list aui-media-list aui-content-padded" id="fx-view"></ul>

	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/jquery-3.2.1.min.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/doT.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/ffxiang.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/sharebox.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var inputField,zan_num=0,huifuNum=0,aid=0;
		apiready = function() {
		 	_init();
			api.addEventListener({
			    name: 'yejian'
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if(ret){
					_yejians();
				}
			});
			aid=api.pageParam['aid'];
			if(aid){
				huifuNum=api.pageParam['pingNum'];
			}
			_shangla(function(ret,err){
				view()
			})
			api.addEventListener({
				name : 'scrolltobottom',
				extra : {
					threshold : threshold 
				}
			}, function(ret, err) {
				if (heigutgao == 1) {
					pagenum += 1
					if(aid && !api.pageParam['pingId']){
						_lists('api/article/pingList', pagenum,'',{aid:aid});
					}else{
						_lists('api/article/pingList_xia', pagenum,'',{pingId:api.pageParam['pingId']});
					}
				}
			});
			inputField = api.require('inputField');
			inputField.setInputFieldListener(function(ret, err) {
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.eventType == 'move') {
						if (ret.chatViewH == 0 || ret.chatViewH == -1) {
							inputField.hide(function(ret, err) {
								if (ret) {
								} else {
								}
							});
							inputField.resignFirstResponder();
						}
					}
				} else {
					_msgz(JSON.stringify(err));
				}
			});
		}
		function view(){
			if(aid && !api.pageParam['pingId']){
				_lists('api/article/pingList', 1, 1,{aid:aid});
			}else{
				_ajax('api/article/pingView',function(ret,err){
				if(ret){
					var evalData = doT.template($('#fx-list-top').html());
						$('#fx-view-top').html(evalData(ret))
						zan_num=ret.zan
						huifuNum=ret.huifuNum
						api.execScript({
							script : 'title("'+huifuNum+'条回复")'
						});
						if(ret.user.zan){
							api.execScript({
								script : 'pingZan()'
							});
						}
						if(ret.pingNum){
							_lists('api/article/pingList_xia', 1, 1,{pingId:api.pageParam['pingId']});
						}else{
							api.refreshHeaderLoadDone();
							_imageCache();
							$('#here').append('<div class="qiangshafa" Tapmode onclick="pingAdd()">暂无评论，点击抢沙发</div>');
							api.parseTapmode();
						}
					}
				},{pingId:api.pageParam['pingId']})
			}
		}
		function gundong() {
			document.getElementById('here').scrollIntoView()
		}
		var pingAddPen = 1,pingIds=0,htmlcontents='';
		function pingAdd(username,pingId,htmlcontent) {
			if(!pingId){pingId=api.pageParam['pingId']}
			pingIds=pingId;
			htmlcontents=htmlcontent
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			if(username){
				username='回复   '+username+'：'
			}else{
				username='优质评论将会被优先展示';
			}
			if (pingAddPen == 1) {
				pingAddPen = 2;
				inputField.open({
					bgColor : '#fff',
					lineColor : '#D8D8D8',
					fileBgColor : '#f5f5f5',
					borderColor : '#F4F5F6',
					autoFocus : true,
					placeholder : username,
					placeholderStyles : {
						color : '#bbb', 
						size : 14, 
						marginL : 5 
					},
					maxLines : 3,
					sendBtn : {
						bg : '#03a9f4', 
						bgHighlight : '#0287BF', 
						title : '发送', 
						titleSize : '14', 
						titleColor : '#fff', 
						corner : 5 
					},
				}, function(ret, err) {
					if (ret) {
						if (ret.msg == '') {
							_msg('请输入评价');
						} else {
							pingAddTent(ret.msg);
							inputField.hide(function(ret, err) {
								if (ret) {
								} else {
								}
							});
							inputField.resignFirstResponder();
						}
					} else {
					}
				});
			} else {
				inputField.setPlaceholder({
				    placeholder: username
				});
				inputField.becomeFirstResponder(function(ret, err) {
					if (ret.status) {
						setTimeout(function() {
							inputField.show();
						}, 500)
					} else {
					}
				});
			}
		}
		function pingAddTent(text) {
			if(api.pageParam['pingId']){
				pingIds=api.pageParam['pingId']
			}else{
			}
			console.log('aid:'+api.pageParam['aid']+'  pingId:'+api.pageParam['pingId']+'  pingId2:'+pingIds)
			_ajax('api/member/ping',function(ret,err){
				inputField.setMsg({msg: ''});
				view()
			},{aid:api.pageParam['aid'],content:text,pingId:pingIds})
			gundong();
		}
		function pingZan() {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $('.pingZan').data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$('.pingZan').addClass('pingZanColor');
				$('.pingZan').data('id', '1');
				$('.pingZan').html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud" style="margin-right: 0rem;font-size: 0.8rem"></i>' + (zan_num + 1))
				$('#zanList').text(zan_num + 1);
				api.execScript({
					script : 'pingZan()'
				});
				_ajax('api/member/pingZan/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:api.pageParam['pingId']})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function pingZan_xia(obj, aid,num,top) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud" style="margin-right: 0rem;font-size: 0.8rem"></i>' + (num + 1))
				if(top==1){
					$('#zanList').text(num + 1);
				}
				_ajax('api/member/pingZan_xia/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function pingZanUser(obj, num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var id = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!id) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>' + (num + 1))
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
		function guanzhu(jgo, uid) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			_loading()
			var text=$(jgo).text();
			var type = $(jgo).data('id')
			if (type == 1) {
				$(jgo).text('关注中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhu/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).text('已关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 2)
						$(jgo).addClass('guanzhuhovew')
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			} else if (type == 2) {
				$(jgo).text('取消中');
				_ajax('api/member/guanzhuDel/',function(ret,err){
					_loadingCloes()
					if(ret.ret){
						$(jgo).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-plus"></i>关注')
						$(jgo).data('id', 1)
						$(jgo).removeClass('guanzhuhovew');
					}else{
						$(jgo).text(text);
						_msg(ret.err)
					}
				},{gz_uid:uid})
			}
		}
		function jubao() {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			buttons = ['淫秽色情', '营销广告', '恶意攻击谩骂', '我有话要说 > '];
			api.actionSheet({
				title : '举报',
				cancelTitle : '取消举报',
				buttons : buttons
			}, function(ret, err) {
				var index = ret.buttonIndex;
				if (index) {
					_msg(buttons[index - 1])
				}
			});
		}
		sharebox = new auiSharebox();
		function fenxiang() {
			sharebox.init({
				frameBounces : true, 
				buttons : [{
					image : '../image/share/1.png',
					text : '微信朋友圈',
					value : '1',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/2.png',
					text : '微信好友',
					value : '2',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/3.png',
					text : '手机QQ',
					value : '3',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/4.png',
					text : 'QQ空间',
					value : '4',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/5.png',
					text : '新浪微博',
					value : '5',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/6.png',
					text : '支付宝',
					value : '6',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/101.png',
					text : '系统分享',
					value : '101',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/102.png',
					text : '短信',
					value : '102',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/103.png',
					text : '邮件',
					value : '103',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/104.png',
					text : '复制链接',
					value : '104',
				}, {
					image : '../image/share/105.png',
					text : '举报',
					value : '105',
				}],
				col : 6,
				cancelTitle : '取消'
			}, function(ret) {
				var fx_data = {
					title : '分享标题',
					content : '分享描述',
					url : 'http:
				}
				if (ret) {
					if (ret.buttonValue == 101) {
						var sharedModule = api.require('shareAction');
						sharedModule.share({
							text : fx_data.title + fx_data.content,
							type : 'text'
						});
					} else if (ret.buttonValue == 102) {
						api.sms({
							numbers : [],
							text : fx_data.title
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} else {
								_msg('取消')
							}
						});
					} else if (ret.buttonValue == 103) {
						api.mail({
							recipients : [],
							subject : fx_data.title,
							body : fx_data.content,
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret && ret.status) {
								_msg('已发送')
							} else {
								_msg('取消')
							}
						});
					} else if (ret.buttonValue == 104) {
						var clipBoard = api.require('clipBoard');
						clipBoard.set({
							value : fx_data.url
						}, function(ret, err) {
							if (ret) {
								_msg('复制成功，把链接分享给朋友吧！')
							}
						});
					} else if (ret.buttonValue == 105) {
						buttons = ['广告', '重复、旧闻', '低俗', '标题夸张', '与事实不符', '内容质量差', '疑似抄袭', '其他问题，我要吐槽 > '];
						api.actionSheet({
							title : '举报内容问题',
							cancelTitle : '取消举报',
							buttons : buttons
						}, function(ret, err) {
							var index = ret.buttonIndex;
							_msg(buttons[index - 1])
						});
					}
				}
			})
		}
		function gundong(){
			$('body,html').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 200);
		}
		function pingZan_s(obj, aid,num) {
			if(!_user){
				_login();
				return;
			}
			var type = $(obj).data('id');
			if (!type) {
				$(obj).addClass('pingZanColor');
				$(obj).data('id', '1');
				$(obj).html('<i class="aui-iconfont aui-icon-laud"></i>' + (num + 1))
				_ajax('api/member/pingZan/',function(ret,err){
					if(ret){
						if(ret.err){
							_msg(ret.err)
						}
					}
				},{aid:aid})
			} else {
				_msg('您已经赞过')
			}
		}
	</script>
</html>

<html>
	<head>
		<meta charset="utf-8">
		<meta name="viewport" content="maximum-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=0,width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0"/>
		<meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no" />

		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="../css/aui.css" />
		<style>
		 html,body{
	 -webkit-touch-callout:none;
	-webkit-text-size-adjust:none;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
	-webkit-user-select:none;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	background: #fff important;
}
			img{width: 5rem; margin: 0 auto; margin-top: 5rem;}
			p{
				margin: 0 2rem;
				padding-top: 1.5rem;
				line-height: 1.5rem;
				font-size: 0.8rem;
			}
			div{
				text-align: center;
				font-size: 0.75rem;
				color: #F85959;
				padding-top: 2rem;
			}
		</style>
	</head>
	<body tapmode onclick="ok()">
		<div><img src="../image/error.png"  />
		<p>网络好像有点问题</p>
		<div>点击刷新</div></div>
	</body>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="../script/api.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		apiready = function() {
		}
		function ok(){
			_loading('正在努力刷新中...')
			_ajax('api/index/errors',function(ret,err){
				_loadingCloes();
				if(ret){
					api.execScript({
						script : 's()'
					});
				}else{
					_alert('哎呀！还是没有网络呢。请您努力检查网络吧。')
				}
			})
		}
	</script>

.view-header .aui-media-list
,.view-header ul
,.view-header li
,.view-footer
,.aui-bar-tab
{
	border: 0 !important; 
	background: none !important;
}
.sx-zhibo .aui-card-list-header{
	margin: 0.5rem 0.75rem;
	min-height: 2.5rem;
	position: relative;

  0% {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translate3d(-3000px, 0, 0);
  }
  60% {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translate3d(25px, 0, 0);
  }

    transform: translate3d(-10px, 0, 0);

	font-size: 0.75rem !important;

html{
	font-family: sans-serif;
}
html,body,header,section,footer,div,ul,ol,li,img,a,span,em,del,legend,center,strong,var,fieldset,form,label,dl,dt,dd,cite,input,hr,time,mark,code,figcaption,figure,textarea,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p{
	margin:0;
	border:0;
	padding:0;
	font-style:normal;
}
html,body {
	-webkit-touch-callout:none;
	-webkit-text-size-adjust:none;
	-webkit-tap-highlight-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
	-webkit-user-select:none;
	background-color: #fff;
}
nav,article,aside,details,main,header,footer,section,fieldset,figcaption,figure{
	display: block;
}
img,a,button,em,del,strong,var,label,cite,small,time,mark,code,textarea{
	display:inline-block;
}
header,section,footer {
	position:relative;
}
ol,ul{
	list-style:none;
}
input,button,textarea {
	border:0;
	margin:0;
	padding:0;
	font-size:1em;
	line-height:1em;
	/*-webkit-appearance:none;*/
	background-color:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
}
span{
	display:inline-block;
}
a:active, a:hover {
  outline: 0;
}
a, a:visited{
	text-decoration:none;
}
label, .wordWrap{
    word-wrap: break-word;
    word-break: break-all;
}
table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-spacing: 0;
}
td,th {
  padding: 0;
}

	content: ' ';
	display: block;
	clear: both;
	visibility:hidden;
	line-height: 0;
	height:0;
}

	display: block;
	height: 1.5em;
	width: 100%;
}

}

/*基础动画类*/
@keyframes rotate {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1);
            	transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1);
    }
    50% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1);
            	transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1);
    }
    100% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1);
            	transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1);
    }
}
@-webkit-keyframes rotate {
    0% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1);
            	transform: rotate(0deg) scale(1);
    }
    50% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1);
            	transform: rotate(180deg) scale(1);
    }
    100% {
        -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1);
            	transform: rotate(360deg) scale(1);
    }
}
@keyframes bounce {
	0%, 100% {
	-webkit-transform: scale(0.0);
			transform: scale(0.0);
	}
	50% {
	-webkit-transform: scale(1.0);
			transform: scale(1.0);
	}
}
@-webkit-keyframes bounce {
	0%, 100% {
		-webkit-transform: scale(0.0);
				transform: scale(0.0);
	}
	50% {
		-webkit-transform: scale(1.0);
				transform: scale(1.0);
	}
}
@keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0.3; }
    to { opacity: 1; }
}
@-webkit-keyframes fadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0.3; }
    to { opacity: 1; }
}

  box-sizing: border-box;
}

  bottom: 3px;
  font-size: 1.15em;

  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  text-decoration: none;
  color: #FFF;
}

  text-decoration: underline;
}

}
